reviews.comments: 在香港尖沙咀闹市区有这样一间性价比高的房间很棒了~~离尖沙咀地铁近,旁边还有通利琴行,推荐附近新开的华嫂冰室很好吃~~
I like it
由于自己走错了､绕了两个小时､其实B2出来走一会就到了､环境很好､我很喜欢､虽然小､但是五脏俱全､下次来香港还会选他家､性价比很好的､

服务周到贴心,房东有工作小组24小时可以答疑｡
地方比较好找,清晰标注了明显建筑物｡楼下还有小吃,很便捷｡
房间虽然是很小,床也有点窄大概0.6､7米,但是对于单人女生来说可以了｡
有独立的卫生间,不过是在隔壁屋,这会有点不太方便｡
整体来讲性价比不错｡
另外建议卫生间也可以放个护手霜什么的｡
非常温馨,期待下次旅途❤️

winnie温馨提示交通方案,还有酒店具体位置注意事项,而且提前联系我让我不致于到了以后还忙于找地方｡房间很温馨整洁,也很cute.非常满意｡我住的房间卫生间在外面上厕所不方便,但是房东讲正因为这个原因价格便宜了｡
非常推荐他们家,下次来还是订他们家
上一次去香港住旁边的宝勒巷,这一次住的地方离上次非常近,所以很熟悉,离地铁站和海港城都很近,维多利亚港15分钟步行就可以到,位置很好,很干净,房东超级热心｡
地理位置很好,地铁很近,附近可选择的餐厅很多,楼宇虽然是老房子但室内装修很舒适,卫生不错｡店主是个用心经营的人｡还要称赞一下楼下保安老伯,我将门卡和手机全锁室内了,告诉他后立刻帮我打电话给店主解决问题,非常感谢!
如果有机会的话,下次还会再订这家
超出预期,小而精致吧｡之前在香港考雅思住的宾馆隔音效果出奇的糟糕,这家虽然也在闹市区,但是隔音效果还不错｡房东也很贴心
房间很好,麻雀虽小,五脏俱全!地段好方便,乘地铁好便捷,楼下各种吃逛的地方!去红磡走路也就十几分钟!很好!

The place is super convenient, i took bus from airport and walked only a few mins to arrive. Room is small but it’s as expected. Clean, have own bath room(next to the room). Communication was very good, fast response and full of details. I enjoyed  the short stay overall.
房间虽小但在寸土寸金的香港已经可以接受了｡其他方面都不错,满足要求｡
房间有点小,不过香港的房间都不大,有单独的卫生间,自己一个人住很合适,自助入住也很方便｡

name: Quarto charmoso em apartamento bem localizado.
summary: Apartamento confortável e bem iluminado, com vista para a cidade. Dois sofás-cama na sala e um quarto privado com cama queen.  A coanfitriã permanecerá em outro quarto. Os hóspedes têm acesso todo o apartamento: cozinha, área de serviço, banheiro, pátio externo. Todas as pessoas que anseiam em construir um mundo melhor são bem-vindas, independente de sua origem. O espaço acomoda duas pessoas, mas pode servir a mais pessoas com dois sofás-cama na sala, com preço adicional.
space: O quarto é grande, arejado e os hospedes podem usar a cozinha e máquina de lavar. O prédio fica em lugar muito acessível dentro de Santa Teresa. Todas as conduções passam na porta, o bonde e todas as linhas de ônibus.

O prédio fica em lugar muito acessível dentro de Santa Teresa. Todas as conduções passam na porta, o bonde e todas as linhas de ônibus. Mas a coanfitriã estará no imóvel e dará todas as informações suporte necessários. O café da manha será oferecido se previamente acordado e com taxa extra de R$15,00 por pessoa.  A reserva será finalizada, contendo somente adultos.

reviews.comments:
This was a cozy place to stay during our three-day visit to Porto. Paulo is very responsive and easy to communicate with and answered any questions we had before and during our stay! 

The apartment is very close to the Casa da Musica metro stop so it's pretty well connected to public transit and it's near a few grocery stores too, in case you'd like to cook for yourself!  It's about a 25/30 minute walk from the apartment to the center city, but we enjoyed the walk when we decided to go by foot. 

Thanks, Paulo!

El apartamento se llenó de hormigas cuando llegamos por la noche, y el anfitrión aún nos lo justificó diciendo que nos había dejado hacer el "check-in" antes de lo previsto. Pésima higiene del apartamento.

Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

name: Cozy apartment in Nisantasi,center of Istanbul.
summary: Hi guys! Welcome to Istanbul! I am happy to offer you a comfortable  room in my peaceful and cosy apartment(Short/Long term), which is located in the centre of Istanbul Nisantasi/Mesrutiyet area. Apartment is on the 3d floor and it is very bright.Nisantasi area is a very popular area with its great restaurants of Turkish and International food,nice cafes,banks,shops.There is a very nice green park -Macka Park here.You can enjoy walking on the fresh air or make a picnic in Park.
space: In your room you have  a middlesize bed (1.20 width) with pillows and covers, big hanger, a small table,chest of drawers and mirror.  The shared space is the kitchen, bathroom(toilet),small balcony.  If you need any advises about the city areas and touristic places I will be glad to help you.

neighborhood_overview: The location of my apartment  in Nisantasi  which is a very popular and luxury area with many nice restaurants (expensive and not very expensive)and cafes around, Citys shopping mall, shops, exchange offices, banks. it is a comfortable area from  where you easily can go to different places of Istanbul .
transit: It is an amazing access to transportation, Metro is  5 minutes walking , which will take you to all touristic places. Taksim area is 20 minutes by walk or 5 min by metro. Also there are buses and yellow minibuses in the area.  If you need to take a shuttle bus to airport  there is a Havatas station 15 min by walk or 3 min by taxi. If you walk down straight to Besiktas area you will be on the seaside of an amazing Bosforus and it will take only 20 minutes walking or 5 minutes by minibus.
interaction: I am not smoker  so please, it would be so appreciated if you smoke in the small balcony through the window.  I would ask my guest a deposit, which will be given you back when you make check-out.  I would ask my guest to take off shoes in  apartment.

host.host_about:
I live in Istanbul and I would like to receive  international guests  as I  have more international mind I think it would be interesting to know many new people from different countries.
I like music,painting,travelling,sport.
I like walking in a nice park which is situated in my area.

reviews.comments: I stayed here for more than 3 weeks, I could not be happier. The place is very central (walkable distance to Besiktas, neighbourhood is full of nice cafes and shopping places), really safe and quiet, metro station is just 5 minutes away.  The flat has all the necessities and more. Marala is an amazing host. Thank You so much! :)

name: Apartment Eixample Sants Station
summary: Cozy apartment in  the Eixample of Barcelona. 3 bedrooms, quiet and very local neighborhood. Close to the main train and metro station of Barcelona and close to the magic fountains, Las Arenas shopping center ( old bullfighting stadium) with a great views from Barcelona on top, Plaza España, Fast internet at the apartment, full equiped kitchen, nice and comfortable living room and a beatiful relaxing terrace with great light area. Apartment with tourist license HUTB (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

description: 你将体验到住在市中心的便利 好处: - 购物方便, 楼下到处都有大型商业中心 - 交通方便, 实测距地铁站2分钟步行距离,另外楼下就有全港最大的小巴站 - 没有噪音, 房子大, 冷气足 装修风格以现代新式为主 采用木色地板 白色墙壁 灯火通明 - 所有房间和客厅有冷气 - 有wifi, 不限流量 - 有24小时保安 - 全电子锁出入所有门, 安全方便 - 所有床品一客一换保证卫生 旺角(英语:Mong Kok)是位于香港九龙西油尖旺区北部的地区,是香港著名的旅游和购物区之一｡旺角新旧楼宇林立;旧住宅楼宇地铺多为商店或餐厅｡以弥敦道为界,购物中心集中在东面,住宅区在西面｡区内交通十分发达,有巴士及港铁(东铁线､荃湾线和观塘线)直达,更有专线小巴通宵行驶｡假日时弥敦道及西洋菜南街一带经常水泄不通｡ 旺角的人口密度极高,平均密度为每平方公里130,000人,现时其地积比率约4倍,新型摩天大厦与旧式唐楼纵横交错分布,是世界一大都市景观｡ 实测距地铁站2分钟步行距离,另外楼下就有全港最大的小巴站 - 24小时有车回来, 玩到多晚都可以 - 住满7天送机场接送服务

host.host_about: I’m a local Hong Kong citizen who love to meet the people from every corner of the world. 我很喜歡認識來自世界各地的人｡以心經營住宿服務｡

reviews.comments:
1.房屋位置非常好,旺角地铁站出来走一小段就到,大厦也很干净,安保设施很好｡
2.房子很大,很宽敞､干净,在香港能租到这样的房子实属不易｡
3.热水器不太好用,热水开一会就没了,热水澡只能粗略洗一洗｡
4.房东只会在你订房的时候与你沟通,到了香港后全程沟通都交由助手｡助手的态度很不好,非常难沟通,毫无逻辑,甚至会对住客恐吓!所以给了差评!
5.对Airbnb的客服也不满意,在香港遇到这样的问题后,寻求客服帮助,很难联系上,联系上了之后也只是说联系房东解决问题,不让我们报警,怕把事情闹大｡所幸最后有惊无险｡
可以
在旺角 离地铁站很近,我们入住五个人 房间完全够,附近有旺角中心和朗豪坊,旁边还有一些小的免税药店 sasa 和卓悦!四天的旅行很开心

name: Happy People Plaza España - 4 bedroom (3)
space: Our 18th-century building is been fully renovated in 2014, respecting our heritage and providing all the comfort of the new construction: free Wi-Fi, large and bright living rooms, comfortable bedding, balconies, safe, security cameras, lift, air conditioning, heating, fully equipped kitchen, with dishwasher and Dolce Gusto machine with complimentary welcome coffee capsules, tea and sugar. Happy People team will be pleased to welcome you and offer you a happy and personalized stay. We will be happy to help you book your transfer, parking, visits, tours, tickets,… There is so much to do!
description: Our 18th-century building is been fully renovated in 2014, respecting our heritage and providing all the comfort of the new construction: free Wi-Fi, large and bright living rooms, comfortable bedding, balconies, safe, security cameras, lift, air conditioning, heating, fully equipped kitchen, with dishwasher and Dolce Gusto machine with complimentary welcome coffee capsules, tea and sugar. Happy People team will be pleased to welcome you and offer you a happy and personalized stay. We will be happy to help you book your transfer, parking, visits, tours, tickets,… There is so much to do! * Wi-Fi gratuit; * Terrasse commune sur le toit (ouverte entre 10h et 20h); * Lit pliant pour bébé sur demande. The customers must to get in touch with the property for schedule the check in time There is a quite and well connected neighborhood. really next to Plaza Espanya
neighborhood_overview: There is a quite and well connected neighborhood. really next to Plaza Espanya
access: * Wi-Fi gratuit; * Terrasse commune sur le toit (ouverte entre 10h et 20h); * Lit pliant pour bébé sur demande.
interaction: The customers must to get in touch with the property for schedule the check in time
house_rules: Occupancy: Only the persons declared at the check-in and properly documented can stay in the apartment, according to current legislation. Pets: Pets are only allowed if you have been specifically granted permission beforehand when confirming the reservation. Noise regulations: The Barcelona City Council is very strict with compliance with noise regulations and respect for other residents. Rest hours are between 22:00 and 10:00. Loud music and parties in the apartments are strictly forbidden in order not to disturb the neighbors. In case of a neighbor complaint, it will be registered by the police and you will be immediately required to leave the apartment. If you suffer from your neighbor's noise between 22:00 and 10:00 please call inmediatelly our Technical support. Check in time: Check-in time at the apartments is from 15:00.  Check out time: Check out time is until 11:00 am. Leaving after 11:00 without prior authorization will be penalized (50% of one night until 3:00 pm and 100% of

host.host_about:
English: 
We are a young, enthusiastic and happy team! 
We are passionate about Barcelona: its people, food, shops, museums, buildings, beaches, markets, shows... We want you to come to Barcelona and enjoy your experience to the fullest. Therefore, we will be happy to guide you, recommend you our favorite spots and help you in whatever you need.  We're waiting for you :)!

Español: 
¡Somos un equipo joven, entusiasta y feliz! 
Barcelona nos apasiona: su gente, gastronomía, tiendas, museos, edificios, playas, mercados, espectáculos... Queremos que vengas a Barcelona y disfrutes tu experiencia al máximo. Por ello, estaremos encantados de orientarte, recomendarte nuestros rincones favoritos y ayudarte en lo que necesites. ¡Te estamos esperando:)!

name: Superhost* Elegant Ocean View Waikiki Ilikai Hotel
summary: This 8th Floor Ocean View Apartment is an elegant, fully furnished home away from home. Spacious balcony (120 sq) and 500 sq interior. This apartment is on the lagoon/ocean side with great views. Conveniently located in Waikiki.
space: The view is amazing, as you can see a clear view of the ocean from the bed! Waikiki beach is a step away. There's alot of things to do including: tourist activities, Ala Moana Shopping Center is a 10min walk away, ABC mini mart or Food Pantry is about 6min walk away for groceries. Very convenient location. Any questions about this listing please do not hesitate to ask!
description: This 8th Floor Ocean View Apartment is an elegant, fully furnished home away from home. Spacious balcony (120 sq) and 500 sq interior. This apartment is on the lagoon/ocean side with great views. Conveniently located in Waikiki. The view is amazing, as you can see a clear view of the ocean from the bed! Waikiki beach is a step away. There's alot of things to do including: tourist activities, Ala Moana Shopping Center is a 10min walk away, ABC mini mart or Food Pantry is about 6min walk away for groceries. Very convenient location. Any questions about this listing please do not hesitate to ask! The pool is available for my guests. Though, the beach and the lagoon are amazing alternatives! I may or may not be in town but not to worry, I will be available through texts/phone and will be able to address any concerns promptly. Walking is easy and great to do in Waikiki. Bus system is also readily available only steps in front of the building. CHECK IN-CHECK OUT: I'll do my best to accommoda
notes: CHECK IN-CHECK OUT: I'll do my best to accommodate check in and check out times outside of normal times but those can be very hard to coordinate and can't be guaranteed.  Note: This unit is on the Hilton Hawaiian/Lagoon side. In the evenings, you can hear and see from a distance the show and singing across the street. This can be more fun than annoying but just wanted to mention it. Also, you can see the fireworks every Friday very close from the balcony (it's quite close and can be loud). PARKING: Valet parking that is part of the Ilikai is $28/day or $6/hr. I was told from the front desk there is also parking in the back of the building for $1/hr. I also may be able to get a pass for $18/day but it's not guaranteed.
transit: Walking is easy and great to do in Waikiki. Bus system is also readily available only steps in front of the building.
access: The pool is available for my guests. Though, the beach and the lagoon are amazing alternatives!
interaction: I may or may not be in town but not to worry, I will be available through texts/phone and will be able to address any concerns promptly.
house_rules: Please be respectful of the unit and everything that is included. Some items have been upgraded to allow for a nicer experience but using with care is to be expected. No smoking inside and out on the balcony, please! Thanks!

host.host_about:
A big nerd with a bit of edge. 
Self-Development Junky. Healthcare Professional. Artist. Entrepreneur. 

I get alot of joy from interacting and getting to know my guests. I'm honored to be a part of their Hawaii experience and I want it to be a life-long memory. 

The interactions here are important to me and therefore I am selective with who I allow into my space. To me, this is more than hosting. I have been so grateful for all the great connections and lovely feedback I have been receiving and it fuels me in all parts of my life. Because of that, my guests have made all the difference.

reviews.comments: Annie was very welcoming and helpful from the very start of my booking process. Within an hour of my reservation she had contacted me and began asking what she could do to make my stay pleasant, she even asked me how many rolls of TP I needed! Annie asked me if I knew the area very well and if she could give me any pointers on food etc. The property was exactly as advertised and the view was even better than I expected, esp. for the Friday night fireworks at the Hilton. The large patio was wonderful and unit itself exceeded my expectations. I have to comment on the bed, so soft and wonderful with a view of the pacific ocean! Thank you Annie!

Annie was an amazing host! We arrived to fresh local flowers, fruit..and a nice bottle of wine! It was incredible. The unit was just as she described it, there were no surprises! She made sure it was very clean and even thought to include beach towels, extra toilet paper and paper towels, sheets etc. Great unit in a prime location.

From my very first enquiry, Annie was kind, helpful and enthusiastic about hosting my daughter and I. She had lots of good advice and was very attentive regrading any concerns or questions. Annie was always available with quick responses to our inquiries. I have never enjoyed staying somewhere as much as this and Annie has everything to do with that!

We loved our stay at Annie's place! The apartment was perfect. A beautiful view of the lagoon and beach! The fireworks on Friday night were amazing! The apartment had everything that you needed- the bed was super comfy, aircon was cold, internet worked well, full supply of towels and toiletries... We didn't want to leave! Getting in and out of the apartment was super easy and it was close to everything. Annie was really easy to communicate with and full of helpful information on the best restaurants and shopping! 10/10! A+

We absolutely LOVED staying at Annie's apartment.
It was even better than we could have imagined. The apartment was modern and clean with everything you could possibly need, even stocked with fresh fruit, bottled water and a bottle of Moscato as a welcome!!
The view from the balcony was incredible, straight out of the lagoon and ocean. We were lucky enough to arrive on a Friday afternoon and see the fireworks, perfect view from the balcony!
Annie's communication was absolutely wonderful - she touched base with us a week out from arrival and then the day before with a very detailed message on everything we needed to know about the apartment itself as well as nearby restaurants etc which was very helpful!
We can't wait to come back as we will definitely try and stay there again, it was perfect for us!
Thanks Annie :)

Annie's accommodations were impeccable. After a long flight we were starving and surprised to find some fruit and water to snack on upon check in! The room was clean and had everything needed to make our vacation memorable and stress free. She checked in throughout the trip to make sure everything was ok. I would highly recommend Annie's condo!

This was my first experience with AirBnb and Annie was a fantastic host. She responded to my messages very quickly and she was always so friendly. When we arrived to our room there were fresh fruits, wine, and box of delicious cookies! The room was clean and just amazing. It exceeded our expectations. There were an abundance of fresh towels, soap, shampoo. The kitchen had a nice big fridge with complimentary water. We had cooking supplies and cleaning supplies. The bed was sooo comfy! The view from the balcony was simply wonderful and on Friday night we had a front row seat to the firework show. The location is great. We were close to many restaurants and shops. There is a big mall called Ala Moana mall that is about 10 minutes walking distance. Also if you are into sushi there is a great sushi carry out restaurant called Aloha Sushi that was so yummy! The price was good too! I could go on for days about how pleasant our experience was. We will only have good memories of Hawaii and we would not have been able to do so with the help and hospitality of Annie. I hope this room is available the next time we travel to Hawaii. If you choose this room you will NOT be disappointed I promise you. Thank you so much Annie!!!!!

Annie was a wonderful host. She did everything she could to make me feel comfortable. Her place is beautiful and has a wonderful view of the beach! The bed was so cozy and comfortable. She was very easy to get in contact with and emailed me with places to eat and things to see while I was in Hawaii. Her personal touches were so sweet too. She left bottled water, fruit and yummy Hawaiian cookies for me in the room as well as nice soaps and shampoo. I really appreciated that after a long day at the conference that I attended. I would recommend Annie's place for a nice and comfortable stay in Honolulu!

Everything about my stay at Annie's unit was perfect! Annie was quick to respond to every question and concern I had and was a very attentive host. She left waters in the fridge and some fruit which my boyfriend loved. The unit itself was just as described if not better. There were plenty of fresh towels, beach towels, snorkeling gear, and the view from the balcony was beautiful. My boyfriend I were lucky enough to be in the unit when the fireworks went off on the beach giving us front and center entertainment.The bed itself was comfortable and the air conditioning in the unit worked like a charm--a dream when dealing with the humidity. I will be returning to Hawaii in March and am already hoping to be able to book my stay with Annie again. Would recommend Annie to anyone wishing to stay in Waikiki while visiting Hawaii. Thank you so much Annie!!

What a great find. The unit was better than expected or described. Annie had the unit spotless, furnished very comfortably and even had soap, shampoo and fruit for us. The location is great and it had a nice view. Will try to stay here again in the future.

We stayed at this apartment over Christmas 2016.  The set up of the apartment is great - sea views from a spacious balcony, full kitchen facilities etc.  The air con worked perfectly and the bed was comfortable.  Annie provided yummy cookies, water and fruit on our arrival which was great after a long flight.

We did have an issue when we first arrived with the cleanliness of the apartment - there was a thin layer of dust over most surfaces (this can be explained by a building site under the hotel so difficult to avoid), and certain areas, e.g. lamps, light fixings, ventilation grills, photo frames etc were quite dusty.  Annie rectified this by sending the cleaner around immediately for which we were grateful.  Don't get me wrong, the 'important' areas e.g. kitchen counters, fridge, bathroom, bed linen were spotless.

The Ilikai itself is centrally located and has all the amenities nearby - food , drink, entertainment, beach etc.  Sounds obvious, but just ensure your expectations are set accordingly - this is a condo in an apartment block, not a brand new 5* hotel with all the amenities, services and facilities (and cost!) that go along with it - if you do that I think you'll have an enjoyable experience from the outset.

Annie is great as a host - really helpful before hand and while we were staying at her place.  Definitely a significant positive point.

Our experience with Annie was flawless and easy and her place was absolutely incredible. Communication was open and instant and she went our of her way to accomodate us. Her extraordinary hospitality made our first trip to Hawaii that much more memorable and enjoyable. Waking up to the sights and sounds of the waves and sun was incredible from the lanai. And you cannot beat the location - West Waikiki is the place to be. Mahalo, Annie!!! We will be back.

Annie was an excellent host. She left fruit and cookies as a welcome gift which was nice because we were starving once we landed. Annie checked in a couple times to make sure we were enjoying our time, had what we needed and even gave some suggestions on places to go and things to do. She also gave us our space and made sure not to be intrusive.

Annie was extremely accommodating and welcoming. You can tell that she really strives to be a super host. Her studio is conveniently located (right next to lagoon and beach), well-furnished, and very clean. The view is amazing, bed is more than comfortable for two, balcony is great to relax on, and AC worked really well. She also provided high-end toiletries, snorkel gear, snacks, water, and extra towels. It was easy to communicate with Annie before, during, and after our stay. Can't wait to visit Waikiki again and look forward to staying with Annie again!

Annie was fabulous- from before we got there to during our stay Annie's main aim was to ensure we had the most amazing trip- which we did. There was fruit and cookies in the apartment which was amazing after a long flight. There were plenty of towels and even snorkelling gear for our use. The view was way better than what the photos can represent. We would definently stay at Annie's apartment again!!!

Annie was one of the best bnb hosts we've had in 4 years and dozens of places.  Her apartment was even better than advertised, and we will definitely come back. She provided just the right amount of information and ideas, and a was pleasure to communicate with. Thanks Annie!!

Our trip was busy with a packed schedule, but it was great knowing that we had such a wonderful place to call home base.  
Annie's studio was an oasis in paradise.  The spirit of Aloha was definitely felt throughout our trip.  Annie left the most thoughtful touches at her place for our convenience and was readily available if we needed anything.  She also checked in on us to make sure we had everything we needed.  Very attentive!  Oh and the products she left for us very high quality, not your typical hotel type toiletries.  
Having been famished from our travels it was a welcome sight to see the fruits and snacks she left for us to enjoy.  
The view from her balcony was great, we could see the ocean and the pool while enjoying our morning breakfast.  In the afternoon and evening we could see if pool was busy or not from our room.  It was so convenient!  
Parking in all of Waikiki is cumbersome but there is valet parking that is $28.00 per day, self parking garage next door which was $20.00 per day, and around the marina it was a $1.00 per hour.  
We will definitely stay at Annie's place on our next visits.  Quality, convenience, cleanliness and amenities were top notch for our stay.

Great location.  Comfortable condo with everything you need at hand. Annie was very accommodating to our needs and extremely easy to communicate with.   
Thank you Annie,  hope to visit again.

We absolutely LOVED the room.  Honestly liked it more than being outside at times!!  So clean, updated, cozy and comfortable.  Annie was so helpful and answered any questions we had right away.  So nice to be able to stay in a home rather than a hotel room.  Would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a great view from a comfy bed or balcony!

Our experience with Annie has been absolutely wonderful. I was wary of using Airbnb a second time after an unfortunate first experience using the platform. However after working with Annie and the customer support for Airbnb, I have a renowned confidence in using Airbnb in the future. She is a top notch host professional, courteous and very responsive. The room was very spacious, clean, and felt very welcoming the second I walk in. I highly recommend Annie as a host, I'm certain she will take care of you. :)

Great stay, top airbnb listing! 

Annie was very helpful, Annie left us fresh fruit, drinks and biscuits for our arrival.

The apartment was very clean and tidy.

Located about half way between the Ala Moana and Waikiki CBD.

HIGHLY recommend this Airbnb listing!

5 stars for our stay in Annie's apartment. Superb location, great ocean views, apartment spacious, clean and well presented with a very comfortable kingsize bed. Annie personalised our experience with welcoming treats and communication for all our needs was excellent. If we ever return to Honolulu we will be staying at Annie's place again.

Annie's place was awesome and just as like the pictures. The location was fantastic being so close to the beach and within walking distance of Ala Moana Mall and Ala Moana Park where we watched the 4th of July fireworks. We really appreciated that Annie provided us in advance local info on where to shop and eat. Last but not least were the little touches that is often missed even in top hotels such as the luxurious amenities, yummy cookies and fruit. Thank you Annie for being a great host. we'll definitely come back to stay on our next trip to Hawaii.

Annie's apartment is amazing. It has a stunning view, which the photos don't do justice to! It's located in a great spot slightly away from the main shopping strip but just s short walk away. It's quiet at night, the bed is beyond comfortable and the entire apartment is beautifully appointed. 
Annie is honestly the best host I've dealt with in my years using Airbnb- she was extremely fast to answer my emails, she made my arrival way, the apartment was extremely clean and she even left me some fruit, bottled water, cookies and beautiful toiletries too.
I will definitely stay at this apartment again when I head back to Waikiki in the future.
Thanks again so much Annie!

The room was everything as expected and if anything more. Upon arrival there were even chocolates and a bottle of wine, which was a lovely gesture. There is heaps of space, the bed is comfortable, the view is fantastic and all in all it is great walking distance to different attractions. Would definitely recommend staying at this room, you won't be dissapointed.
Annie was a terrific host, her place was better than advertised and the the extra touches made everything feel as if we were at home! Could not have been more happy.

Annie was the absolute best Airbnb host, hands down! She is always there to answer any questions you may have and was extremely helpful. Check in/out was a breeze. Annie's place is just as described...and the view...spectacular! Awesome size and very clean:) The location of this unit was fabulous! It is right across from the Waikiki beach and only a short walk to an amazing shopping strip with all the best restaurants. If you head down the beach a short ways there is a great place to rent paddle boards, beach umbrellas/chairs, and other equipment. We were fortunate enough to spend almost a whole day out paddle boarding with sea turtles EVERYWHERE. I can't say enough positive things about Annie and her place...she makes you feel incredibly welcome! Thank you so much and we will definitely be back.

Annie is a fantastic host. Her little details, like the wine and goodies to snack on take her place to another level. The view of the lagoon is beautiful, however we found the walk to the beach not as convenient as we thought. The building itself is at the beginning of the Waikiki stretch, we felt it was a little bit out of the action, it is nice because it's quieter, but we found it a little bit of a hassle to get to the other side of the strip on a daily basis. Overall, Annie is what makes this place somewhere we would want to come back to! She's attentive and gives so many helpful hints and checkins. A great place to stay.

No doubt, Annie must be one of the best Airbnb hosts: Incredibly helpful, very responsive and a wonderful person. Impressive!
The condo is in perfect condition and very beautiful. Furthermore, the location is perfect to discover Honolulu.
Our best AirBnB-expirience so far. Thank you, Annie!
Annie was a really considerate host. she kept in contact and even left a lovely surprise for us.  The location was perfect for Friday night fireworks.

Annie was awesome and went out of her way to make me feel comfortable during my five night stay. Annie's place was in a fantastic location and was just a short walk to the heart of Waikiki beach. The condo itself had pretty much anything you would need. I would definitely stay again!!

Annie is extremely easy to work with, quick to respond and flexible.  She provide great information and a welcome bottle of wine!  The condo is exactly as described and in a great location with a great view.  It was clean, pleasant and well taken care of.  I will definitely stay here again on my next trip.

What an amazing host and perfect location we chose for our holiday in Waikiki. 

My now husband and I came to Hawaii for our wedding with a multitude of tasks on our plate and little time to actually relax (wedding day excepted, hehe). Annie went above and beyond in ensuring we had all we needed and was always ready to answer any questions we had. Extremely helpful, approachable, and friendly, we’ve been blown away by her generosity.

The apartment itself was very comfortable with all the facilities you could need, a bed that felt like you were sleeping on clouds, and a beautiful view of the ocean. Located right on the western edge of Waikiki beach, it was easy walking access to the surf, shops, and town centre. The bar/restaurant in the Ilikai courtyard, Cinnamon’s, was a regular meeting place for us with our wedding guests and full of friendly staff, a relaxed atmosphere, and well priced drinks.

If you’re looking for a quiet, relaxing holiday, Waikiki Beach is probably not your go to as it is a city, but for us with all our guests and arranging multiple events it was perfect and can’t wait to return again!

Thank you soooo much again, Annie, for everything! You seriously helped eliminate any and all stress that could potentially occur with accommodation (and wedding planning!) and helped make our stay a most enjoyable one :)

Annie is a very prompt host that takes pride in her condo. The place was just as described and exceeded my expectations. Conveniently located and she also left some snacks and drinks which made it feel like I was staying at a resort. Steps from the wikiki beach and restaurants, clubs/bars. Will definitely stay again!

Annie is such a wonderful host.  Her communication in the lead up to our trip and in the initial days after our arrival was excellent.  Annie made sure that we had all of the information, not only about the apartment, but about the local area to make our arrival as comfortable as possible. Once she knew we had settled in, she went on "quiet mode".  
The apartment is just as described and the location is ideal.  The pictures of the view to the lagoon and Waikiki are EXACTLY what you get.  You can even see the beach from the bed.  Speaking of the bed, it is probably the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in.  
I would (and have already) recommend this place to anyone travelling to Honolulu.  We will most definitely be back.

Annie provided very clear check-in information and we arrived to a beautifully clean apartment as described. There was also some wonderful surprise gifts that made us feel very welcome. Annie was a wonderful and attentive host.
Annie was a great host

Our experience at Annie's apartment couldn't have been any better! She was extremely helpful in her communication before we arrived -- letting us know what to expect and what nearby activities we have to look forward to. The apartment itself was perfect for two people. Everything was very clean, the bed was really comfortable, and the patio view of Waikiki beach was the best part! Annie also had fruit, snacks and a couple beers waiting for us in the fridge. This was easily one of the best Airbnb experiences I've had.

Annie keeps incredibly good communication and held our hand throughout the process. 

Her listing was exactly what she stated and the area was close to all major areas in walking distance.

First time in Hawaii and glad we decided to stay with Annie. The condo is located in the Ilikai building with a serene ocean view. Perfect spot to watch the Hilton fireworks on a Friday night. Getting around Waikiki from here is easy - most trolleys and buses stop in front of the Ilikai.
Annie was a wonderful hostess. Prompt communication and seamless checkin process. Very comfortable stay and wouldn't hesitate to come back!

It is the best moment to make a few days of Waikiki. 
All the facilities and locations are exactly the same as description of the host. 
And indeed the unit you face must be more than that!!!
On the first night of the long flight, You can see the super fantastic night view.
And You will see the scenery of heaven at the beautiful Lanai in the morning.
Everything you want is prepared in this unit. Everything is really ready.
The host Annie provides useful information about the lives of Hawaiian. You get a nicer local friend and mentor than anyone else^^
If there is any inconvenience, please request immediately. It will be resolved immediately.
It is hard to believe,but this is the real review of my first trip to Hawaii.
I always want to use this unit in my trip to Hawaii. And I will recommend my friends who are planning to travel to Hawaii.
Are you planning to travel to Hawaii? Don't doubt anything. 
All that is beyond imagination.
Loved Annie's condo.  The stay was perfect, the location, the bed was super comfortable, A/C blew super cold.  Annie was a pleasure to work with as well.  She was a total sweetheart.

My husband and I had a wonderful stay here. The apartment itself is very nice- the views are unbeatable and we were even able to catch the Friday night fireworks display! The apartment is nicely decorated and furnished, with a super comfy bed and sofa (we slept so well), and also flat screen tv with cable. In addition, the kitchen was well stocked and the appliances were new and updated. Check in and out were a breeze with Annie- she is an amazing host and we would love to stay at her place again if we are back again in Oahu. Not only was Annie super responsive when we were there and had questions, she also put nice welcoming touches when we arrived (snacks and drinks). We were truly impressed by our stay!

아침마다 예쁜 라군과 바다를 볼 수 있어서 정말 좋았어요. 편안했던 침대와 이불은 여행 의 피곤함을 사라지게 해주었어요. 금요일밤의 불꽃놀이는 환상적! 호스트 Annie 가 금요일날 메세지 보내줘서 잊지않고 볼 수 있었죠. 호스트 Annie 는 정말 사려깊고 친절합니다. 예약문의부터 체크아웃때까지 빠른 응답과 친절은 큰 장점이에요. 또 체크인시 간식과 냉장고 속 과일과 물은 매우 유용했습니다. Annie 센스는 최고! 다음에도 다시 가고 싶은 곳입니다.

This was my second stay at Annie's apartment in Waikiki, and it remains as impressive as it was the first time i visited.
The view is absolutely breathtaking and the location is perfect - a little away from the hustle and bustle but still an easy walking distance into the centre of the city, also an easy walk to the Ala Moana.
The apartment is beautiful and well equipped with everything you need.
It's also extremely clean and tidy. 
Access is simple and Annie really goes the extra mile to make sure your trip is enjoyable - she's easy to contact and always happy to provide any assistance or answer any questions.
I would recommend this apartment to anyone travelling alone or as a couple, it's fantastic.

5 stars. We fully enjoyed our stay at Annie's place. 
Annie was super helpful from the time we booked till the end of our stay, even going above and beyond helping us in our last minute hurdles.

Thanks a lot Annie.

Great place and the Annie is terrific. 
The location is wonderful, close the beach and with beautiful balcony. It is also within walking distance to the Hawaii convention center. 

Annie is very kind and offers a lot of helps promptly. I would recommend 100%.

Annie's place is AMAZING, I can't say enough good things. 

Views: the views from the balcony are incredibly; ocean, and bay as well as Friday night fireworks and daily sneak peak at Hilton luau. 

Accommodations: 
First off and most important to me NO BUGS! I always worry about bed bugs ans other unwelcome pets but Annies place was 100% bug free. In addition to that the home is well appointed and VERY comfortable, absolutely perfect for the two of us. The kitchen was well appointed will all we needed for prepare our own meals for the days we opted to do so.  The dark out shades made sleeping in very easy. 

Extra touches: It was nice Annie has snorkels and other beach goods available. A welcome fruit basket and water was a sweet surprise.  

The Location: Ideal, we opted to try this trip without a car, no problem. Uber/Lift from airport (which Annie provided discount codes for) Walked to Walmart, future target, the mall and Diamond Headmall. Tons of food right out side. View of ocean and Hilton bay from the bed and balcony.

The host: Amazing host very communicative but not intrusive. Provided very clear check-in instructions, as well as a handy list list of local eats and other info. 
Offered late check out which which gave us basically another whole  day on the beach. Very quick responses.

The short of it, we highly recommend  Annie's place.

Great location, easy walk to Alamoana shops, lagoon, beach and many options for eating close by. Cab ride to Waikiki under $10. Great view from apartment looking across lagoon to beach and great view of fireworks each Friday night. Snacks and toiletries supplied by Annie a welcome treat.

I don't usually leave one-sided reviews... I think they're unbalanced. However, with Annie and her unit, there's literally nothing I can say that isn't a glowing endorsement. Annie herself is the epitome of a gracious host....there's nothing she won't do to ensure your stay is perfect. From arranging an airport pickup, to renting out her personal auto (which is a beautiful Lexus SUV you can rent via Turo), to securing a parking garage spot just steps from the unit, our stay was logistically superior and on par with a 5-star hotel. The unit itself is pristine. The decor is upscale, plush hotel-quality towels, designer toiletries, a fully appointed kitchen with complimentary local snacks, gorgeous ocean views, and...oh my, the BED. My husband and I absolutely love the bed. After a long flight from Philadelphia, arriving at Annie's felt like home and a much-needed respite from the business of surrounding Waikiki. Comfortable, extremely clean, design-centric, phenomenal location. Five stars for Annie and her awesome AirBnb.

The Place:  very nice place in good location (ocean view from balcony, only minutes waling to beach) very quiet when I stayed which was very good as its next-door neighbor, Hilton Hawaiian Village, is very busy and quite noisy, particularly those on lower floors (I know as I stayed there last December).  Furthermore, the price for this place is much lower compared to its neighbors (Hilton Hawaiian, the Modern, the Prince)

The Host:  Annie is very nice.  I had some trouble with the faucet in the bathroom.  She promptly came, and worked hard to get a handyman to fix it for me.

In summary, this was my first time with Airbnb.  I am happy that I used them.  I like the place and the host.  I enjoyed my time there, and will come again next time.

This was my 1st time ever using Airbnb, so I was very iffy about booking with it. I emailed Annie about how it works and next thing you know i was signed up for a 6 night stay. 
Annie is a great host. She replies very fast to messages and is very easy to communicate with. This spot is perfect for anyone to come down and have fun. Literally 5 min walk down to the beach and 3 mins to the Hilton Lagoon.  The bed was extremely cumfy too. 
Many fun things to do nearby all walking distance. Definitely gonna be staying here again on my next trip
Thank you

This apartment is just as described and even better once you get there. From the ocean view on the porch to easy access to the beach and pool, this place has it all. Everything was very clean and just as described. Annie is the best host I have had on AirBNB to date. She is very accommodating and extremely responsive to all emails and communication. I highly recommend Annie and her apartment for anyone who is visiting Waikiki. You can't beat the price and the location of this place. We will definitely be seeking this place out again when we make a return trip.

Excellent experience all round!  The apartment is great, clean and has everything you need.  Very comfy king size bed, good kitchen and bathroom, great balcony with both relaxing chairs and also a small table and chairs.  The location is perfectly located for Waikiki's attractions.  The Lagoon is on your doorstep, Ala Moana is a quick 10min walk, the main Kalakaua Ave shopping strip is about the same, Enterprise car rental across the road, etc etc.  We were lucky enough to have fireworks 3 times in one week (!!) and the view from the balcony is fantastic, the fireworks are right in front of you!!  Finally Annie (the host) is terrific with fast communication with tips and easy clear instructions for checking in and out (super easy).  Would both highly recommend and use again!! Thanks!!

Our expectations were already high given the massive amount of positive reviews for this place. When we arrived, our expectations were easily surpassed. The location of this AirBnB simply cannot be beat. It's centrally located enough to walk along the beach down to Waikiki or up to Ala Moana for food/shopping. Our favorite acai bowl place (Tropical Tribe) is also right across the street which made breakfast really easy. Access to other places is easily done with a car rental or Uber. The balcony has a great view of the beach and also let us enjoy the evening Hilton luau shows every night.

The space itself was delightful and perfect for a traveling couple. It was well appointed and had everything we needed for some light cooking and snacking. 

Annie was so incredibly hospitable and responsive and really set a new bar for us in terms of AirBnB hosts. Annie, Thank you for making our trip so incredible!

Simply amazing! Annie's place was exactly as described in both pictures and words. This Airbnb came as a recommendation from a friend of mine, and I could not be more happy with the level of service, attention and thought that Annie provided us with during our stay. I would highly recommend this place to all friends and family. Truly a gem, in a great location close to the main Waikiki strip and also Ala Moana!
Annie is the best host you could ask for. She made our stay absolutely amazing. You really can't ask for a better host or a better location.

Annie is a kind and thoughtful host. She was quick to respond to my questions and at times took the initiative to check in on us throughout our stay. She truly cares that her guests have an enjoyable time while visiting Waikiki. We couldn’t be happier with our experience working with Annie and staying in her condo. We would stay here again if we visit Waikiki. Thank you Annie!
A great value and perfect staycation spot! I highly recommend this gem!!

Annie’s place was awesome! Booked it last minute to see the fireworks show and she was upfront in telling me I wouldn’t be able to see it. It was ok because I joined other guests downstairs where we gathered and watched the show. She added very special touches - a sort of welcome basket along with water in the fridge. She responded quickly to my questions and was always friendly and polite to talk to. Her place was nicely designed and conveniently located. I hope to stay there again in the future!

This was our second stay at the apartment - 10/10, A++.

The apartment was very clean, stylish/modern and host Annie was easily contactable and fast to respond.

The apartment is located at the Ilikai Hotel on Ala Moana Blvd. The complex has two great pools (1 pool is relatively brand new). The apartment is located next to the Hilton Hawaiian Village and only a 5 minute walk to the Ala Moana Shopping Centre - in terms of locations, it is situated in a prime position. 

My wife and I highly recommend staying at this apartment.

A beautiful studio apartment with a nice view of Waikiki beach. It was nice to find a chilled bottle of water in the fridge along with some complimentary snacks. 

The fact that the kitchen is fully equipped and there are alot of necessary spices was great, we added some ourselves :)

We didn’t meet Annie but she was always helpful and responsive in few minutes.

Hurricane lane was crossing Hawaii in our last 2 nights stay but that was not anyone’s fault.
The balcony view is unreal! We had a great time!
As great as pictured! Loved our view great location. 2 pools and beach were all visited. Would definitely recommend and would stay there again.

Annie proves what a super host should be - honest, sincere, responsive. She was truly a pleasure. Very easy to talk to and always willing to help and offer ideas. I really appreciated how quick she was to respond to my questions. That’s huge from a customer’s perspective.
Her place was clean and bug-free. It is a good amount of space for two people. 
The view was the best! It really added such value to the space. We loved sitting out on the balcony in the mornings looking at the lagoon and ocean and all the beautiful palm trees as well as having dinners out there in the evenings enjoying the amazing Honolulu weather. 
The place is in a great location, inside a beautiful hotel. I felt like I was walking into a resort. Hotel has a few restaurants right there and a convenience store downstairs which helped when we needed little things like sunscreen, tylenol, etc. Really fast elevators too (which we appreciated after reading reviews for other air bnbs in Honolulu that had really slow elevators). There is a pool available, although a bit small for the amount of people using it.
The view, the location, and the comfort level that Annie provides is worth the cost.
I would highly recommend!

name: Room for 2- 200m from the beach!
summary: Room for 2 with a bathroom (shared) for rent in a very nice neighborhood, in Barra da Tijuca beach, close to commerce, restaurants, bars and discos. Public transportation to the most tourist places in the city. Great location!
space: Nice apartment in a quiet location, with a big terrace and an awesome view to Pedra da Gavea.  Great bedroom for 2 (bibed) with WiFi, air conditioner and ventilator. There are a private bathroom for guests.
description: Room for 2 with a bathroom (shared) for rent in a very nice neighborhood, in Barra da Tijuca beach, close to commerce, restaurants, bars and discos. Public transportation to the most tourist places in the city. Great location! Nice apartment in a quiet location, with a big terrace and an awesome view to Pedra da Gavea.  Great bedroom for 2 (bibed) with WiFi, air conditioner and ventilator. There are a private bathroom for guests. Guests will have access to all common areas of the house, except for the other rooms. My parents live there and they are very friendly and communicative. They use to travel a lot around the world and they already know Aribnb. They stayed with me in a room from Airbnb and they know exactly how does it works. There are a lot of great restaurants and bars close to the apartment and also some discos.  It's very close to the beach and conveniences in general.  Barra da Tijuca beach is the one of the most beautiful beach in the city and it is not that crowded. You c
neighborhood_overview: There are a lot of great restaurants and bars close to the apartment and also some discos.  It's very close to the beach and conveniences in general.  Barra da Tijuca beach is the one of the most beautiful beach in the city and it is not that crowded. You can do a lot of sports there like kitesurf, windsurf, surf, stand up paddle, volleyball and football.  It has a very friendly neighborhood.
transit: It is close to the public transportation and you can go to the most tourist places.  It has no parking for guests but you can park easily in front of the building and for free.
access: Guests will have access to all common areas of the house, except for the other rooms.
interaction: My parents live there and they are very friendly and communicative. They use to travel a lot around the world and they already know Aribnb. They stayed with me in a room from Airbnb and they know exactly how does it works.
house_rules: It is not allowed to party or invite friends. It is not allowed smoke inside the appartment.

host.host_about:
Hi, I'm Roberta!
I love traveling and I do it whenever I can.
With my husband, parents, friends...always trying to meet people and different places around the world.
I'm from Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. I lived for 3 years in Barcelona, Spain. Since 2015, we're living in Switzerland.

name: Metro, metrobüs, tramvay, otobüs, dolmuş 1 dakika
summary: Şehir merkezinde toplu ulaşıma 1 dakika yürüme mesafesinde ve gezeceğiniz her yere yakın olan bir mesafededir. İki tek kişilik yatak ve eğer arkadaşlarınız ile gelmek isterseniz 4-6 kişiye kadar koltuk ve şişme yataklarda ağırlayabilirim. Sigara Evde içilmesine izin vermiyorum fakat balkonda içmek için yerimiz mevcut. Ses sistemi ve ışıklandırma ile partilere uygundur. Fakat ek ücret gerektirir.
space: Tüm Cafe, restoran ve eğlence merkezine yakındır.
description: Şehir merkezinde toplu ulaşıma 1 dakika yürüme mesafesinde ve gezeceğiniz her yere yakın olan bir mesafededir. İki tek kişilik yatak ve eğer arkadaşlarınız ile gelmek isterseniz 4-6 kişiye kadar koltuk ve şişme yataklarda ağırlayabilirim. name: Sunny penthouse with Parking
summary: The apartment is situated in a tranquil and silent street away from noise in the downtown of Barcelona just a few minutes walking near the conference center of La Fira, Ramblas, the old port, the theaters area and the tapas area of Barcelona.
space: The apartment is located in a new building and its 70m2 distributed in:   • A living room with office kitchen fully equipped   • One double bedroom suite style with its own bathroom with bathtub.   • One double room.   • One single room.   • One bathroom with shower for the double and single room. All the rooms have air conditioning and heating system that will permit you to be fully comfortable. Also there is a PARKING SPACE in the same building WITHOUT ADDITIONAL COST where you will be able to park without worries. The parking space dimensions are 4,70 m x 2,40 m.
description: The apartment is situated in a tranquil and silent street away from noise in the downtown of Barcelona just a few minutes walking near the conference center of La Fira, Ramblas, the old port, the theaters area and the tapas area of Barcelona. The apartment is located in a new building and its 70m2 distributed in:   • A living room with office kitchen fully equipped   • One double bedroom suite style with its own bathroom with bathtub.   • One double room.   • One single room.   • One bathroom with shower for the double and single room. All the rooms have air conditioning and heating system that will permit you to be fully comfortable. Also there is a PARKING SPACE in the same building WITHOUT ADDITIONAL COST where you will be able to park without worries. The parking space dimensions are 4,70 m x 2,40 m. In the apartment you will find:   • High Speed WIFI (Optical Fiber 300 Mb)   • Bed sheets   • Towels   • Hairdryer   • Nespresso coffee machine   • Bathroom amenities   • Everything yo
neighborhood_overview: Near the apartment there are many supermarkets and food stores that open every day. If you don't want to cook, there is a big variety of restaurants where you will be able to go to have meals or tapas. We specially recommend the Tonka bar-restaurant that it's located just in front of the apartment where during weekends they prepare very recommendable brunches.
notes: HUTB (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: Also there are many bus stations and subway station less than 5 minutes walking that will allow you to move for all Barcelona city without problems.
access: In the apartment you will find:   • High Speed WIFI (Optical Fiber 300 Mb)   • Bed sheets   • Towels   • Hairdryer   • Nespresso coffee machine   • Bathroom amenities   • Everything you need for cocking   • Washing machine   • Dry machine   • Iron And if you need something special tell us and we will try to get it.
interaction: When you arrive to the apartment, we will be waiting for you to give you the keys and explain about the apartment the area and Barcelona. For the check-out, we will go to the apartment to take the keys, say Good bye! and help you in anything you need.
house_rules: No es cuestión de hacer una lista de normas y reglas que seguir en el apartamento. Nuestra idea es que te comportes en el apartamento como lo harías en tu propia casa respetando el resto de vecinos, y la convivencia y descanso del resto de personas del edificio. No está permitido fumar.

host.host_about:
Hi! We are Alex, Javi and Pilar and we love to travel and meet people. We would like to meet a lot of people from all around the world and achieve that you will have a wonderful days in Barcelona.

Hola! Somos Alex, Javi y Pilar y nos encanta viajar y conocer gente. Esperamos poder conocer mucha gente de todo el mundo y conseguir que tengas unos días de vacaciones maravillosas en Barcelona.

reviews.comments:
Superbe accueil de Pilar, appartement très bien équipé ( lave vaisselle, lave linge, seiche linge, climatisation dans toutes les pièces).
Les serviettes de bain et les produits de toilette sont fournis.
Il y'a également des boissons, gâteaux en cadeaux de bienvenue. :)
L'appartement est également bien situé, pas loin des Ramblas; tous les commerces sont à proximité.
L'appartement est très propre, et très fonctionnel.
A recommander absolument

We really enjoyed our stay in Barcelona: the flat is fully equipped, functional, clean and true to the photos. And having access to the parking is definitely a plus! It is well located, in the centre and in walking distance from the attractions. Alex, Javi and Pilar are lovely hosts, ready to help and easy to communicate with. We recommend!
Very nice apartment fully in line with the description. We enjoyed very much our stay and the contact with the host was very good. I strongly recommend it.

1ère expérience avec air bnb: succès intégral! Super appart, excellente situation et surtout le parking. Alex répond très très vite aux messages. Je recommande! 
First experience with airbnb: great for the appartement, the location and  the parking. Alex answers very quickly. Go without any doubt!

We flew in from Ryan air, and took the public bus to Barcalona, then a taxi (only 8euro) to the apartment where Alex was waiting for us. He was friendly, and spoke english well. They had water, beer and chips chilled and waiting for us. A very nice touch after traveling. The apartment was exactly as advertised; one of the better we've stayed at from airbnb. 

The apartment is about a 20 minute walk to the beach.

Logement agréable et coquet.
Très bien situé.
confortable, rue calme.
Proche de la vieille ville, Rambla et port.
Hôte charmant, disponible et arrangeant.
Séjour formidable en partie dû à nos hôtes .

Il quartiere non è pericoloso si può girare tranquillamente a piedi di notte xchè ben illuminato e abbastanza frequentato a tutte le ore. é centrale (dista 10 minuti a piedi dalla Rambla) e fornito di trasporto pubblico, supermarket e negozi di ogni genere.

Nulla da eccepire in tema di accoglienza,
Pilar ci ha atteso anche oltre l'orario che avevamo fissato, ci ha lasciato 2 mazzi di chiavi, è salita con noi e ci ha illustrato dettagliatamente l'appartamento e il funzionamento degli elettrodomestici (c'è di tutto) la cucina è ben fornita di stoviglie e posate per almeno 10 persone.
Gli interni e l'arredamento sono nuovi e ben tenuti.

Una delle 2 camere con letto matrimoniale è piccola ma se si usa solo per dormire non da noia. 
I bagni sono senza finestra ma c'è l'aspiratore.
L'unico problemino che abbiamo ravvisato è che di sera, con l'aria condizionata accesa oltre a diverse luci, ogni tanto salta la corrente che bisogna sistematicamente riattaccare dal quadro che è dietro la porta d'ingresso.

In generale la sistemazione è davvero una buona scelta: lo consiglierei.
Fabrizio

Nous avons passé 4 jours dans cet appartement, et le séjour a été très agréable. Nous n'avons pas rencontré les propriétaires directement, mais tout a été fait pour que nous soyons accueillis à l'heure d'arrivée par une amie à eux, des bières nous attendaient dans le frigo, une chaise pour bébé a été mise à notre disposition... L'appartement est grand, spacieux, conforme à la description du site et aux photos. 
La cuisine est très fonctionnelle, bien équipée. Il y a deux salles de bain, une avec douche et une avec baignoire. 
il est très bien situé, deux métros à proximité, la plage est à 20 min en bus, le réseau bus est très pratique aussi pour se rendre partout dans Barcelone. Les remblas sont à 20 min à pied; 

Enfin, la place de parking dans l'immeuble est un véritable plus, pour y aller sa voiture le temps du séjour!
Bref, nous recommandons cet appartement, dans lequel nous avons passé un très agréable séjour!
The Sunny penthouse was amazing. Great location, very clean and very comfortable. Pilar checked us in and was very nice to show us around. Very recommended for future travellers to Barcelona.

Alex met us at the apartment and let us into the free underground carpark. He kindly showed us around the apartment, including descriptions on how to use appliances, air-con and wi-fi. He also left us a map and advised on nearby supermarkets and metro stations. The apartment is less than 5 minutes walk from 2 different metro lines and was clean and quite expansive. Perfect for a couple or small family. Would stay there again!

La experiencia ha sido muy buena, era la primera vez que usaba airbnb y sin duda volveré a utilizarlo. 
La casa está muy bien situada cerca de varios metros y del centro en si, de hecho en nuestro caso pudimos llegar a todos los sitios andando. Como pone en el anuncio es un ático muy luminoso.
Pilar fue muy amable, y nos indicó como movernos por la zona, aparte de dejarnos en el frigorífico refrescos, cervezas y leche (un básico después de un viaje largo).
Recomendaría este apto. sin dudarlo y sobre todo por la ventaja que es tener aparcamiento en el edificio, gracias a eso nos pudimos olvidar del coche.
El trato perfecto por parte de los anfitriones, el apartamento esta muy bien situado. Yodo muy limpio y muy correcto.
The apartment was lovely and everything was perfect. Highly recommend!

Expérience très positive: Alex, Javi et Pilar sont très disponibles et réactifs, tout a été extrêmement simple: Pilar nous attendait en bas de l'immeuble, nous à indiqué la place de Parking (fermé): un atout considérable dans Barcelone!
Très bien situé.

Merci beaucoup à vous 3, nous recommandons vivement votre appartement pour un séjour en famille !

Pour une première expérience avec Airbnb, ce fut un véritable succès. 
Appartement conforme à la description, très bien situé, très propre et calme. Produits de premières nécessité mis à disposition (Petit plus très appréciés: boissons fraiches et café Nespresso généreusement offerts!!!!). Hôtes très accueillant et répondant à toutes nos attentes. Nombreux conseils fournis dés notre arrivée pour optimiser la découverte de cette merveille ville!
Merci beaucoup Pilar, Alex et Javi pour les bons moments que nous avons passés. A très bientôt.
Very nice family and perfect welcoming! The flat is well placed and very clean. Everything is in place for a pleasant stay!
Una muy buena estancia, todo listo, todo en su sitio. Anfitriones muy majos y atentos!

Une très bon contact avec Javi et Alex avant d'arriver puis un super accueil de Pilar, que demander de plus! Tout était prévu à notre arrivé pour nous sentir comme à la maison. On vous remercie pour les conseils, grâce à vous on à passé un très bon séjour à Barcelone.

L'appartement est très très bien équipé et surtout très bien placé! Le parking est un gros plus.

Encore une foi merci à vous 3 c'était un excellent séjour.

Los anfitriones estuvieron perfectos.
Detallistas 100%
Barrio tranquilo. La casa genial, con todo tipo de detalles.
Ideal para visitar tranquilamente Barcelona. Metro cercano.
Gracias a Alex y su familia.

El apartamento es muy bonito, está muy bien situado y se puede ir caminando al centro pero también dispone de plaza de garaje gratuita si vas con coche. Los anfitriones encantadores, nos dejaron café, bebidas y algo de comer para la llegada y el piso tenia todos los detalles, todas las cosas necesarias del baño, de la cocina. Un piso para repetir! Muchas gracias!

Our experience dealing with Alex, Javi and Pilar was fantastic. They were waiting for us at the apartment when we arrived. The apartment was exactly as advertised.  It was clean, roomy, fully stocked and in a great area. The fridge was filled with beer, soft drinks, champagne, water and milk.  They also left cookies and snacks.  The espresso machine made great coffee.  Alex, Javi and Pilar were very accommodating and checked up on us a few times to be sure everything was OK.  If you are looking for an apartment to rent in Barcelona I would definitely recommend this one.
Все было замечательно, очень гостеприимные и радушные хозяева, общение с которыми заряжает позитивом и улыбками :)

Nice and clean!
Lot of light,
quiet area.

Friendly welcome!

This was excellent experience. Very clean and well equipped apartment (dish washer, washer, drier). Alex and Javi were waiting for us upon arrival and were gracious to give a lift to the airport on their way to work. The building has an elevator(lift). It is located a walking distance to both Espanya and Drassanes Squares. Subway and grocery/produce shops are just around the corner.

Alex and Pilar, you were wonderful and kind hosts. Your home is welcoming, neat, and perfectly furnished. My father particularly enjoyed the orange juice and Cokes that you had provided in the fridge. You guided us well so we were able to enjoy the sights of Barcelona with ease. Thank you again...I will always remember your hospitality.

Un grand merci à nos hôtes pour leur accueil formidable! Nous avons découvert ce très tres chouette appartement, superbement équipé, tout confort, et tres joliment décoré!
Tres bien situé, avec toutes les commodités à proximité,il nous a permis de bien profiter de la ville...
Merci, merci ,merci!

We were welcomed to the building by Pilar who carefully guided us into the reserved parking spot and showed us the apartment. She also gave us a map and circled everywhere we need to see in Barcelona, which was very sweet. They were able to accommodate our schedule regarding checking in and out, and they were also always extremely helpful with any request or issue no matter how inconvenient. The place is exactly as advertised and is in a great location and everything was in walking distance. We had a lot of happy memories there and will try and stay here again whenever the opportunity presents itself. 
Thank you Alex, Javi & Pilar for a wonderful experience.

Thank you Alex, Javi and Pilar for providing such a well appointed property for us to enjoy for our 4 night stay with our family.  We were met outside the apartment and walked down to our carpark which was so handy (finding a carpark in Barcelona is terrible).  They had left us some supplies of drinks, milk etc which was very much appreciated and really made us feel welcome.  The apartment had everything you could require and more, very much enjoyed the Nepresso coffee too.  
We plan to come back and stay again when we do the adventure park with our children.
Very well located for a good look around Barcelona and the notes left for us were very helpful also.  Yes go to Tonka across the road, very yummy food.
Accueil très chaleureux et généreux de Pilar. Excellent séjour dans ce bel appartement très bien situé, accompagné des bons conseils de notre hôte !

Our family stayed 2 nights and the apartment was perfect for us.  Pilar met us and gave us lots of good information.  We had a car so this apartment was great to park the car in the underground garage and then we walk to everything.  The metro is very close to which we did use as well.  Very clean and great views.  There is nothing lacking at all and this is a perfect place to walk and explore Barcelona.  It is great that there were soft drinks and beer waiting for us and also coffee for the morning.

Absolutely great! 
The Apartment was exactely like it is presented here in words and at the pictures (very tidy, well equiped and modern).
The location und surrounding of the Apartment are both brillant! There is a very nice Restaurant for breakfast nearby ("Federal"). Supermarkets are situated within a 2-Minutes walking distance.

When we arrived Pilar was waiting for us and handed out Information-sheets of all we needed to know -> a warm welcome from our very nice and sympatic host!

***absolutely recommendable***

Le logement était vraiment très propre, spacieux et lumineux. Un très bon équipement avec pleins de petits détails. Nous nous sommes vite sentis très bien et détendu. A cela il faut ajouter une situation géographique très bonne avec un accès direct par métro à deux pas du logement pour la Sagrada par exemple et le secteur port/plage à environ 20 min à pied.
Autre point positif, un parking privé en sous terrain pour le prix de la location. Un véritable plus vue le prix du stationnement à Barcelone.
L'accueil était chaleureux et nous nous sommes vraiment senti attendu. En effet, Pilar nous attendez dans la rue en bas du logement pour rentrer notre véhicule. Elle nous a donné pleins de conseils et de bons plans pour nous mettre au courant de tous ce qu’il y avait à faire à Barcelone.
Franchement un grand merci à eux 3 pour leur disponibilité, sérieux et sympathie. Si nous avons la chance de revenir à Barcelone nous savons déjà où loger.

Pilar, Javi and Alex were excellent hosts. The house is exactly as it is on the photos. Well equipped with beautiful modern design. A major plus is the parking availability! Next time to visit Barcelona will surely pick this house!

Très bonne réactivité au moment de l'inscription, accueil agréable, Pilar s'est adaptée au mieux à nos heures d'arrivée et de départ  et  nous a donné de bons conseils pour nos visites.
L'appartement est en tout point conforme à l'annonce.
Bus et métro sont à deux pas.
Nous recommandons cette llocation.

Pilar, Javi and Alex were excellent hosts. Pilar waited for us even thought our flight was late and explained everything we needed to know and more. The apartment is very clean and well situated. The Wifi worked great. There are 3 grocery stores next door and a very nice Tapas Bar called Tonka on the other side of the street, which made is easy for us to choose where to eat when we were tired after sightseeing.  If we go back to Barcelona we will call Pilar, Javi and Alex again. Gracias por todo.

Ottima accoglienza, per niente invadente. Bell'appartamento pulito e con tutto quello che serve. Arioso e spazioso. Ubicato in una strada principale vicino alla metro e non molto distante dalla Rambla. Ottimo soggiorno, da ripetere.
Great place to stay and well connected to Ramblas and via metro. Apartment was neat and tidy and host was waiting for us even though we arrived at 9 PM. Recommended for stay.

Great place, kind hosts!
The apartment has a good location, quite close to many sights, and there is great bar called Tonka on the other side of the street.
The hosts are absolutely kind, explained a lot about BCN and the place. The fridge was filled with drinks for us. The flat is really nice, the kitchen is well equipped, and wifi works well.
We were there 5 together with a little baby and grandparents, and we found the apartment large and comfortable for a family.
It's also great that it has a garage, but be careful if you arrive by a large car, because it's quite narrow.
The apartement is on the 6th floor, and the elevator was unfortunately out of order for some days, but it was not the hosts' fault, and they helped us with everything, even they gave us refund because of that.
Absolutely recommended, we would stay here again!

The hosts were all there when we arrived. Relatively easy to find. 5 mins walk from the nearest Metro station. 

I would say that the place is spacious,clean and modern. Safe neighbourhood with quite a few eating and drinking place plus a few groceries stores. You cant complain anything about that place. 

I like to add that the house is stock with drinks, some snacks and also a fully operational kitchen. We cooked up a great dinner there as well. 

The hosts responded really quick and gave us good tips around Barca. I will be back.

Nous étions attendus à notre arrivée. L'appartement est conforme à la description, parfaitement équipé, très propre. Quelques boissons étaient à disposition dans le frigo, ainsi que des capsules Nespresso.
Des informations étaient indiqués sur comment se rendre sur les principaux  lieux touristiques. L'appartement est bien placé.

Parfait !

what an absolutely wonderful flat!  we couldn't be more pleased with the entire stay.  we had great communication, met at a specific time and got settled in quickly.  the flat is near two metro stations and not too far off the road.  we would come back again without hesitation. /Clayton

Alex war ein super Gastgeber. Obwohl unser Flug 2 Stunden Verspätung hatte, hat er noch auch uns gewartet und uns alles gezeigt und auch die Taxis organisiert.
Die Wohnung ist sehr gut gelegen und super Anschluss an die ­ÖV. Die Einrichtung ist schön und praktisch. Alles in allem kann ich diese Wohnung nur empfehlen.
This apartment is perfect for 4 peoples !  We really apreciate it! Is location was perfect for us ! I recommend this place and if I ever come back in Barcelona I would come back here !

Our Airbnb experience with Alex was truly wonderful.  He went out of his way to meet us on our schedule, provided us with all the info we didn't even know we'd need, stocked the apartment with basics at no charge, was available for us when we needed him.  the apartment was very clean, comfortable and the kitchen well appointed.  The neighborhood was quiet residential - non-touristy, and close to everything including buses and subways.  I'd use their listing again in a flash!  They totally made our trip to Barcelona work!

1ère expérience Airbnb réussie !! Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Alex. Des boissons étaient à notre disposition ainsi que toutes les infos nous permettant de démarrer notre visite de Barcelone. L'appartement est parfait : très bien placé et super bien équipé. La place de parking est un vrai plus (même s'il faut beaucoup manoeuvrer). 
Merci à nos hôtes pour cet accueil !!

We had a great experience in the apartment of Alex, Javi and Pilar. We enjoyed the very friendly welcome and hospitality. The location was very convenient. The apartment itself was very clean and had a very good wifi connection. An apartment we would recommend!

Appartement très bien entrenu, propre, agréable et très fonctionnel. Pilar est très avenante et produit de bon conseils touristiques.
Nous y avons séjourné 2 jours en août.
A l'arrivée une carte touristique  de Barcelone vous attends avec des boissons fraiches dans le frigo.
Merci Pilar

The flat is great, very convenient for a family, with spacious kitchen and living room. The private parking was also very convenient. The flat is located very near from tourist places. Pilar and Alex helped us throughout the whole stay. They were very flexible about our arrival and departure time and gave us good tips to visit Barcelona. We recommend them :)

Logement plein de bonnes surprises ! Parfaitement équipé (il ne manque vraiment rien !) au cœur de Barcelone en proximité de nombreux bus et du métros, climatisé, 2 salles d'eau... Les hôtes sont prévenants et attachants. Si vous voulez aller à la découverte de cette ville vous pouvez choisir cet appartement délicieux les yeux fermés.

Nice and neat appartment, exactly as on pictures. Host Alex was very responsive and caring. There was welcoming atmosthere with fully equipped kitchen, welcoming drinks and snacks and a lot of coffee.
Good location, walk distance from most of sighseeings. 
Definitely recommended to stay at this place!

We (4 adults and 2 children) had a wonderful experience at Alex, Javi and Pilar's apartment.  Although we ran late coming from the airport, someone was outside the apartment waiting for us to arrive. We were welcomed with the air conditioning on (it was a hot day), beer and snacks.  The apartment is in the perfect location - very close to the metro and so much much within walking distance.

Pilar waited in front of the apartment on time and welcomed us very friendly. She guided us into the parking building which is very narrow. It wasn’t that easy to get the car inside but it is possible – we recommend it for smaller cars. 
Pilar brought us upstairs into the apartment, she explained everything important about the rooms, the kitchen and the area. Free beer and Coke were waiting for us in the fridge :)
Also Pilar prepared a map for us and explained us the sights of Barcelona. The apartment is comfortable, has a lot of space, WIFI works perfectly. 
Supermarkets and metro stations are close by – a very central location to live. 
Thank you for a pleasant stay at this great apartment and the friendly contact!

Alex, Javi and Pilar are very kind and hospitable. The apartment is clean equiped and luminous. Coffe drinks and apetizer were very apreciated.
In the complex, the perfect apartment to enjoy the city!
Brilliant Host. Very good communication. Outstanding flat , near to town. Clean and comfortable.

Staying at this apartment/penthouse made our stay in Barcelona outstanding. It's a place to be when you don't want to be labelled a tourist. A place that you can soak up Barcelona authentically, in an authentic neighbourhood ... but still close to transport so you're in the main city quickly - if you need to do the 'tourist circuit'. Every part of the apartment was excellent, and the host's attention to detail impressed me. Quality fittings, lovely views, sunny aspect, clean and well appointed for cooking meals. We felt 'at home' and comfortable ... and Alex, Javi and Pilar were excellent at communicating with us, and very helpful. I would highly recommend this stay, and it was great because my teenage son had his own bedroom.

Hemos pasado tres días y dos noches en ese piso y, perfecto! El piso estaba más limpio que nuestra casa!!!Jijiji. igualito que en la foto. 
Pilar fue un amor y, nos facilitaron todo desde el momento que llegamos a Barcelona.
Hay de todo lo que se necesite. Sólo tienes que llevar el cepillo de dientes y la pasta.
Todo un detalle por parte de los anfitriones el dejarnos agua, leche , café y refrescos para nuestro uso.
Repetiremos sin duda!!

Easy to get to the apartment from the metro.  Warm welcome from Pilar.  She oriented us to the apartment.  The apartment was just as described - sunny, clean and welcoming.  The neighborhood was perfect - we were about a 10 minute walk to las ramblas, 20 minute walk to the beach, a couple of blocks from 3 metro stations.  Poble Sec is a really fun neighborhood with lots of restaurants, bars and shops.  There is a great street to "Tapear"  (go from bar to bar for tapas and drinks) called Carrer de Blai.  
We had an amazing time when we go back to Barcelona we would definitely stay here again!

Best AirBnb experience we've had. The place is big, super clean, modern, well lit, and has a top storey view. Hosts are wonderful and they have put effort into the little things - eg. Beers in the fridge after a long flight, coffee, milk, shampoo,  etc. The location is walking distance to most places and next to tube stations for those farther away. If this were a hotel,  it would cost 4 times as much. Highly recommend it.

We enjoyed our trip to barcelona and our stay in this apartment. It was a good location nearby Ramblas, Camp Nou and other things you definitely want to see. There are 3 supermarkets in the area, which is convenient. The apartment was clean and neat. The host was very friendly and helped us when that was needed.

I had a great experience in this apartment! Alex was there to greet us when we arrived, and had a selection of maps and neighbourhood information ready for us. The apartment is clean, bright, and has a lovely view. Big enough for myself, my sister and our parents to share comfortably.
