It's in a nice neighbourhood, just a short walk from Parallel, and about 10 minutes from La Rambla. They had left the kitchen stocked with some light snacks and beer, which made us feel right at home. I would absolutely stay here again.

Un accueil attentif et chaleureux, un appartement tout à fait confortable et conforme à la présentation. Le quartier animé et proche de la vieille ville permet de faire beaucoup de choses à pieds, en laissant la voiture au parking. Un séjour vraiment agréable !

Conforme à la description, confortable et très propre l'appartement est très agréable. L'accueil était parfait et sympathique. Idéal pour une famille avec enfants. 
Fortement recommandé.

Nice apartment in San Antoni. Well located and surrounded by several shops/ restaurants.  San Antoni itself is very nice with its own cozy atmosphere. Ramblas is pretty close (15 min walk through El Raval). Metro (Parallel and San Antoni) is located at approx. 500 mtrs. The apartment is spacious and clean with a fully equipped kitchen. Especially if you need a parking and want to stay close to the citycenter, this is the place to stay. Alex, Javi and Pilar are friendly and helpfull during your stay. Yes, I can recommend this apartment! It wasn't the first time I rented it and it probably won't be the last time.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Pilar qui était bien à l'heure. L'appartement est juste splendide et d'une propreté irréprochable ! Il est spacieux, bien équipé  (rien ne manquait )et très bien situé.  C'est sans aucune hésitation que nous réserverons cet appartement si nous avons la chance de retourner à Barcelone. Nous ne sommes pas certains d'avoir les mêmes prestations ailleurs. Nous recommandons vivement cet appartement. Merci encore à Pilar pour sa gentillesse.
Samuel et sa famille

We had a great stay, the apartment is very homy and fully equipped. Alex, Javi and Pilar were very kind and hospitable.
Great experience!

Très facile a trouver, cet appartement nous a donné entière satisfaction!
Fonctionnel, super bien équipé, parking compris dans l'immeuble,métro a 150m, pleins de resto,bar, de supermarchés, d' (Website hidden by Airbnb) pied de l'immeuble!!
bref tout pour passer un séjour parfait!!
Accueil impeccable d'Alex, un pack de bienvenu super après la route(bières et coca au frigo, café,...)
Voilaaaaa

He estado en el apartamento con mi familia y nos hemos sentido como en casa. El apartamento está muy bien, tiene de todo. Todo estaba muy limpio. Además te ofrecen cafés y cervezas para que cojas sin compromiso. Nos dieron todas las facilidades para la llegada y la salida. Tuvieron una disponibilidad total para cualquier cosa que pudiésemos necesitar. Conocimos a Pilar que es encantadora.
El apartamento está situado a menos de 5 minutos del metro y varios autobuses. Tiene linea directa con la estación de Sants. Además se puede ir andando a cualquier sitio.
La zona está muy bien, con muchos sitios en los que comer, cenar o tomar una copa.

La casa nos pareció muy cuca, al llegar nos estaba esperando Pilar que muy amablemente nos explicó todo lo referente a la casa. Nos sentimos muy a gusto, es una casa moderna y bien equipada. Está situada cerca de la Avenida del Paralell que une la Plaza de España con Colón, así que muy buen ubicada. Única peguilla la plaza de parking que es un poco pequeña y de difícil acceso. Recomendable 100%.
Tanto Pilar como Alex son muy buenos anfitriones y el apartamento está limpio, cómodo y perfectamente ubicado para moverte por la ciudad.

Un sitio en el que nos hemos sentido muy cómodos. Para empezar Alex tuvo el detalle de equiparnos la cocina a nuestra llegada, con leche, agua, refrescos, cervezas, surtido de infusiones, azúcar, cápsulas de café para la cafetera...El piso es muy acogedor y está muy bien equipado con todo lo que puedas necesitar en pequeños electrodomésticos, menaje, sartenes y ollas impecables…  incluso con detalles en los cuartos de baño como monodosis de champú, cajas de pañuelos de tocador …
Destacar que está muy bien comunicado con dos estaciones de metro cerca y paradas de bus, además el barrio tiene de todo, desde supermercados al salir de casa y el fantástico mercado de San Antoni  a pocos metros.
Como negativo, podría decir que la plaza de aparcamiento es estrecha y requiere de maniobras. Con respecto a una de las habitaciones dobles, señalar que aunque la cama es de 135cm, está pegada a la pared y resulta un poco claustrofóbica para el que duerme de ese lado, además de que una de las almohadas cae delante de la llave de la luz y durante la noche al moverte enciendes la luz sin querer. También comentar que cuando hay varios electrodomésticos funcionando a la vez (termo de agua, vitrocerámica, televisión y aire acondicionado) salta el diferencial de la luz, por lo que te obliga a apagar uno de ellos. En cualquier caso estos puntos negativos realmente no son un impedimento para recomendar este alojamiento.

Spent three nights at A, J & P's great located apartment. 
On arrival Pilar handed over the keys and Alex introduced 
all the apartments amenities, which are plentiful.
The apartment has a great view and located close to restaurants, supermarket and public transport + I can highly recommend to stay at the apartment.
Kind regards
Jannick

Great appartement. 3 rooms and 2 bathrooms. Appartement was nice and clean. 10 min walk to ramblas. 20 min walk from the Beach. Close access to Subway. Alex's mam gave us good tips abort the city and the appartement. 

Alex is a helpful and trustable man. The appartement is worth the price. 

Thanks!
Excellent location and flat, thanks

Alex, Javi & Pilar were a special Host,  very helpful also in giving us some information about the city and its services. the house is beautiful, very spacious and suitable for five people, with very large windows overlooking the city and its beauties. The apartment is located in a quiet area near the center and the Ramblas, in a very suggestive zone, we moved by foot. I'm sure I'll come back to Barcelona, and it Will be a pleasure to stay in this Amazing apartment again. Thank you so much Alex, Javi & Pilar

Alex made us feel welcome by providing food and drink in the frig, explaining the mechanics of the apartment, giving us hints as to safety and security, and indicating locations of stores like restaurants and markets.  He also answered our questions immediately when we emailed him.  The apartment was perfect for our family of four adults. It had everything we needed to cook and eat at home. It is new and beautiful with a wonderful view of the rooftops and the city.  Overall it was splendid.

Nous avons séjourner 3 jours et 2 nuits dans cet appartement à 5 personnes. L'appartement est très bien équipé, comme à la maison. Super clean. L'accueil est au top, avec de petites attentions (quelques confiseries, boissons...). Les hôtes sont d'une vraie gentillesse. Nous avons rendu l'appartement en fin de matinée et ils nous ont permis de laisser nos bagages l'après midi pour profiter de notre fin de séjour. L'appartement est idéalement placé, entre place d'Espagne, Montjuic, la vieille ville. À recommander+++++

Merci à Pilar pour cet accueil ! Personne très sympathique. 
Appartement très bien situé dans
Barcelone, bien équipé et propre. 
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour. 
Encore merci.

Meine Familie und ich haben uns auf dem Weg nach Spanien ganz spontan für Barcelona entschieden. Am selben Tag haben wir noch die "Sunny Penthaus mit Parkplatz" gebucht! Obwohl wir erst sehr spät am Abend ankamen, hat Alex auf uns  für die Schlüsselübergabe gewartet . Alex hatte sogar ein paar Getränke, Tee, Kaffee und Milch für uns besorgt. Es war ein sehr angenehmer Aufenthalt mit viel Sonne (helle Wohnung) und die Wohnung ist sehr zentral gelegen.  Vor der Türe hat man verschiedene öffentliche Verkehrsmitteln und sehr gute Restaurants. Wer selber kochen will, hat gleich um die Ecke Supermäkte, Mercados und Obstläden. 
Es ist toll, dass wir eine Wohnung so zentral mit Parkplatz bekommen haben. Sollte ich nochmals nach Barcelona reisen, würde ich wieder gerne zu Alex, Javi& Pilar! Muchas Gracias! :)

L accueil de Pilar a été très chaleureux. C est une adorable personne, à l écoute,très serviable et attentive.
Beaucoup de petites attentions dans la cuisine, des boissons dans le frigo...
L appartement est très beau et confortable, les couchages en très bon état. Il est bien situé en ville.

S il y a une petite chose à améliorer c est le bruit de la ventilation.
One more time, being their hosts was a great moment. This appartment is much more enlighted and provide a third room. Still very well located and very clean. We'll come back (again)

Logement  bien équipé et confortable, bien situé  à proximité des transports urbains bus et métro accès  facile  à  tous  les sites touristiques  de Barcelone. Parking sécurisé sous l'immeuble. Très bon accueil de Pilar à l'arrivée comme au départ

Le logement était vraiment en accord avec la description.
Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour. L'appartement est proche des transports en commun et des ramblas. C'est très pratique. 
La propriétaire est très gentille et très efficace.
A conseiller!
Realmente buena elección

Our flight was canceled due to technical  reasons therefore delaying us by 1 day into Barcelona.  We messaged Alex and Javi about the delay. They were absolutely the best. They responded promptly and even offered to refund the 1 night missed because they felt bad for us. So nice of them!

Penthouse was 3 bedrooms and 2 washrooms. Beautiful apartment.  Very quiet and central to everything.  Would definitely recommend this place and would definitely come back again.

This was our first trip to Spain / Barcelona, and it was amazing. One of the main reasons was our stay at Alex's apartment. It was very close to the main city center and we walked around to the main sites. From the start Alex was available at every moment. He was there to receive us even though our flight was delayed. We left our keys in the apartment and got locked out but he came within an hour to help us out. My wife broke a glass jar and we were happy to pay for it or replace it but Alex didn't accept any monies. It was small thoughtful things that made our stay memorable and enjoyable. I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Barcelona. It was a pleasure meeting Alex and his Mum.

We LOVED our stay at Alex's sunny penthouse! He greeted us kindly and on time, with maps, snacks and drinks awaiting us. As we relied on public transit, he showed us the best ways to get around and see what we were interested in and gave a few suggestions also.  The flat was incredibly well located, with different subway lines surrounding us.  We were two adult couples and the flat and kitchen provided everything we needed, including reliable wifi and the wonderful cappuccino machine which I wanted to take home with us.  Loved the late afternoon sunshine and the high level view.  Alex allowed us to leave our bags in the flat was getting ready for the next tenants.  In sum, great host and great flat.  Really recommend highly!

We were two families and stayed at alex's apartment for two nights. It was great experience. The apartment was super clean and very well equipped. It has everything you might need even nespresso coffee machine with capsules, milk, drinks, nuts . Alex and his parents were very nice and kind to let us leave our luggage in the apartment before the check in time and gave us very useful informations where to go and how. The apartment is in perfect location near rambla street. We loved our stay and very highly recommended.

Alex, Javi, and Pilar are the absolute perfect hosts. We arrived to the apartment with a fridge full of snacks and drinks and were given perfect instructions on where and where not to go in Barcelona. The apartment itself is incredible: three bedrooms right near a grocery store and a short walking distance to some of the best places to eat in Barcelona. We made the mistake one night of going to the tourist restaurants near La Rambla. Don't. It's a less than 10 minute walk from this apartment to the place where the locals go for food. Go there instead. It's significantly cheaper and way better than anything else we had. Next time we're in Barcelona, we're staying here again.

Appartement très bien situé, très lumineux, bien équipé, propre et joli, que demander de plus? 
Nous avons été accueilli comme des rois ; Alex, Javi et Pilar ont été très arrangeants pour les horaires d'arrivée et de départ. 
Mille merci, vous avez contribué à faire de notre séjour à Barcelone un excellent souvenir !!
Lovely apartment in the center of Barcelona. Very modern, clean, and well equipped.  We found everything we need at the apartment. The owners were super friendly and helpful. Highly recommend

Accueil chaleureux. Appartement impeccable, tout à fait conforme à la description et aux photos. Boissons au frais et capsules de café à disposition. Emplacement dans Barcelone parfait. Je recommande vivement. De plus, Pilar a été de bon conseil.

Me, my wife and our three children stayed at Alex, Javi & Pilar's  apartment for a week in april and we had a wonderful experience. 
The hosts took care of all our needs, espacially the needs of our 9 month baby (including a baby cot, a baby chair and a baby bath). Alex wellcomed us upon our arrival and gave us the keys. The apartment was exactly like in the photos and was very well equipped and very clean. The parking is very usuful if you have car alltough the parking space is a beat challenging if you have a large car. 
The location is perfect. It is  in a quiet street in St. Antony neighborhood close to Parallel st. and not far from two metro stations and bus station. There is also a supermarket near by. 
To sum up, its a very recommended apartent.

The apartment was lovely, surpassing our expectations. It's not easy to find an affordable apartment for three demanding women who each want their own bedroom! The penthouse is attractive, clean, very well equipped - and in a great local neighbourhood, a short walk from the centre. Alex and Pilar were charming and helpful hosts. We were touched by their thoughtfulness in leaving snacks and drinks for us. Communication by email/text was excellent before we arrived in Spain, but we had trouble with our (NZ) phones trying to contact the hosts from Barcelona Airport.  Even so, Alex was waiting for us at the apartment, with a big smile, excellent English and lots of helpful advice for our stay. This was our first experience of Airbnb and what a great introduction to it.

Excellent welcome by Pilar with good practical advices for moving in Barcelona. Despite, the size of the city, it is easy and cheap by bus or metro. The apartment is also very conveniently placed for day to day shopping and for visiting.

It is also practical inside and very clean. Although small overall, it accommodates four people very easily with two baths, three bedrooms and all conveniences: washing machine, dryer, iron, air-con, dishwasher and a garage (but do not expect to park a Mercedes S or a BMW 7 series).

Also met Alex when we left. Very friendly and very efficient too. The check out only took minutes.

We strongly recommend: good value for money and Barcelona is a fantastic city. Just the weather which was a bit cool for the period of the year, but nothing Pilar or Alex could do about.

Alex was waiting for us when we got there and very helpful and nice. The location was great and an easy to drive into the city to the apartment. The apartment had everything we wanted. Nice touch with food and drink items included.

Nous avons passé un super séjour à Barcelone dans cet appartement. Il est nickel : il très joli séjour/cuisine, 3 chambres (dont 2 doubles), 2 salles de bain avec WC. 
Alex, Javi & Pilar ont rempli le frigo pour notre arrivée de bonne Saint Miguel, jus de fruit, lait, coca, etc... C'était vraiment un très gentil geste.
A notre arrivée, Alex a pris le temps de nous expliquer comment nous déplacer, c'était parfait. Ensuite quand nous avons eu des questions durant notre séjour, il nous a toujours répondu rapidement. 
C'est sur, quand nous reviendrons à Barcelone, on reprendra cet appartement !!!
Choisissez le les yeux fermés ;))))

I highly recommend Alex's place if you are traveling to Barcelona and want a relaxing and comfortable flat to stay in that's well located and in the middle of everything. Alex is very friendly and communicative, and his mother Pilar is so sweet!

Hallo Alex,  es war wunderschön in eurer Wohnung und wir haben die Zeit in Barcelona sehr genossen.  Alles was wir brauchten fanden wir in der Wohnung und die Lage war ebenfalls ideal.  Auch hat es geklappt mit der Taxiresevierung am Abreisetag am frühen Morgen. Vielen Dank,  wir haben euch bereits weiter empfohlen. 
Ulrike und Familie

The apartment met our needs perfectly, it was very clean and exactly as described on the website.  We stayed as a group of five, so the two bathrooms and the fact that two of the three bedrooms are doubles were perfect for us.

The location was also great, as it is within walking distance to a lot of attractions in the city centre.  It is particularly close to the El Raval area and the bottom half of La Rambla.  There are a number of metro stations in short walking distance of the apartment too to make getting around easy, and Plaça de Catalunya is around a 20 minutes walk away.

The apartment has lots of nice touches such as food and drink included, and the Nespresso machine for making nice coffees.

Communication with the hosts was easy and we always had prompt replies to messages.

We would happily recommend this flat to anyone looking to stay in Barcelona!

Dear Pilar, Alex, and Javi!
Thank you very much for our wonderful stay in Barcelona! It is the best apartment we ever stayed, and we traveled and seen a lot. Very clean, modern, bright apartment. Planty of dishes, towels, all working equipment, safe parking, reliable WiFi, etc. Big Thanks from our kids for the chips and coke, and from my husband for the cool beer. :) You were very responsive people and answered all our questions and gave us good advices. The location is wonderful as well. I would definitely stay here again and recommend this place to my friends. 
Mucho gracias! 
Best,
Irina

The apartment was great, it was really well located, the beach wasn't a far walk nor were things like las ramblas, gothic etc. Supermarkets couldn't be closer and no problems with the area. We went to off sonar and the el poble espanyol area where many events are held was minutes away too
Ottima accoglienza. Appartamento comodo, pulito e ben ubicato

Super séjour à Barcelone, parking privatif, appartement à 5mn du métro, proche de toutes les commodités et à 15mn des rambla à pied.
Appartement propre avec lave vaisselle, lave linge, sèche linge et tout le nécessaire pour la cuisine, rafraîchissement à disposition gratuitement ce qui est agréable.
Je recommande sans hésitation cet appartement.

Stayed at Alex, Javi and Pilar's place June 28 to July 1. The apartment was exactly what the pictured showed... no surprises at all other than being pleasantly surprised! Pilar greeted us at our meeting time and helped navigate us to our parking spot in the garage (tight corners but doable with her guidance). The apartment was cozy and spacious for us as a family of 5. Close to everything central (La Rambla, Barri Gottic, the beaches, Olympic village) and a couple of minutes to buses and metro. Appreciated the beer, Nespresso, chips, milk and cookies! Highly recommended... would come back in a heartbeat!
Excellent communication, very nice and friendly people. Accommodation was great and central.  Would recommend.

It was a pleasure dealing with Alex, Javi and Pilar. They promptly greeted us, showed the apartment, and gave us an orientation session with local attractions and amenities. They had the fridge/kitchen stocked with some beer, water, cookies, chips, etc. which made all the difference after a long day of travel. They were also available via email during our stay to answer other questions we had. The unit was clean and close to transit and major attractions. We enjoyed our stay in Barcelona! Thanks to Alex, Javi and Pilar!

I couldn't have asked for more from this beautiful apartment in Barcelona. The hosts were extremely punctual meeting us upon arrival and even supplied us with coffee, drinks and beer. Everything worked perfectly  and it was extremely well located. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a worry free stay in Barcelona.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour, l'appartement était très propre avec tout à disposition et l'accueil de Pilar parfait. il est très bien situé à 10mn à pied de la Rambla et à côté de la station de métro. idéal pour un séjour en famille, les enfants ont adoré.

My family and I enjoyed a very lovely stay at the apartment in Barcelona.  It was a very convenient location; an easy walk to Montjiuc and Las Ramblas and the port.  It was very comfortable with three bedrooms and two baths.  The washer and dryer and the secure parking were great amenities.   Alex, Pilar and Javi were so nice and stocked the kitchen with a few snacks and drinks and delicious coffee.   I would definitely recommend this to a friend.

L'appartement est finalement assez petit par rapport à ce que les photos laissent croire. 

Il faudrait lessiver certains murs qui sont marqués par les passages des voyageurs. 

Il faudrait aussi préciser que l'accès au parking suppose de bien savoir manœuvrer si on a une grande voiture. 

Le quartier est très populaire ! Par forcément très calme. On est réveillé par les bruits de la rue. 

Par ailleurs, il y a des clochards qui dorment dans la rue, sur des bancs mais aussi le long de la porte d'entrée de l'immeuble. Dans l'ascenseur une note du syndic informe que la porte a été forcée à plusieurs reprises ces derniers jours et qu'il faut faire attention à ses affaires et ne laisser entrer personne : ça ne dégage pas des ondes positives. 

Dernier point : sur l'accueil : nous n'avons jamais vu les hôtes mais une personne qui ne parlait pas d'autre langue que l'espagnol (ou la catalan...) et qui s'est contenté de donner reprendre les clefs. Pas très chaleureux. Par contre les hôtes répondent vite par mail. 

Donc, globalement, c'est un petit appartement propret, pas trop mal placé pour l'accès au métro mais dans un quartier qui n'est pas ce que l'annonce laisse croire. 

Un peu trop cher pour ce que c'est (du moins, en pleine saison touristique).

Host was accommodating and quick to respond to any questions. The accommodations were too basic for how expensive it was to stay, but this could have been due to summer season and raised prices. Close to pharmacy and restaurants.

It was very nice to stay in this flat. Very convenient to go around in barcelona by walk or metro. And the facilities in the flat were very good. 
We much appreciate to be at the top floor that insure light and a nice vue.
There is not much traffic in the street down the flat and around, consequently the flat is not noisy, and anyway, it is well equipped with modern windows and shutters.
The two bathrooms are very convenient and well equipped.
The kitchen is completely equipped and the large fridge is very convenient.
The private car park is a MUST ! Do not imagine to handle a car without a private car park in Barcelona...
And finally, special thanks to Alex, Javi and Pilar who are very reactive to any enquiries. And we much appreciated the various products left for us at our arrival.

Great location, easy to find with great parking.  The apartment matches the pictures perfectly!
Hosts were available at all times and provided handy tips on local cafes and restaurants. We thoroughly enjoyed our time in Barcelona and will happily stay here again.

The apartment was great, very convenient and close to the metro. It has all you need for a fantastic stay in Barcelona. The hosts are very friendly and helpful and promptly reply when you contact them. I would stay here again. Thank you!

Communication with Alex was good and the apartment was as described.  It was close to public transport which made our sight seeing simple.  We had a wonderful stay and would highly recommend this apartment.

The stay at Alex, Javi and Ms. Pilar's place was absolutely fantastic. It is a great location close to almost everything by metro or public transport. The house itself has everything you need and was as shown in the photos. The beds were comfortable, the amenities provided were abundant and the cleanup was was well maintained. A special thank you to our hosts for the beverages and Oreo. :)

Ms. Pilar and Mr. Ilyas were present when we arrived and were very helpful to move our bags from the car to the apartment. They explained everything in detail and were kind enough to also tell us about the city, attractions and times to visit the famous spots. A very very very big gracias to the both of them for their input and help. 

Alex was very responsive as well and he even helped me order pizza for dinner. Thanks Alex! I really wanted to meet Alex and Javi in person but hopefully somewhere in the near future.

Overall, my stay at their apartment was pleasant, comfortable and felt like home away from my home. Thanks guys! Keep up the good work. :)

Alex was amazing!! Very informative and accomodating of our earlier arrival.  Apartment just as described.  Amazing location.  Tons of restaurants, bars, supermarkets and close to taxi stops as well as bus lines and metro.  Walking to most places was easy if it was not walkable super easy to get on metro, rent a bike or taxi.  There is a big city bike stand at the end of the block which was awesome.  Air conditioning was amazing during these hot summer months! Alex was great and we actually stayed a second time in the apartment during pur second leg of the trip and everything was great again! Thanks so much we loved it here!!

Alex, Javi and Pilar were wonderfully flexible after we arrived early to the apartment. It was a perfect place to stay for a weekend and had everything needed. The beers and soft drinks in the fridge were a nice touch. The apartment is fairly central with some nice bars and restaurants nearby. There are also good transport links close by.

El apt de Alex, Javi y Pilar es excellente. Todo muy limpio como en las fotos. Cerca de la Rambla y otras areas turisticas. Silencioso para dormir.  
La nevera tenia agua, leche, cerveza y coca cola. Unos chips y ademas una maquina de café con café.
Gracias por todas sus atenciones. 
Muy facil la comunicacion con ellos y muy puntuales.
Lo recomiendo.
The room is exactly what it is in the picture. The hosts were extremely helpful and the neighborhood is secured. Three minutes to the train station,i would recommend to all of my friends.

Alex met us at the apartment even though our flight was late and showed us around. He explained how the Barcelona metro worked and oriented us on a map to show where we were in the city and where everything is in relation. 

The apartment is half way between two metro stations and we found the metro the easiest way to get around.  It's a 3-4 minute walk to either of the two stations. 

The apartment is on the 6th floor but there's a lift so you don't have to slog up the stairs. Inside, it's clean and bright. There are 2 double beds in rooms and one single bed. There are 2 bathrooms- one with a bath and one with a shower. 

Alex left us beer, milk and bottled water in the fridge and crisps and biscuits and coffee (good coffee) in the kitchen.  The aircon worked well. 

When we left Alex was brilliant- accommodating our needs vis a vis flight times and departure etc. He couldn't have been more helpful. 

This is a great place to stay in Barcelona.

Wow!!!! What a stay!!!!
I could not recommend this apartment more. 
Pilar was so delightful - she was so smiley and funny and really made the effort to ensure we were safe and comfortable. She explained everything really well and was organised and on time! She was helpful as well, helping us to carry some bags and being an extremely effective aid while parking our large car in the car park.
The apartment is simply beautiful, so full of light with absolutely everything you could need. 
The kitchen had all the necessary utensils to cook meals, which we used. The fridge even had some cold drinks and snacks!!!! Very thankful.
The beds were very comfortable, each of them, and the master bedroom has its own en suite which was great for my parents.
It was great to have a washing machine and drier too, as well as speedy wifi.
The location is good - just a two minute walk away is a bus that takes you directly to Park Güell. 
Going to the Magic Fountain is also walkable. 
Some places nearby to try for food/drinks - Agust GastroBar. Amazing cocktails!!! The food was delicious. It was upmarket and expensive but would be great for a fancy night out!! 
La Cometa - yummy little cafe if you're into good coffee, art and fresh, healthy food and juices. Standard pricing.

A lovely apartment, spotlessly clean and spacious. We were meet at the apartment and allowed to drop our bags early and given full instructions  on this very well equipped home. Delighted to have found them x

The apartment is perfect and exactly as I was expecting; quiet, confortable, spatious and clean
When I go back to Barcelona I would stay here again for sure.

Very comfortable and clean apartment with private parking (very important if you have a car in Barcelona)
The owners very polite and helpful 
In our next trip in Barcelona we will try to rent it again

Super freundlich, hat schon auf uns (trotz Regen) gewartet! Die Wohnung ist perfekt für die Erkundung Barcelonas. Super gelegen. Internet super schnell. Küche ist gut ausgestattet. Sogar ein paar Getränke im Kühlschrank waren bereit - vielen Dank nochmal an dieser Stelle!
Il posto è veramente carino, proprio come compare nelle fotografie. Il quartiere è perfetto per muoversi a piedi e i padroni di casa (noi abbiamo conosciuto Pili) veramente disponibili e attenti.

The host Pilar's kind g esture of escor ting right from the time we get off the taxi to the apartment and ecplaining all aspects especially safety was very touching and was .

Alex was very prompt in replying any queries on what's up 
 
Would stay here again if visiting Spain again :)

Muy buen alojamiento. Excelentemente equipado tanto en la cocina como el comedor y en los baños. Pilar, la anfitriona, ha sido muy atenta y ha dado expicaciones sobre todo lo que preguntamos. Dos observaciones: 1) la 2da.cama matrimonial es angosta para dos personas. 2) Es trabajoso aparcar en el parking si el coche es tipo Van.
Aparte de estos dos detalles el apto. es altamente recomendable y volveriamos a alquilarlo si se presenta otra ocasion

Headline: Neither good nor bad.  Just Okay ish

Pilar and Alex made us feel welcome and where quick and efficient in answering our queries.  Alex was also accommodating in allowing us to check out later.  The apartment is kept clean (but see below) and in a reasonable neighbourhood with lots of cafes around.  

However, staying here is just like staying in a well worn 3 star hotel (if was a hotel it would be a 3* hotel, a Best Western or a Premier Inn sort of place).  If it was a UK university degree it would be a 2:2.  If it was a GCSE result it would be a C (i.e. a pass, but your son is certainly not on his way to Oxford or Cambridge).  There was absolutely nothing wrong with the apartment, but nothing right with it either. 

The walls are scuffed in the master bedroom and the lounge.   Its fine for a pitstop, but lacks soul

Would I stay here again?  No

Nice flat in a perfect location : all is near but the neighborhood remains quiet. 
Javi was such a nice person.
Thanks for all

Oltre ad un'accoglienza perfetta abbiamo trovato persone attente ai nostri bisogni e esaustive nel darci indicazioni molto utili, dettagliate e precise per muoversi nella citta'. Un grazie particolare a Pilar da parte nostra

Great apartment for short and long stay! Super location- not far from metro station, big amount of shops, restaurants and bars just one minute walk! The owners of the apartment are very cute and open! We will definitely choose this apartment for future voyages!

Host was very helpful in helping us check in. It was very smooth moving in and we were glad to see everything was generously stocked and well organised. Location was decent and allowed a quick taxi trip to many locations in the city

Nous avons été accueilli par Alex qui est très attentionné et très arrangeante l'accueil est toujours très bien avec un apéro disponible dans le frigo à l'arrivée (de la bière, du coca pour les enfants et des chips). L'appartement est idéalement situé à 10 minutes de la colline de Montjuïc est un quart d'heure à pied de la rambla, à 2 minutes du métro de la sagrada familia, à 5 minutes du bus pour le parc guell. L'appartement est très propre lumineux et calme il est très agréable et bien équipé. Nous y avons été bien et y retournerons avec plaisir.

This was the best place to stay!  Clean and new - had all the amenities we were looking for including a safe parking space for our rental car and both a washer AND dryer for our clothes.  Loved being on the top floor - nice views.  The beds were very comfortable, closets had plenty of space and bathrooms were great.  We loved the blackout shutters - helped us with transitioning to such a different time zone.  The grocery store was just around the corner.  Easy short walk to Metro, harbor and fun shopping on Las Ramblas.  We only needed our car for more distant excursions, like Montserrat. 
I would highly recommend staying at this Air B&B!
Excelentemente ubicado, muchas formas de llegar, un barrio tranquilo pero muy cerca de la acción. Nos han atendido de maravilla, lo recomiendo sin duda alguna!

The place definitely exceeded my expectations, it was nicer than some hotels I've stayed at. It was extremely clean and they were very considerate with what they provided. There is a bus stop and metro station <5 minutes from the house so very convenient.

There was one small thing, the room facing the streets did occasionally get noisy at night, not sure if it's common there or just the time we went but it was bearable for sure.

With that being the only complaint I have about their place, I would definitely recommend staying here.
Friendly, prompt reply, well equipped
La mejor palabra para describir la experiencia es Familia, dado que lo hacen sentir parte de una con la atención prestada, desde la llegada hasta la salida.

This is a great place if you want to be fairly close to everything, with really easy access to public transportation and about a 15-20 minute walk to either the Gothic area or the beach.  The apartment is cosy, very clean and well maintained and outfitted.  Wifi worked well and having a dryer as well as a washer was a great bonus!  Certainly comfortable for 4-5 people - the pictures are an accurate reflection.  There was some noise from outside at night, but not at all bad, considering we were in downtown Barcelona.  Alex was very helpful and left good instructions - check in and out was made very easy.  We felt very lucky to find a great base like Alex's for exploring Barcelona!
Great place, kind host and helpful, lovely place

First of all, we can say that Pilar and Alex are the best hosts in the world!!! They are always ready to help you and to give precoius information and, if you send Alex a message, he answers immediately! The apartment is very clean, central and fully equipped: it's like being at home, in the heart of Barcelona! You really have everything you need to cook and to clean the house: microwave, nespresso machine, dishwasher, washing machine and dryer, hoover and a lot of detergent products. Pilar has offered us some fresh drinks and snacks: what a lovely welcome! We have also found in the kitchen useful basics as sugar, salt, tea and coffee....
The apartment has two bathrooms and three bedrooms: the largest bedroom is wonderful, with its large window, but it can be a bit noisy during the night; the other bedrooms are narrow but very silent and peaceful. 
The location is very convenient: if you like walking, you can reach in about 10/15 minutes Placa de Espanyia, Las Ramblas and the port; several bus and metro station are also very close, and they connect you easily to topic places as Sagrada Familia and Parc Guell. 
A supermarket open until 23 in the night is just next door, and you can buy fresh food at the coloured St Antoni market. 
We were travelling with our 3 years old daughter and we recommend this apartment to families!

You'll certainly love this place: it is nice, clean and close to metrô, bus and in a walking distance to several cool spots.
We just loved and will be back for sure!!!
Bien ubicado

위치가 정말 좋았고 호스트도 매우 친절했습니다. 방의 준비도도 좋았고 필요한 물 수건 세제 드라이기 등 모든 것들이 잘 준비되어 있었습니다. 좀 큰 문제 하나는 따듯한 물을 쓰면 자꾸 두꺼비집이 나가서 난방이 안되거나 정전이 되는 사태가.. 좀 자주 일어났어요. 하루에도 3~4번 이상.. 그래서 밤에 춥거나 충천을 해놓고 잤는데 아침에 보니 충천이 안되어 있고 이런게 좀 불편했습니다. 건물이 오래되고 도시 자체 파워가 약하다고 말씀은 하셨지만 이 부분은 꼭 개선되어야 할 부분인것 같아요. 그리고 사진과 다르게 방하나는 매우 작습니다. 주니어용이니 어른 셋이 각자 3방 쓸 생각하면 안될겁니다. 참고하세용~

The apartment was one of best air bnb we stayed during two months of Europe tour, highlighted with perfect location. The main street (Ra lambla?) is actually quite close that you can reach on foot in just 10 min which was fantastic. There are some nice spanish restaurants nearby as well. The apartment has large spaces, being well organized and clean which was just comfortable. Recommend!

The apartment is clean and tidy. The cooking set are well prepared. There is even a coffee machine with capsule and soft drink provided by the hosts. They are really welcomed their guests. We appreciate very much. 
There is nothing negative except the parking lot is small for a 7-people-car (a mini MPV). However, to be honest, it is not a big deal because you can park your car in the street side. There are enough space for parking.
Muy cómodo el piso.  La atención de sus dueños impecable! Recomendable.
The flat is super beautiful and close to the rambla. We really enjoyed our stay there. Communication was super easy!

Cet appartement bénéficie d'un confort très agréable. Il est très bien situé et permet d'accéder facilement aux différents sites et quartiers touristiques aussi bien à pied qu'en transport en commun.
De plus , le parking privé souterrain est un atout incontestable si vous venez à Barcelone en voiture.
Très bon accueil de Pilar, qui a le sens de l'hospitalité, en remplissant le frigo de bières, coca, lait, dosettes de café...etc..
Nous avons passé une très belle semaine de vacances.

Location is superb, hundreds of restaurants within a short walk.  Apartment is small, but very efficiently laid out. Hot water was plentiful.  Beds were very comfortable, especially the master bedroom Queen size bed.  Pilar was excellent, meeting us and had supplied the refrigerator with a few beers, some small snacks, bottled water and fruit.  There was also coffee and laundry soap.  It was an excellent stay in an amazing city.

Alex was very communicative. He kept in touch from the start of our booking and right through our stay. Always responding to our questions and requests within minutes of my texts. The apartment is exactly as described. Beautiful, spacious, clean and well stocked.  The fridge had cola, water and beer on our arrival. Check in was a breeze. Pilar met us at the apartment and made sure to go over everything with us. Check out was even better as there was a marathon that day. Alex made sure we got a taxi and onto our cruise in time. I would recommend this place to everyone!

The apartment is in a great location central to the city center and with multiple metro stops nearby. Alex and Javi were both very responsive and helped us check in and settle into the apartment very easily! They also were very helpful in helping me figure out alternative ways to the airport when they let me know there was a taxi strike! They are wonderful hosts and I hope I'll get to come back and visit soon!
Fantastic place, tremendous host, fabulous neighbourhood - for 3-4 people the ideal place for a quick stay. Thanks again

Another stellar stay with Alex!  We needed early check in due to cruise disembarkation and Alex did not hesitate to accommodate.  The apartment was again 100% clean and well stocked with drinks and some snacks.  Check out was another breeze.  We had an early flight out so Alex arranged a taxi and even reminded us of Daylight savings time so that we could change our clocks and not miss the car or flight.  Apartment was spacious and close to everything we needed.  I would definitely recommend this place!
Alles war super. Tolle Lage und all Inklusive Wohnung.

Best host I have EVER stayed with on airbnb. Super caring and kind plus the place was brand new and spotless. The place also had everything we could need. Felt like our own home! Next time I'm in Barcelona, I'll make sure to attempt to stay here.
Lovely apartment suitable for a family in a great location. Near lots of great restaurants and bars and transport links. Communication was excellent and very helpful.

We are a family with a teenage daughter, and we spent a very pleasant weak in this apartment. Everything was clean and like described. The Metro and Supermarcets are very close, and the Ramblas are in walking distance. Alex was waiting for us, and explained us everything about the apartment, and how to get around in Barcelona, and where to find nice restaurants. It was very convenient to have some basic supply like coffee, milk, cookies, soap etc.  We spent the week with lots of Gaudi's architecture, Museums, walks through the City, and a trip to Montserrat. Even the weather was perfect!  At the end of the week Alex organized a taxi for us to get us to the airport. Everything was very pleasant and we highly recommend this apartment!

Appartement très agréable, très bien équipé et situé idéalement pour visiter la ville.
Alex, Javi et Pilar sont des hôtes très attentionnés et qui prennent soin de vous.
À recommander sans hésitation pour vos séjours à Barcelone.

This apartment is very comfortable and well appointed with all of the necessary amenities.  We particularly appreciated the espresso machine. It is located in a more residential rather than touristy area, but it is still quite central to all of the sights of Barcelona.  With a secure car park, it is excellent for those driving to the city.  Contact with the owners was excellent, and Pilar, our contact, was extremely helpful and friendly.  I would recommend this apartment without reservation.
Great location with a few nice bars and restaurants to go to and walking distance from the old Olympic village

This is a great place on the six floor with a good view of the tree lined street.  Lots of eateries and three markets are close by if you like to cook at home. Personally I'd rather eat out. Subway is a short walk and taxis are always available nearby. People in the stores and restaurants are very  friendly and helpful. Riding the subway is always easy and there's plenty of people willing to help you. We always bought three trip cards rather than individual trips because there are less expensive. Our hosts were very helpful.

Tout était parfait : l'accueil, le logement, l'emplacement ! 
Le métro est à quelques minutes ainsi que le bus pour le park guel. Le logement est très bien agencé. Pilar et Alex ont été super et nous ont permis de laisser la voiture au parking jusqu'au soir !

Wonderful everything we needed for our break in Barcelona.

Such a brilliant location so easy to get to metro to explore, everything you need on the door step (café/shop).

Would definitely recommend

Piso en perfecta localizacion, al lado de centro y a distancia caminando de la playa.

Los anfitriones estuvieron pendientes en todo momento de nosotros y la casa estaba limpisima y con todo lo necesario a la llegada.

Totalmente recommendable!!!
Wonderful clean apartment in a great location for everything you would want to do in Barcelona.  Pilar was a sweet, considerate host.  We highly recommend this apartment and would stay there again.
Nice, clean, comfortable space. Pilar was super helpful and accommodating! Always available to answer any questions. Location was great and just a few minutes to the center. We had a lovely time!

Thank you, Alex , Javi and Pilar for a wonderful stay in Barcelona . From the moment we arrived when Pilar greeted us, helped us settle in and gave us useful information about Barcelona through to booking taxis for us and advising us on times to get to the airport for our very early flight, our hosts were remarkable!
The apartment high up above the street was very usefully placed between great restaurants ( note especially Malamen Bendita Bodega  and Filomenas were outstanding and less than 5 minutes from the apartment ) , and the number 24 bus which takes you into the main sections of Barcelona ,  past the Gaudi houses and on to Parc Guelll was also easy walking to the old parts of town, the big fresh food market and las Ramblas. 
I would recommend this apartment to anyone. Thank you once again, Alex,Javi and Pilar for a great stay, we only wish we could have stayed longer!
Cecily Dempster

Very nice apartement, close to the center of Barcelona and the marina.
Very clean. Alex and Pilar were very nice, communication was fast.
The kitchen was well equiped.
Only the parking was difficult with our big car. Is is ok for small cars but not for family vans...
Thanks for everything!

We are a family of three - two adults and one six-year-old. We loved this apartment. The apartment is clean and beautifully decorated. Also, the layout made it feel very spacious. It is an easy walk to the Mercat de la Boqueria and the Rambla more generally. It is close to a number of metro stops. It is on the sixth floor and there's a lovely view from the living room window and the master bedroom overlooking the city. The apartment gets a lot of light.  Alex, Javi and Pilar provide all the basic amenities that travelers need including coffee, milk, shampoo, bath gel etc. We would definitely stay here again if we come back to Barcelona.
The apartment is only a few blocks from the metro and only a few minutes walk to the old port area.  It was good for what we needed.

La estancia en casa de Alex, Javi y Pilar ha sido estupenda.
Íbamos un grupo de 5 personas y un bebe, y nos hemos encontrado muy cómodos. El apartamento tenía hasta el último detalle y ubicación perfecta.
Tanto en el momento de llegada, como a la hora de salir, Pilar un encanto, y muy pendiente de todo.
Recomendaría el apartamento al 100%. 
En nuestra próxima visita a Barcelona, intentaremos alojarnos de nuevo allí.

Our family (2 adults, 2 kids ages 6 and 9) had a fabulous stay.  Pilar was an excellent host.  It was really helpful to have separate bedrooms and a bathroom for our kids, and the apartment is very spacious with a full kitchen.  It is centrally located and a short distance to metro stops.  All in all, highly recommended!
Appartement très fonctionnel, bien situé dans la ville. Un accueil chaleureux avec toutes les informations nécessaires.
Well located in close proximity to both airport and cruise shuttles. Well equipped (love the washer, dryer and detergent!) and of course wonderful communication made for a smooth stay.

Lovely apartment that perfectly suited our family's needs for multiple bedrooms & bathrooms. Close to public transportation and a short walk to La Rambla and the shore, and great restaurants & bars in the neighborhood.  Alex and Pillar were extremely accommodating our need for an early check-in/check-out.

For me this is one of best on Airbnb so far, Alex is very communicative, warm and make us feel very welcoming 

The flat itself, just perfect, we arrived at 33 degree and they have turned on the aircon for us, no word could describe how nice we've felt, the flat has totally everything you need, come with all the drinks and snacks, and surprisingly they even have a dryer, it makes things so much easier.

Absolutely no negative comments from us if you were looking to read any, sorry! :)

Well located, in close proximity to the airport and cruise shuttles perfect for a family of 5 and well equipped with everything we needed (a washing machine, dryer and detergent are particularly handy!). The wonderful communication was so helpful and much appreciated.

Nous avons passé une superbe semaine dans cet appartement. Celui ci est très bien équipé, proche du metro à 15 mn a pied de la rambla, c est top ! La communication avec les propriétaires c est très bien passée, c était notre 1ere expérience airbnb, nous recommancerons!

Me and my 4 friends really enjoyed staying here, and we had some great hosts that you could tell really cared. The place was exactly as described, close to everything, and decked out with some snacks and drinks for our check-in. Nothing to worry about here, book this if you're travelling to Barcelona!
Great apartment, fantastic location and very attentive hosts! Would definitely come back here again. Nicely stocked with essentials and a couple of treats!

This is an absolute gem of a place to stay in beautiful Barcelona. The communication by the hosts was excellent from the start, with Alex being very responsive to queries by email and Pilar giving us an extensive tour of the apartment when we arrived, as well as showing us a map of Barcelona and giving us some top tips about what to see and how to get around the city during our 3 day visit. The apartment is extremely light, quiet (despite its central location), clean, well equipped and well located. The air conditioning works very well and is quiet, the beds are comfortable, and the black out blinds meant that we could sleep in easily! We felt very much at home here and would heartily recommend this apartment to others.
Excelente lugar y gente! El apartamento es amplio y comodo, con  todo lo necesario para poder disfrutar de la mejor manera la estadía en Barcelona..
Great flat in a great location. The drinks were very appreciated. Easy to walk to most places in the old town.
Was a bit small for the group of 5
Très bon accueil logement parfait très propre et très bien équipé. Je recommande!

A great place to stay in Barcelona. Pilar met us on arrival to show us around and help us park. She provided us with lots of good advice around what to see and do, as well as where to eat. The apartment was great. It was even stocked with some drinks to enjoy.
Amazing hosts, clean, very large and great location. Would stay again and highly recommend to anyone!
Superbe accueil de maman Pilar avec des attentions. Appartement hyper calme bien placé.
Muy tranquilo lugar, amplio y limpio con todas  las comodidades, muy atentos lis anfitriones.

Our hosts were very warm and accommodating - they let us leave our bags a bit early, and check out a bit later. The space is lovely - a nice modern building with good kitchen and eating space, and they left us a fairly well-stocked fridge. There's not a lot of space in the bedrooms but we managed (keeping the suitcases in the closet). The master bed is quite firm - ok for my spouse but I ended up sleeping on the couch (which worked out fine). Others might not have a problem, but I have sore hips. The double bed is softer, and there is also a single bed in a very small room.
公寓位置不错,房东很热情,我们到达很晚,房东依然等待接待我们,并且在加泰罗尼亚独立公投的时候提醒我们交通罢工情况,很贴心｡房间不大,不过很干净

Brilliant apartment in a great location, only a 2 minute walk to the nearest metro station and only a 10 minute walk to the city center. Based in a nice neighborhood with plenty of bars, places to eat and supermarkets within walking distance. Alex, Javi and Pilar were nice enough to stock the apartment with some beverages for us including tea, coffee, milk and beer. The apartment was very stylish. clean and fit a family of 4 comfortably. Alex was very easy to get in touch with, met us at the apartment to show us around when we checked in and Pilar met us on check out. Would highly recommend the apartment and would definitely stay again.

This apartment afforded lots of space for our group of four friends. We found treats in the kitchen when we arrived: chocolate, biscuits, beer and cola in the fridge, and more. We made meals together in the well-appointed kitchen - there are several grocery stores right around the corner - after full days out and about in Barcelona. Getting around is a snap with several Metro stations in easy walking distance and it was a pleasure to get back to a comfortable, safe, and clean apartment that is off the tourist track but in a neighborhood full of shops and restaurants. We really appreciated the well-stocked paper products in the kitchen and bathrooms, the comfortable beds, lots of storage in the bedroom closets, and the super fast and reliable wi-fi. We enjoyed a world-class musical one early Friday night at a theater only five minutes walking distance from the apartment. Check-in was a breeze. Alex answered all of our questions and even ordered taxis to the airport for us on the day we checked out. We couldn't have asked for more. A delightful place to stay!

Très bel appartement avec 3 chambres séparées et magnifique vue du 6e étage. Bon accueil, ponctuel de la part de nos hôtes. Produits de base disponibles dans la cuisine, c'est pratique + boissons fraîches dans le frigo, c'est sympa !
Possibilité de garer sa voiture en sous-sol (étroit, mais possible avec un véhicule 7 places).
Great place in Barcelona with good connections to metro. Very clean, and easy communication with owners!

This is a really nice & cosy home - great location with easy access to metro & bus as well as walk8ng distance to Gothic quarter & Ramblas. The place was clean & had adequate kitchen utensils etc. We were two parents with two adult kids & were able to fit all of us. Also the hosts were gracious enough to let us check in early as our son arrived there by an earlier flight. I would recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Barcelona!

The apartment was in a great location, walking distance to almost every area, especially gothic district, with a nice view in the master bedroom and living room. The space has great natural light as well. Our flight landed quite late, but Pilar was kindly there to greet us. She was very sweet, and gave us a thorough walkthrough of not only the apartment, but also a map of Barcelona. The fridge had drinks which was also a thoughtful touch. I would absolutely recommend this apartment to anyone staying in Barcelona.

Everything was fine. The apartment is silent, close to the main attractions. A lot of amenities are available. Pilar gave us a wonderful tourist insight on the city. Guests are flexible regarding check in and out hours.

The apartment was in a good location - easy walking to all sites and not noisy.  The parking place was an added bonus!  The bedrooms are on the small side, and the tiny room with the double bed is really only comfortable for one person.  The amenities are a wonderful touch though and made the experience even better.
Nice apartment, good location near the old quarter (a bit grittier than the posher bits of Barcelona but kinda liked that!), helpful hosts, nice touches (left us some crisps and biscuits and beer).
We enjoyed our stay in the apartment. It’s very spacious. Parking is in the same building. Close to supermarkets and restaurants

Loved how good the hosts were with their communication. They made us all feel extremely welcome when we arrived at the apartment. The apartment is in an amazing location, lots of supermarkets nearby, tips on what is good around the apartment were very useful. Heating, bedding, towels, blackout shutters, warm water for the showers was brilliant. 
There was a personal touch of beer and coke in the fridge which we all enjoyed very much. Thank you very much, I shall recommend you to my friends!
Pilar will welcome you and give you great tips on where to go. Many amenities close by open 24 hours a day.  Two subways close too.

Fast responses, really hospitable, clean, kind and generous. We'd definitely stay again. Great spot, excellent facilities and we couldn't have asked for more when it came to contact. They saves us after another Airbnb fell through the day we arrived, totally grateful.

Alex, Javi and Pilar are fantastic, they took, Pilar gave me tips about where to go in town and (where not to go) ;-) best places to visit, how to use in-house devices, double keys... 
The flat is well located, if you come for party don't rent a car it is useless as Barcelona is quiet big, the flat managers are super friendly, and communicative, they are just amazing! THANK YOU GUYS!
Our stay in Barcelona in this apartment was great! Walking distance to old town, many great restaurants around. Nice view from the apartment.
Très bon accueil de Pilar, pleine de gentillesse et de bons conseils pour nos visites de Barcelone.

L'appartement est très confortable et tout à fait conforme aux descriptions. Il a été très facile d'échanger avec Pilar et elle nous a parfaitement bien accueillis. Merci beaucoup pour tout. A bientôt
Very nice family. Very good place and trustful people.
Excellent emplacement pour visiter la ville. L'appartement est idéale pour 2 adultes et 2 adolescents. Le parking est un plus bien appréciable et nos logeurs ont été à l'écoute de nos demande.
Appartement proche des ramblas et du métro super séjour

Très bel appartement ! 
Bien situé, très bien équipé !!
Je conseille cet appartement !

Book this place you won’t regret it.  Clean, great location, excellent host.  We were a family of four exploring Barcelona for the first time and were given great tips by Pilar.  The apartment was a lovely space with everything you need for a great stay.

Nice apartment 
Near La Rambla
Every thing nice and clean but there are 2 rooms with bed small little bit 

Nice place to stay 
I suggest
Best regards

Home away from home.  This is our fourth stay with Alex/Javi and Pilar.  Each time has been exceptional.  The apartment is always fully stocked.  Additional items like water, beer, cola, cookies were provided.  Pilar is a joy and has always been there to greet us.   Check in and out is always easy.  I would definitely recommend this apartment to everyone.

Excellent location!  We walked everywhere!  The neighborhood is safe and convenient. Our hosts met us to check in right on the time we designated. The apartment is a good size. We had 3 of us stay. The only issue was hot water, but we worked that out by splitting shower times between morning and night. Overall a great place in the heart of Barcelona.

Stayed in Alex’s apartment for 2 nights with a family of five. We drove in from Valencia in minivan and were met by Pilar, who does not speak any English but was very friendly and helpful with a lot a helpful local info. There is secure parking, but it is VERY tight, and not meant for minivans.  It was somewhat amazing that I made it in and out without any damage to the vehicle.  The apartment is in a decent area, close to metro stops and good restaurants, especially in Poble-Sec, but going a few blocks into El Raval it gets a little scuzzy and I would avoid at night. It is a pretty easy mile walk to the old town/plaza Catalunya area.  The apartment is nice and clean and very functional if not luxurious. One bedroom with a larger bed, and two smaller bedrooms with beds that can really only sleep one adult/teen. The couch can be used as a bed, although not overly comfortable. Two nice bathrooms. Washer and dryer very convenient. Kitchen area was very nice, and the hosts even left some beers and cokes.  Nice little supermarket just 2 doors down. Alex was a good communicator, and was flexible about checkout time for us. Recommended.
Great place. Would recommend to others.

Gostei!
...espero poder voltar!

Spacious apartment in central Barcelona. Pilar was a lovely host and gave us many tips on transportation and where to go. She kindly guided us into our parking space in a tight garage:) Apartment lovely and clean, we may have used more than our fair share of Nespresso pods during our stay. The washer and dryer where terrific.  Apartment well equipped!

Our stay in Barcelona was the last stop in 3 European cities as well as our third airbnb of the trip.  Travel issues delayed our arrival until 11pm but we were still personally greeted by our host, given a tour of the apartment and provided complimentary beer, coffee, soda and advice on seeing the sights of Barcelona. This was a huge contrast from the other two stays where we did not meet our hosts at all. The apartment was clean, perfectly equipped, and in an awesome energetic area.

The apartment is situated within easy walking distance of the port area and not far from the famous La Rambla. There are lots of restaurants and bars close by.
We were welcomed by the lovely Javi who, despite limited English, explained everything and gave us plenty of advice on where to visit and where to avoid. We would certainly stay there again.
Great for tourism. Nice guests. Full equiped flat with securised parking place.

This spotless, beautiful apartment is the perfect base from which to explore Barcelona. Pilar was waiting for us in front of the building when we arrived, and even though her English and our Spanish/Catalan is limited, we had no trouble understanding the very thorough instructions/advice/tips she gave us upon check-in.  Lovely touches throughout, e.g., blackout shades, refrigerated drinks, Nespresso, bath gel.  The beds are super comfy; there is a wonderful view from the master bedroom and living area; and the sounds of the city are muffled (so we slept well at night).  It was also extremely handy to have access to a washer/dryer.  We would stay here again in a heartbeat.

We rented the apt. for 2 night before going on a cruise. It was just as they described!! Very clean and they left drinks and snacks which was a special touch. Great location with market and bars and restaurants very close by.

Pilar personally met us in the front door. The place is super clean. The beds are all comfortable. You have almost everything you need when you wish to cook your own meals. The grocery is just around the corner. Not far from the metro station. I would definitely love to come back.
This place was AMAZING. The flat was clean,  it was in a centrally located area, and the hosts were very accommodating. 10/10 would recommend staying at their flat.

Nous recommandons cet appartement très agréable et très bien équipé. Seul petit bémol pour un des lits deux places qui est petit. Les hôtes sont très réactifs et disponibles et ils mettent tout en oeuvre pour rendre service.

Las fotos son muy reales y las atenciones de Pilar muy buenas. Además de dejarnos un surtido de bebidas y los elementos necesarios para nuestro bienestar nos hizo recomendaciones de cómo movernos más cómodamente y estuvo siempre a nuestra disposición .muy agradecidos.

We had a great stay in the apartment. It is not huge but ideal for 4 or 5 people with every amenity you need. The communication with Alex was excellent at all times. Pilar is a gem. What a lovely helpful lady. We wanted to take her home with us. There are lots of restaurants nearby, the Tapas street was a 10 min walk, the train station is 5 mins away and the Sant Antoni market 5 mins away too. The parking was essential for us and with an ever enthusiastic Pilar guiding us into the tight parking garage, all was safe for our stay. We appreciated the free beer,coke and biscuits and Pilar even paid for our coffees at the cafe below when we arrived earlier than expected! Not her fault...ours! Nice place, great people.

This apartment is great for families.  The special touches of beer, sodas, coffee and bathroom supplies were a sweet surprise.  The apartment is within walking distance to La Rambla and Poble-Sec.  You can catch the Metro just two blocks away and easily travel the city. There are 5 grocery stores within the block to get any supplies you need. The beds were comfy and the AC worked great.  The washer and dryer were such a bonus and they even left washer pods for us to use. If you are going to Barcelona, this is a great place.

Traveling with our two son's this was the perfect apartment in many ways.  The space itself was more than adequate as each boy had his own room and shared a bath.  Beds were comfortable.  Rooms adequately dark for sleeping and the AC worked great.  The living space was comfortable.  Provided toiletries, coffee and beer were nice touches and appreciated.  The location w as a great place to explore all of Barcelona's greatest hits.  Las Ramblas is a 10 minute walk, the subway less than 5.  Cabs are easily accessible one block away.  We discovered the neighborhood was equally vibrant and found some nice restaurants and bars.  Great place, great communication, great stay.

This was a great apt in a fairly newly rehabbed building. Good elevator, secure doors, nice view from the penthouse. Great A/C. The fridge even came stocked with a few beers, cokes and waters. No less than 3 grocery stores in a 3 block radius.

Pilar greeted us and couldn't have been nicer. She spent time showing us the whole map of Barcelona. Location was stellar; close to Metro stops, 15-20 minute walk to La Rambla. Neighborhood seemed very safe, lots of nice little shops everywhere. We had the most fun on Blai St, which is a walking street full of tapas bars about 10 minutes walk in the Poble Sec. La Tasqueta de Blai! Highly recommended. Closest metro stop connects right to the Mt Montjuic funicular for a fantastic view of the city and the old castle up there and surrounding parks. To save money, consider riding up and walking down through all the gardens. 

The Passieg de Gracia is the area where the Gaudi house and Casa Mila are located, and is a beautiful wide walking street. You will be absolutely amazed at the amount of street cafes. 

Also, the L3 green line is at the closest stop, Paral.lel, and it connects directly to the Aeropuerto Train for 4.60E. Little did we know the Gay Pride parade was scheduled for 5 PM on the Paral.lel two blocks away. Entertaining if you're open-minded.

The apartment itself is compact but well appointed with plenty of room for atleast 5 people. All the amenities are modern and well maintained and we appreciated the child friendly crockery and cutlery as well as the fact that there were basic food supplies as well as thoughtful touches like the cold beer and other beverages for us in the fridge. 
The apartment is a stone's throw away from interesting bars and food places and commuting was not a problem at all. 
Alex was wonderful enough to agree to babysit our children for one evening when we made a last minute plan to attend the JayZ/Beyonce concert in Barcelona and he also ended up helping with our laundry and dishes as well. Such a treat!
The one thing I would ask future occupants who are driving a car to be aware of is that the parking space in the garage is extremely tight and it is a very stressful experience parking the vehicle in the space assigned to us. My husband who is an expert driver ended up denting our rental car (remember to always pay that little extra for comprehensive insurance) twice trying to negotiate those turns. 
All in all, a beautiful, sunny, well ventilated apartment with modern amenities and fabulous hosts. We would return in a heartbeat!

A great apartment with a lift and arriving to find cold drinks and coffee pods waiting for us was wonderful! Pilar was very accommodating when we arrived earlier than planned and showed us how everything worked in the apartment. The beds were comfy and we all slept well. Our rental car was an Alfa Romeo Stalvio and the carpark was a struggle to get to and got scratched. Also an FYI, we went out on the first night and headed right which wasn’t so desirable at night but turning left for dinner the next 2 nights worked out better.

Apartment as described. Great location.  Easy walk to town center. Fantastic hosts - leaving cold drinks in the fridge for us after our long drive. Communication was excellent. Free parking on site is also another great bonus.
Great hospitality!  Great apt!

This is the perfect apartment for a stay in Barcelona! There is a parking space with the flat, which is safe and secure and accessible via a lift from the apartment. Our hosts were fantastic, excellent communication ahead of our stay and then Pilar met us at the apartment to check us in and show us around the flat.

The flat itself is spacious and very clean. There is air con, which was brilliant (it was 36C when we visited) and the fridge was stocked with beer, soft drinks and milk - such a nice touch.

It was about a 10/15 minute walk from La Rambla, a perfect location for sightseeing. We would absolutely stay here again.

We loved this place. The apartment was perfect, very spacious and comfortable and had everything we needed. The air conditioning was particularly welcome! We hope to come back some time and would wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone. Great, helpful hosts and a wonderful location.

Alex, Pilar en Javi verhuren een prachtig appartement mét parkeerplaats in garage in het centrum van Barcelona, slechts vijftien minuten lopen van La Rambla. Omringt door talloze eetgelegenheden en op steenworp afstand van een recent geopende overdekte markt. De ontvangst is hartelijk en de toelichting op wat er allemaal te beleven is uitermate uitgebreid - super! Ook het openbaarvervoer is dichtbij. Het appartement is netjes, de ijskast gevuld met bier, water en frisdrank. Daarnaast is de keuken voorzien van alle gemakken. De slaapvoorzieningen zijn voldoende voor twee volwassenen en drie kinderen, maar maximaal vier volwassenen. Kortom, wij raden dit appartement zeker aan!

Appartement très bien équipé, fonctionnel avec parking, parfait pour une famille, dans Barcelone !
On recommande!!!
Accueil et départ très bien géré, avec beaucoup de flexibilité.

We really enjoyed our stay at Alex, Javi and Pilar’s! The hosts are very friendly and flexible. The location of the flat is fantastic too. The parking was especially useful as we came with a car. Highly recommended!

Appartement tout confort avec parking, bien situé (20 min à pieds du vieux Barcelone). Accueil très sympathique, sans oublier les boissons au frais dans le frigo !
Wifi de bon débit. Une très bonne adresse !

This flat was exceptionally clean and well appointed for our stay.  The hosts were so kind and ensured we had drinks and all amenities.  It was great to have that extra touch!  I highly recommend this flat for anyone looking to visit Barcelona!  Thank you so much!
Couldn’t be a better location with interesting street views. Modern and extremely well equipped. Perfect introduction from hosts making us feel very much at home.

Alex, Javi and Pilar’s apartment was lovely, spacious, clean and in a great location. I received a message before hand with all of the details and arranged to meet outside the apartment. We were able to check-in early which was great! We were met outside the apartment and were provided with a full tour of the apartment, a map of the city and recommended the places to go and what to avoid, which was really helpful! There was also some treats in the fridge which was a great touch including Coca Cola and beer. We had an amazing stay and would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Barcelona! Thank you Alex, Javi and Pilar x
Great place to stay in walking distance to many attractions in Barcelona. Close to 3 metro stations and great hosts.

The place was absolutely beautiful, very clean and comfortable. They had thought of everything to make our stay great; from the wonderful coffee to the extra European plugs for our electric devices. 
They also let us check in much earlier than stated when we got there early morning. 
We had a wonderful experience.

This was a perfect place to stay! The location was easy to het to and then easy to het everywhere either walking or public trans. Lots of restaurants in walking distance too. The place was very clean, spacious, and comfortable. Alex met us to check in and helped get our car into the space then went through a map with us to make sure we knew how to get to the places we wanted to see. He was very helpful! Pilar helped us with the car when we left and gave us a warm farewell. We are so glad we stayed here and would highly recommend it to anyone. Thanks Alex, Javi, and Pilar!!!
到达时房东亲自来带路,虽然语言不通,但是丝毫不影响我们的沟通,房东热情的帮我们停车,帮我们介绍设施,告诉我们公寓的位置以及各个景点｡虽然房子不在市中心,但出行还是很方便及安全的｡因此极力推荐此公寓,下次来还是会考虑入住｡

Our stay at Alex, Javi and Pilar's place was fantastic! Communication was fast and easy.  The place was clean and comfortable. They even stocked the kitchen with coffee, water, soda and beer --- a very nice touch!

A lovely apartment, conveniently located close to public transit, La Ramla, and other sites. We never met Javi, but Alex and Pilar were great hosts, always quick to respond to our questions and help out when needed.

A great apartment in the heart of Barcelona, walking distance to many of the sights and close enough the Metro for further travel. Plenty of Tapas Bars, Restaurants, Supermarket and the biggest soccer/football store we’ve ever seen close by for convenience.
The apartment would suit both families and a group of friends travelling.

Great location and spacious apartment! We really liked the location as you can walk or metro to all sites but apartment is on a quiet street. Pilar met us and gave us great tips on how to get around. Blai street is just a few blocks away and has a lot of fun tapas bars. This apartment is highly recommended!
We (4 adults and 2 kids) had a wonderful stay. highly recommended!

This was a great place to stay. The location was easy to get around to all the main parts of the city. The hosts were very kind and thoughtful. This is a nice place for families since it has the three bedrooms and two baths.

We really enjoyed our stay.  Thanks to all for your thoughtful gifts. The complimentary beer, coke and snacks were really appreciated. Be aware that parking can be tight for larger cars, however Pilar is an expert at guiding you to the space. We can really recommend this place when staying in Barcelona.
We had a great 2 night stay. Pilar is a wonderful resource with all the best places to visit. Apartment is in a convenient location.
Accueil particulièrement sympathique de la part de Pilar. L’appartement est conforme à la description, et est très bien situé.

Super departamento en el centro de Barcelona, cerca  de lineas de métro, restaurantes,supermercados , excelente ubicacion y barrio muy tranquilo y seguro, . Todo muy bien équipado y cómodo, muy limpio y funcional.  Atendido personalmente por sus dueños muy atentos y agradables. Con muncho Gusto regresariamos ahi en nuestro próximo viaje a Barcelona.
Appart au top, excellent accueil, tres arrangeants et des petites attentions. Nous recommendons!!

Alex, Javi and Pilar are still one of the best team we've ever experienced. This was our 3rd time in their flat and that is still a pleasure. Every time we discover new adresses around. Definitely our best secret in BCN. We'll be back soon !!
Appartement sympa et proche du centre ville
Nice place y a really nice location. Wonderful hosts very helpful and always supporting. Super baby/children/family friendly premises and appreciated flexibility!
Fantastic !
agréable séjour dans cet appartement
Piso muy limpio agradable, cómodo con el parking. Trato buenísimo y respuesta muy rápidas ! Muy recomendable

Appartement parfaitement conforme (dont les deux salle-de-bain très appréciables à 4+ personnes), de très gentilles attentions (capsule de café, boissons à disposition, carte de barcelone), excellente connexion internet, proche métro-épicerie-café, et le parking est un gros plus (malgré l’étroitesse j'ai quand même plus garer une 308 Break). Alex, Javi et Pilar sont très facilement joignable et parlent parfaitement l'anglais si besoin. Nous avons passé un super séjour. Bravo !!!
Location is very nice, close to Rambla, Tavernas. Very friendly owner. Appartement is well equiped.
Super séjour !

Appartement confortable et très bien situé.
Tres bon accueil.

name: Quarto Acolhedor
