정말 제발 가지마세요. 제가 에어비앤비 후기에 가지말라는 글들 보면 ' 뭐 얼마나 안좋아서 저러는거지? 그냥 개인차이이겠지~'하며 반신반의 했었는데 그 분들이 후기를 왜 쓰셨는지 이제야 이해가 가네요. 진짜 나쁜 후기들 걸러내지 마시고 꼭 읽으세요!! 이 숙소 후기를 보니 굉장히 깨끗하고 좋았다는 후기들이 많아서 사진으로 보기에 엄청 좋다는 느낌은 받지 못했지만 그래도 '괜찮겠지?'라는 생각으로 여행 전날 결제를 했습니다. 2/20일 저녁 비행기여서 호스트에게 양해를 구하고 저녁에 아주 조용히 들어갔습니다. 체크인을 21일 오전12시30분에 했는데 들어가는 순간 흠칫 놀랐습니다. 신발을 놓아야 할 곳에 먼지들이 많고 머리카락이 먼저 보이더군요. 한가닥 한가닥이 아니라 그냥 누가봐도 청소 안한 것 같은 그런 느낌이요. 심지어 냄새도 칙칙한 냄새가 났구요. 그래도 저는 이 부분만 그러려니 하고 불을 켰는데 와...정말 사진과 다르더라구요. 사진보다 더욱 칙칙하고 구조는 같아도 물건은 오래되어있구요. 바닥은 그냥 청소를 아예 안했어요. 제가 가족여행이어서 부모님과 함께 있을 숙소를 알아봤었는데 처음에 이 숙소를 보시고 엄마는 "음...우리가 청소하면 되지."라는 말씀을 하셨고 아빠도 동의하셨습니다. 그래서 저희가 청소라도 하려고 봤는데 물걸레 두개는 아스팔트 닦은 것처럼 정말 너무 더러워서 아예 쓰지도 못하게 생겼고 먼지가 다껴있는 상태였구요. 제가 그래서 호스트에게 연락을 하려고 핸드폰을 봤는데 핸드폰에 개미가 올라와있었어요. 2마리가 제 핸드폰에서 돌아다니고 있어서 얼른 죽였는데 바닥을 보니 개미가 돌아다니고 있었어요. 그래서 어디에서 오는 건지 보려고 바닥 상태를 보니까....조명이 어둡고 바닥 자체가 나무처럼 되어있는 바닥이어서 몰랐는데 자세히 보니 라면 부스러기, 머리카락, 먼지, 음식물이 바닥에 붙어서 찐득해져 있는 것 그대로 있었어요. 그러니까 청소가 안되어있는거죠. 그리고 그 찐득한 음식물들 위에 개미들이 몰렸던거고요. 동생은 너무 싫다며 소파 위에 서서 내려오지도 못했고 엄마는 방이라도 보겠다며 들어가셨는데 이불이 어디있는지 보시려다가 곰팡이 냄새와 창고냄새가 너무 심하게 나서 방 안에 있는 간이 옷장(천)을 여시니 진짜 그 냄새는...잊을 수가 없습니다. 정말 최악이죠. 저희는 이 곳을 3박에 42만원이 넘는 돈을 주고 예약을 했고 사실 호텔도 이보다 더 저렴하고 좋은 곳들이 많았습니다. 하지만 주방이 있어서 에어비앤비를 이용해 이 숙소를 예약한 건데 정말 최악이더군요. 이 호스트가 체크인 전 메시지로 얘기하기로는 자신의 집은 싼 편이며 좋은 편이라고, 이보다 더 좋은 서비스를 누리려면 한박에 2000달러인가 그 정도는 되어야한다고 얘기했었는데 그게 무슨 말인지 싶더라구요. 이 방은 여관수준인데요ㅋㅋ아, 그리고 저희가 너무 예민하다 생각하시는 분들도 있으실 것 같아요. 저희는 거의 10년동안 동남아와 중국에서 살았구요, 그래서 위생에 관해서는 관대하다고 자신할 수 있습니다. 그래서 저희는 호스트에게 연락을 했고 전액환불을 요청했습니다. 이런 곳에서 3박을 자야한다니...못하겠단 생각이 들어서 저희는 그 날 다른 호텔을 잡지 못해도 무조건 밖으로 나가야겠다는 생각을 하고 메시지를 보냈습니다. 호스트는 그 다음날 청소를 해주거나 우리 스스로 청소를 하고 홍콩달러 100달러를 주겠다고 얘기하며 둘 중 어떤 것이 좋냐고 물어봤습니다. 전 이 부분에서도 이해가 안된게 청소도구가 정말정말 더러워서 사용할 수가 없었는데 어떻게 우리가 청소를 하란말이며 그 값이 홍콩달러 100원밖에 안되고, 다른 방안으로 그 다음날 방을 청소해주겠다고 한다는 건 벌레가 돌아다니는 이 방에서 하룻밤을 자라는 건데 정말 호스트가 책임감이 없다는 걸로 느껴졌습니다. 심지어 우리가 예민하다는 듯 얘기하더라구요. 저희는 홍콩 문화가 신발 신고 들어와서 자는 곳인줄 알았습니다. 그 정도로 더러웠거든요...이 문제가 해결되지 않았는데 호스트는 답장이 없었고 결국 저희는 전액환불을 받지 못한 채로 1시간 뒤 쯤 체크아웃을 하고 나와 다른 호텔을 잡으려 돌아다녔습니다. 그렇게 새벽 3시 반이 넘어가는 시간에 호텔을 잡았구요. 최종적으로 저희는 전액환불을 받지 못했어요. 이 호스트는 저희에게 돈을 줄 수 없다고 얘기를 했고 다행히도 좋은 상담사님을 만나 최대한을 받았지만 호스트가 부담하는 건 그저 제가 한 예약취소에서 자동으로 환불되는 부분일 뿐이었구요. 에어비앤비는 사람대 사람으로 소통을 하는 곳인데 이 호스트는 아니더군요. 여러분 절대 가지마세요. 이 돈 주고 차라리 호텔을 가세요. 제가 에어비앤비 처음 이용하는 것도 아니니 정말 제 말을 믿으시길 바랄게요. Please don't go. When I read the postscript on Airbnb, I thought "How bad is that? It's just a personal difference.". I thought it'd be a personal difference. But now I understand why they wrote the latter part. Don't filter out the really bad reviews and be sure to read them!! When I saw the riviews of this dorm, there were a lot of comments saying that it was very clean and nice. I didn't get the feeling that it was really good to see from the pictures, but I paid the bill the day before the trip. It was a flight on the evening of February 20th, so I asked my host to excuse me and went in the dorm very quietly in the night. I checked in at 12:30 a.m. on the 21st. I was surprised when I came in. Where I had to put my shoes, there was a lot of dust and I could see hair first. It's not a single thing. It's just that I don't think anyone has cleaned it. Even the smell smelled dull. But I though it's ok. And turned on the light (Website hidden by Airbnb) really different from the picture. Even though it's more dull and has the same structure, it's older. Anyone didn't clean the floor at all. I was looking for a place to stay with my parents because it was a family trip, and when we first looked at this place, my mom said, "Well...We can clean it up." And my dad also agreed. So we tried to clean it up. The two dregs were so dirty that they couldn't be used at all. They were all covered in dust. So I looked at my phone to contact the host and there was an ant on my cell phone. Two of them were walking around on my cell phone, so I killed them quickly. But when I looked at the floor, there are ants. So I looked at the floor to see where it came from.I didn't know because the light was dark and the floor was like flooring with spots on it. But when I looked closely, I found that the ramen crumbs, hair, dust, and food were stuck on the floor and it was That's why it's not cleaned. And there were ants on top of the food. After my yougersister saw that, she couldn't get down on the couch. And my mom went in to see where the blanket was, but the smell of mold and the warehouse was so bad that he opened the closet in the room, and it really smelled like...I can't forget it. It's the worst. We paid more than $2900 for a three-night reservation, and in fact, the hotel was cheaper and there were many better places. But I wanted to...

This place is amazing for following reasons:
Quick access to MTR
Super good host
Clean 
Beautiful furniture 
Enough place for a family to stay.

I highly recommend this place for decent stay in Hong kong

name: The carioca way of life
summary: Next to the subway station, supermarkets, beachs,  and restaurants. Relaxing and safety place. With a bike or by bus you can know all the touristics points of the city, like pão de açúcar, corcovado, Copacabana, lapa, MAM, CCBB and Santa Teresa.
space: Apartamento muito agradável e silencioso, ultimo andar. Pé direito alto, e boa circulação de ar. Construída com muito esforço e carinho para se viver bem aconchegante.
description: Next to the subway station, supermarkets, beachs,  and restaurants. Relaxing and safety place. With a bike or by bus you can know all the touristics points of the city, like pão de açúcar, corcovado, Copacabana, lapa, MAM, CCBB and Santa Teresa. Apartamento muito agradável e silencioso, ultimo andar. Pé direito alto, e boa circulação de ar. Construída com muito esforço e carinho para se viver bem aconchegante. Nas redondezas possuímos cafés, pizzarias, sorveterias, quatro grandes supermercados, salões de beleza, lavanderia, e comércio de forma geral, tudo isso acessível á pé. Estarei sempre a disposição para o que for necessário, inclusive de adequação do imóvel as necessidades do locatário. Vizinhança familiar, o respeito é essencial devido ao silencio do local. Transporte público para todos os locais da cidade. Estação de metrô a uma quadra de distância.

reviews.comments: A estadia foi ótima! Pedro é super solícito, o ap muito bem localizado e com boas facilidades. Recomendo.
Apartamento excelente! Super recomendável!

Pedro's apartment is very simple, but it still has everything you need, also the whole house has a lot of heart-warming personal touches here and there.
Pedro is a very caring person who would always respond the quickest as possible, he was always available during our 2 month stay.
He is very practical and helped us a lot moving in and out.

We even hang out together one night! Pedro is very friendly and funny.

The place is very well located, near "Aterro do Flamengo", the subway, A LOT of supermarkets, some bakeries, drugstores, pizza and natural food.

I would definitely go back there. It's an excellent value for money.
Thanks very much Pedro.
Espaço bastante iluminado pelo sol e espaçoso.

neighborhood_overview: Located in the Old Bellerive neighborhood on the eastern part of the Hochelaga-Mercier riding. A typical Montreal neighborhood in the most traditional sense along with Scottish brick houses and a true sense of community. The area faces the spectacular port of Montreal. Safe and family-friendly, the neighborhood has been gentrifying over the last years, attracting young families with its closeness to all needed amenities, ease of access to downtown, public transportation and its gorgeous nearby waterfront Parc Bellerive.
transit: The apartment is a block away from a bus stop on Notre Dame that travels west and can take you to downtown. Otherwise, by car, access to Notre Dame gives the most straightforward access to Old Port and downtown Montreal.

reviews.comments: Logement et accueil très agréable. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour!
tout étais bien parfait !!

Gabe's place is the best value I have found yet! It's large, beautiful and not too far from the hustle and bustle but still comfortably secluded. Everything was in tip top shape, he was kind and courteous and made sure the place was perfectly serviced in quick fashion!
We had a comfortable stay at Gabriel’s place. The place may be old but everything else was great! It was quite spacious with all the needed amenities to feel right at home :)
Older house style with modern conveniences.  Awesome stay and very comfortable beds.  Every kids was quite happy with their own space.

Étant une grande famille de six personnes, nous venons de trouver un endroit merveilleux : chez Gabriel!

Les enfants auraient aimé y passer plus de temps, et nous aussi! Toutes les commodités y étaient : cuisine bien équipée, lits confortables et salon meublé adéquatement pour notre famille. 

Très à l’écoute et réceptif, notre hôte fût exemplaire. Les consignes pour notre arrivée et l’utilisation des services étaient très précises et claires. Merci pour tout!

A great place to stay for a great price with all the amenities that were included. I would recommend this house for a quick stay in Montreal. Gabriel was an amazing host and helped with every problem we had.

Gabe was super helpful and quick to respond when we had trouble getting in to the location, and we really appreciated that.  Heads up - the upstairs neighbors have very young children, so there was a bit of noise early in the morning.  Our stay was fantastic, and everything was clean.  The space was beautiful, well-decorated, and had everything we needed.  Thank you, Gabe!
Great location, excellent value. Very clean and spacious, would definitely recommend and look to re-book again when i visit Montreal.
l accueil et le séjour étaient plus que parfait !
Beautiful place, all new appliances was a huge plus. Upstairs neighbors were VERY loud in the evening. This old building doesn't dampen sound at all.

Nos hôtes étaient géniaux et très attentionnés! L’accueil était superbe et l’appartement aussi. Merci encore une fois pour ce beau séjour!
Vincent
Comfy clean place to stay.

My family and I stayed here for 4 nights. The place was perfectly sized, clean, fresh linens and enough towels. My kids loved it and I am still thinking about how comfortable the “cloud like” king sized bed was. The distance to the city was just right. Once we got our bearings and didn’t need uber anymore we found that navigation back was easy. 10/10 would stay here again.

Vous pouvez loger chez Gabriel en toute confiance. C'est un hôte réactif et agréable qui répond rapidement et qui essaye de trouver des solutions. Entrée dans les lieux parfaite et logement très chaleureux et très propre. A recommander !
Un logement très chaleureux et digne d’un hôtel 5 étoiles de par sa propreté, l’accessibilité des équipements et le design.

Nous recommandons sans réserve.

The appartment was perfectly clean, tidy, it’s big and well decorated ! The place is in a calm/residential area, but right next to the metro and within walking distance to the city center so really convenient. Thank you Susana!

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour à Porto. L’appartement est idéalement situé, 2 minutes à pied montre en main de la station de métro la plus proche et 15 minutes a pied du centre ville.
Le logement est proche de toutes les commodités.
Le logement est décoré avec goût, propre et bien équipé. 
Susana est une hôte attentionnée et disponible. Elle a été présente pour nous guider lors de notre séjour.
Encore merci Susana pour cet agréable séjour à Porto qui est une ville magnifique.

Clean and stylish apartment, couldn't ask for more. Close to the metro, breakfast bars and minutes away from local supermarkets. Sad the weather wasn't too great, did make the apartment quite chilly but the apartment has blankets and heaters! (if you travel in the winter) HIGHLY recommend staying here. Good location and easy to find. Susana was very helpful with recommendations on where to visit also! Thank you!
Gostei mais da casa ao vivo do que nas fotos! Bom gosto, localização tranquila e comodidade! Sentimo-nos em casa! Perfeito para um casal!

Susanna’s appartement looks and feels great. Everything you need is there. It’s close to the metro, there’s a supermarket close by and you can easily walk from the appartement to the city centre of Porto. The neigbourhood is quiet at night and the appartement is very comfortable. We enjoyed our stay here and would definitely recommend it to friends.

host.host_about: Nos encanta Barcelona, conocemos la ciudad y algunos de sus secretos. Podemos ayudarte a planificar tu visita.

reviews.comments: What a beautiful and spacious apartment in a very centralized and strategic location. To add to that, the hosts are extremely friendly and helpful and will assist with whatever needs you may have. I felt like I was at home in Barcelona! Thanks!!

The apartment was easy to get to, we just hopped on the Aerobus at BCN (leaves every 10 mins) and arrived in the central square Placa de Catalunya, from there is was a simple/flat 5 block walk.   Tomas works on-site and greeted us quickly.  He showed us the place, quickly rectified some missing towels and pointed out some local markets and shops on a map in his welcome booklet.   There was a small tourist tax to pay, which he collected and we signed the paperwork.   

The apartment was perfect for our needs (family of 4).  The layout was great; 2 kids in the middle room and adult space (bed/dining/living) on the street side.  The street is quite busy, and sleeping with open windows in the summer months could be an issue (but wasn't for us in Feb). The apartment was clean and bright with high ceilings.  Bedding was comfortable, good showers/bath, etc.   The kitchen was well appointed and covered most of our needs for breakfast and simple dinners.   There was even a well-stocked mini-bar!

The location is very central, between two metro stations and surrounded by bus lines - however, it is more of a residential neighbourhood instead of being in the heart of tourist locations, which some people may or may not appreciate.

We had some minor disappointments in the lack of some basic provisions that we had to buy (such as a box of facial tissues, paper napkins, kitchen roll and washing machine detergent- for the price, we thought these could have been provided), but on the whole the experience was very good and we highly recommend the apartment to anyone interested in a home-like place in central Barcelona.

This is a lovely apartment - I have stayed din many AirBNB apartments over the last few months and this ranks as one of the best.  It's light, large, very spacious, nicely decorated, great location on quiet streets but with easy access to everywhere and the host is always very fast and accessible for anything you need. 
We will be staying here again.

Très bel et grand appartement. Tout à fait conforme aux photos. Même mieux ! Et tres bien meublé et équipé. Mariana a été tres disponible pour nous accueillir malgré un décalage d'horaire. Le quartier est tres calme. Beaucoup de petits restos à tapas juste à côté et Meme une épicerie bio. A recommander absolument

O apartamento é lindo como aparece nas fotos, super espaçoso e com os equipamentos basicos para a sua estadia. Esta muito bem localizado, consegue-se visitar varios pontos turisticos a pé. A regiao é super tranquila, mas a noite da um pouco de barulho na suite principal.
Great apartment. Spacious, clean and great location.
立地条件がよくまた治安の不安も感じず､行動がしやすかったです｡鍵も部屋に入るまでに3か所あり安心感がありました｡ｽﾀｯﾌは対応が早く､親切でした｡最初の晩､ｶﾞｽ供給機能の故障があり､それに伴った不便は残念でした｡

We enjoyed staying at this apartment during your visit to Barcelona. It was centrally located near the Gothic area and was easy to walk to most places. The rooms are spacious and the ceilings are very high. Our best meal in Barcelona was around the corner at Casa Alfonso. We highly recommend that you go there and try the acorn fed jambon.

Beautiful apartment, we loved it. It had everything we wanted: space and style, central location, many attractions and public transport at walking distance, a lovely café downstairs in the same house, friendly hosts. Ramón welcomed us on arrival, Mariana and Tomàs were there on the day of departure, and all three of them are charming and helpful. We would love to go back there!

The pictures do not do this place justice! It’s a great apartment. Huge space, marble floors, tall ceilings, and French doors on every window facing the street. Mariana and Tomas were very responsive and accommodating when we checked in. They even ordered us a cab to the airport. Would definitely stay here again.
Excellent location and very nice apartment lots of space !  You won’t be disappointed

Mariana and Tomás’ apartment is a fantastic place to stay in Barcelona. It’s in a fantastic neighborhood in a very central location to all the main Barcelona attractions. The apartment itself is very spacious, comfortable, and clean. All around a 5+ star stay here.
thank you for all

Spacious, 2-bed apartment, in very central location. Comfortable beds, huge living / dining area. Both bedrooms ensuite. Well equipped kitchen. Secure building. Would definitely come back; no hesitation in recommending this accommodation.
Very clean and spacious suite in a great location!
Bon appartement, très lumineux et spacieux. Parfait pour un couple et 2 enfants !

This was a wonderful apartment.  The living area was even more spacious than the pictures could show.  The large windows brought in so much light.  It was bright and clean and very comfortable.  A lovely place to hang out and relax after being out all day and before going to dinner.  The location was great.  Enough away from the big tourist sights to avoid crowds and noise and to feel very safe, yet close enough to walk everywhere.  We easily walked to Plaza Catalunya and on to La Rambla and into the Gothic Quarter and all the way to the water.  For dinner and for further places,  a taxi ride was short and inexpensive, or you could take the metro.

Mariana met us at check in, was very responsive to any questions we had during our stay and, as she worked onsite, popped in to help us with a problem with the tv.  She also arranged a taxi for our departure as we had to leave for the airport at 6:30 on a Saturday morning.  As promised, the driver was waiting downstairs.  

We would highly recommend this apartment  and would stay here again next time we visit Barcelona.
Thank you very much, super stays
Lovely apartment close to the sites of Barcelona. Good communication from the hosts for getting to and inside the apartment. Fully equipped with smart TV and comfortable beds.
Todo perfecto

name: Inner-city sanctuary. Trendy area & huge courtyard
summary: Beautiful, quiet, newly renovated city apartment in lush Chippendale area. Stays cool in summer, and has a massive private courtyard with a barbecue and outdoor dining area. Includes a secure underground parking space. Surrounded by trendy cafes, restaurants, bars and galleries. Across the road from beautiful Victoria park (with outdoor pool). All within 5-15 minute walk are: Central station, Chinatown, trendy Newtown nightlife, Universities (Sydney Uni, UTS), CBD.
space: The apartment is our home, and we're away on holidays, so we have left all the amenities you may need for your stay. This includes items such as towels for the beach, ping-pong rackets and a basketball for the park, and a fully stocked kitchen. The apartment has been recently renovated, with a new kitchen, bathroom, and courtyard, so it's ultra comfortable. Additionally, it's perfect for Summer, as the outdoor area gets lots of sun, which is great for lounging around, yet the inside area remains in the shade, so the indoors are nice and cool.

There's so many amazing bars, cafes and galleries on the doorstep. If you reach out to us, we'll happily let you know our favorites in the area.  In terms of proximity to other areas of Sydney; Central Station: 15 minute walk Darling Harbour: 15 minute walk Newtown: 10 minute walk Glebe markets: 5 minute walk  Opera House: 20 minute bus, train or cab Sydney CBD: 10 minute bus, train, or cab Universities (USYD & UTS): 5 minute walk
notes: NOTE: We have not received any reviews yet, since this is the first time we have put our apartment on Airbnb.
transit: Apartment has its own parking space in underground secured parking. Bus stop is 50m from the front door.  Closest train station (Redfern) is a 10 minute walk. Central Station is a 15 minute walk.

interaction: We won't be around, but we'll be in the same time zone, so easily contactable. Plus our family lives locally and will be the caretakers in our absence.

name: Cozy, New Ren. comfort for 2 pax, City hotspot
summary: If you are looking for a cozy and comfortable place for your visit to Hong Kong, somewhere close to the Mongkok MTR station and easy access to everything else, and with an affordable price, this could be your perfect choice. Our place is suitable for backpackers, students, tourists, and businessman.
space: The space The building is located in Shanghai Street at Mong Kok, 3 minutes walk from a big shopping mall, the Langham Place and a minute walk to Mongkok MTR Exit A2. Famous attractions such as “Ladies Market”, “Sneaker Street”, "Goldfish Market" and Temple Street are very close to our building. McDonald’s and 7-11 is next to our building! For staying in the most convenient location in Hong Kong, it costs you less than $200 per person per night.

You do not need to worry about your daily needs.

name: Cozy studio appartement near Outremont
summary: This cozy studio appartement is located on the border of Outremont neighbourhood and it is directly adjacent to all the essentials ; drugstore, supermarket, post office, restaurants (some great vietnamese nearby), bus lines every ten minutes that will conveniently get you to metro stations on the orange line in under 15 minutes, washer and dryer in the building, quiet neighbours... Ideal for a couple or a lone traveler.
space: The studio contains all the necessaries for happy living ; the bathroom is fully equipped with soap, shower gel, shampoo, hair conditioner, toothpaste, blow dryer, toilet paper, freshly cleaned hand towel and full body towels. The kitchen is furbished with all the necessaries for cooking and enjoying your meals, including a variety of spices, sugar salt, flour and more. There is a laundromat inside the building (2,50$ for washing, 2,25$ for drying, only accepts dollars and quarters).

neighborhood_overview: The appartement sits on the northern flank of Mount Royal in a quiet residential part of the city. All amenities are within 5 minutes walk from the location (grocery store, drugstore, convenience store, shopping mall).  As far as sight seeing, you'll find yourself a short distance from the top of Mount Royal, a must see for all newcomers to the city, as well as the gorgeous Saint-Joseph oratory. Public transportation wise, the area is well served. All worthwhile areas of the city are reachable through short transits (15-25 minutes).
transit: Public transportation is one the big advantage of this location!  Stm passes, which serve as fair for both the bus and the metro, can be bought at terminals situated within every metro stations as well as in some drug stores (notably the pharmaprix located one block away from the appartement) with advantageous rates for week ends, night passes and more. Guests can refer themselves to the metro map included above to get a sense of how to get around the city.
access: Guests can access the entirety of the studio as well as the laundromat located inside the building.
interaction: I’m available for communication at all times via the application, text messaging or calls and I will respond promptly to all questions and concerns.

space: Welcome to our "Acomodis" Apartments in Barcelona! The Sagrada Família Building has been beautifully recently renovated and these eleven flats are now available for rental. In order to keep the "Eixample flair" the brick walls and Catalan vaults have been restored as well as doors and windows keeping their original carpentry, in connection with an elegant decoration, wood floors and high quality furniture. neighborhood_overview: This unique area is rich in history, architecture, culture, and cuisine. Just a short distance to the trendy Passeig de Gràcia you will find, La Pedrera, Casa Batlló, and Casa Milà along with several upscale shops and restaurants. On summer (July and August) a few meters away there is the "Eixample beach" where relax and refresh yourself.  Also,  within walking distance there is the Arc del Triomf, Parc de la Ciutadella, Plaça Catalunya, Ramblas... Even the beaches are only 15 minutes by metro. The location is truly ideal to enjoy all of the splendors Barcelona offers. Great shopping, excellent galleries and restaurants all around!
notes: As you will be staying in a fully touristic licensed apartment There is a tourist tax of 2.5 cent per adult per night, this needs to be paid on check in please. Children under 17's are free.
transit: The public transportation in the area is excellent with numerous bus stops and 3 metro lines. The metro lines nº5 (blue) and nº4 (yellow) and nº2 (lilas), Stations “Sagrada Familia”, “Verdaguer” and “Monumental” is only a 1 minute walk away. This will bring you to the Passeig de Gracia (the citys 5th Avenue) in just 15 mins and likewise you can go directly to Plaza Cataluña (main square in Barcelona) and the Ramblas (main street downtown in the historical center) in similar time. The excellent public transportation options are easily accessible from the "Acomodis" apartment, allow you to reach the main points of interest of the city of Barcelona in just minutes. Alternatively to reach these destinations you can grab a taxi which will take 10 minutes. The taxis are in multitude here and very reasonable. At the temple of La Sagrada Família you will find the sightseeing bus stop, which will take you to see the major tourist attractions of the city. It is a safe and bustling area with rest
access: You'll have full access to the "Acomodis" apartment. It'll be all yours for your stay.
interaction: We'll be on hand to help in any way we can.
house_rules: - No smoking in the apartment please  - The kitchen is of course available for your use, please be safe.  - Reasonable quiet noise levels especially after 21pm. - Respect of the property and neighbours.  - No loud parties. - With the hot weather we would really appreciate if you could clean down kitchen surfaces at least once a day (only if used) and bring out the garbage at least every second day. This is necessary in the hot weather, thank you! The garbage bins are located very close to your apartment - near the main front door. They are the big grey plastic containers - you can't miss them! Cheers!  - Most importantly relax and enjoy your stay! RESPECT FOR NEIGHBOURS. As the apartment is very quiet, for the centre of Barcelona, or any part of Barcelona, for that matter, I ask visitors to be mindful of noise levels. host.host_about:
We are a Catalan and Venezuelan couple with 3 daughters and we started using airbnb as our personal account. But since we were getting more apartments to manage we founded our small “family agency” called “Acomodis”. We are part of a happy team and we all work full time managing short term rentals and organizing cooking activities. We absolutely love what we do and we are more than happy to meet amazing people from all around the world and ensure our guests enjoy this incredible city. We are happy when our guests are happy!

ACOMODIS APARTMENTS - Self-catering apartments in Barcelona - The easy and secure place to book quality vacation apartments. Always great deals, always great service from Acomodis!

Hola amigos,

In order to help you, I and my wife offer a wide variety of apartments in Barcelona to make it easier for you to enjoy a pleasant stay and experience.

In addition to trust us in regard to housing, we believe the most important is to have a nice experience and maximize what Barcelona has to offer. That's why we invite you to apply for any information you need before and during your stay to enjoy as ever. 
Also, if you want to enjoy a very special gastronomic activity do not hesitate to ask for information.

We speak English, French, Spanish, Catalan and on the telephone.

We are happy because we love what we do!

name: Sai Ying Pun MTR 1 min walk withrooftop terrace 63
summary: Take a break on your rooftop terrace perfect after a long day in the city, this cozy 1 bdrm aprt with all the fixings of a modern studio is situated conveniently near public transport and the Sun Yat Sun Memorial Pool&Park,traditional HK at its best.
space: This One Bedroom apartment is conveniently located in Sheung Wan (near Central).  The private rooftop area offers nice city and sea view of Hong Kong and is a great place to wind down after a busy day in the city shopping, eating, meeting, etc. It is tastefully renovated and includes: - FREE WiFi - an open kitchen, electric burner, refrigerator with freezer. - one bedroom with large double bed occupying and one single bed. - large flat screen TV on a wall mount for viewing from the living room, NOW Cable TV, and a DVD player.  - Hair Dryer The apartment is on the 11th floor and has a nice glimpse of the ferries coming into the harbor. The apartment is across the street from the Sun Yat Sun Memorial Park which has an olympic size swimming pool overlooking the Hong Kong harbour and is open to public (entry fee is HKD19 or USD2.5), a beautiful soccer/football pitch, squash courts.
description: Take a break on your rooftop terrace perfect after a long day in the city, this cozy 1 bdrm aprt with all the fixings of a modern studio is situated conveniently near public transport and the Sun Yat Sun Memorial Pool&Park,traditional HK at its best. This One Bedroom apartment is conveniently located in Sheung Wan (near Central).  The private rooftop area offers nice city and sea view of Hong Kong and is a great place to wind down after a busy day in the city shopping, eating, meeting, etc. It is tastefully renovated and includes: - FREE WiFi - an open kitchen, electric burner, refrigerator with freezer. - one bedroom with large double bed occupying and one single bed. - large flat screen TV on a wall mount for viewing from the living room, NOW Cable TV, and a DVD player.  - Hair Dryer The apartment is on the 11th floor and has a nice glimpse of the ferries coming into the harbor. The apartment is across the street from the Sun Yat Sun Memorial Park which has an olympic size swimming p
neighborhood_overview: The Sheung Wan neighbourhood is ever changing and a fantastic mix of "old' and "new" Hong Kong.  This apartment is located in the heart of Hong Kong's commercial, cultural and shopping districts and within short walking distance to the subway and HK Macau Ferry Pier.  A few minutes walk away from the harbour front and the fantastic Sun Yat Sun Memorial Park and Public swimming pool over look the world famous Victoria Harbor.
notes: Once you arrive in Hong Kong, everything is quite simple and all starts with a call from the FREE phones at the airport located in the hall immediately after you pass through baggage customs.  There is also a Visitors Center there if you would like to pick up some maps, local travel guides, etc. to read on your way to the apartment.  If you need a local SIM card, there is a 7-11 in the middle section  of the main arrival hall where they see all types of SIM cards, I usually prefer the PCCW brand as it is the larges local operator.
transit: Buses, Trams, Minibuses and taxis all run right out side the building all conveniently taking you through Central and all other parts of Hong Kong like Causewaybay, Wan Chai, the exhibition center and beyond.
access: Guests have access to: - FREE WiFi - Cable TV - Hair Dryer - Iron/Ironing Board - Microwave, Hot Water Boiler, Cooker - Towels, Sheets, Toilet Paper, Shampoo, Soap, etc.
interaction: As much as possible or invisible if you want. I will try to meet with arriving guests and show them the area.  Whenever guests need information or recommendations, I am always available via messaging or phone.
house_rules: This is a Strictly NON SMOKING Flat. UPON ARRIVAL AT PROPERTY, ALL GUESTS MUST WAIT FOR ME AT THE FRONT GATE OUTSIDE OF THE BUILDING.  BUILDING RESIDENTS WILL COMPLAIN TO PROPERTY MANAGEMENT IF THE LOBBY AREA INSIDE BUILDING IS BLOCKED.  THANKS FOR YOUR KIND UNDERSTANDING FOR AN ENJOYABLE STAY. Check in time is AFTER 12:30 pm.  Make sure to contact us by phone at least 30 minutes prior to arrival such that we can meet you at the flat to hand you the keys and acquaint you to the surroundings.  As this is a family business, please try your best to arrive at the apartment as early as possible. After 11:30pm as transport to the apartment is limited for us, we have to charge HKD150 to cover our taxi transport cost to and from the apartment. We are generally exhausted at the end of the day and we really would rather you arrive early and not have to charge this. Guests must wait for us OUTSIDE the building upon arrival and not enter the building without us as this causes unnecessary misunders

host.host_about: I was born in California and raised in Hong Kong. Went to college in the states and returned to Hong Kong a few years ago.  I absolutely love travelling around the region but Hong Kong has always welcomed me home and I look forward to showing off my home town and sharing all the little insights and local specialities with all my guests!

address.street: Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
We had a great stay here in early August, 2014. Air-conditioned and on the eleventh floor (with an elevator) and heaps of natural light. There are actually views past a neighbouring apartment building to the harbour and part of Kowloon.

The apartment was quite small, but for a couple who spent a lot of time out and didn't cook at all it was perfect for our needs. Hosts were lovely and very helpful with suggestions on directions, restaurants and bars nearby.

Upstairs is a small terrace area with space for washing, and probably a pleasant space to sit — although during our visit the weather didn't really suit. Most important during August, there is *very* efficient air con.

It's a roughly 10-minute walk from the nearest train station, but buses and trams stop directly outside and arguably make for a more interesting journey — they're super cheap, too.
Cute apartment, good location, close to some really cool areas without being too loud/busy, right next to waterfront which is great for walks - had an excellent stay!!

The studio was so nice. It's comfortable and good situation.
The place is as same as you see on photoes.
I really recommend this place.
Thanks to the host for his great care.

The appartment was great! It is composed of one main room with a small kitchen and one small bedroom. The space was a bit small for 3 people but had all the amenities we could wish for. Its location is perfect, just 10-15 minutes walk from Central or 5 minutes by tram. Brendan gave us all the necessary information and arranged for a smooth check-in. He also gave us lots of tips about Hong Kong and the tourist attractions not to miss before we got there :)
这次香港之旅是顺利且开心的,Brendan是个热心的人,由于我带着孩子头一次去香港,方向分不清楚,约好的时间耽误了,天也快黑了,我很着急,出租车也不好打,Brendan 最后去接我们才顺利入住｡后来发现公寓出行很方便,门口有多条公交线路｡公寓很干净,适合家庭住宿｡有个窗还能看到海｡周围有许多能吃饭的地方｡下次如果去香港还是要住那里的｡在这里还是要感谢Brendan｡

This was our first experience with airbnb and my first visit to Hong Kong; I sent numerous emails with lots of questions and Brendan always replied promptly and with  a lot of  information. Directions to the apartment were clear, including the helpful suggestions to call from the free phone at the airport and print out the address in Chinese (our taxi driver did not speak (Website hidden by Airbnb) we got there late at night ,and  everyone was tired, met Veronica ( Brendan's mum)+ her assistant briefly;both were very friendly.
Apartment was as described, bigger than expected and at the back of the building; second bedroom separated by bathroom from main area , so suitable for 3 people. Bed was very comfortable; view to water through window underneath aircon,so did not feel boxed in. I expected it to be noisier than it was, 2 busy freeways between flat and water, but relatively quiet with windows closed.  Other residents were very quiet and no neighbours above; I am a light sleeper, so noise is an issue.All the basics were there;really appreciated things like a converter plug + iron (we were there for a wedding)and very good Wifi.
Loved the area: dried fish and herbal medicine shops close by, as well as swimming pool ; tram and buses in the street and you can easily walk to Central, mostly via walkways. very easy to find your way back when walking as the Ibis Hotel is very close and has a big sign high up!
Direct fast bus to airport 5 min walking distance( found it by accident)-cheaper and quicker than train and taxi- Brendan will leave info  for future guests.A pity we did not get to meet Brendan; we were there for a short time + had a busy programme.

It was actual experience to stay HK by myself without general hotel service and privately recommend somebody who want to know actual life of style in HK.

Thanks,

Jason Han
Loved our stay in Sheung Wan. The apartment was very satisfactory and gave us the chance to see a different side of Hong Kong. Thanks Brendan!

Brendan's apartment was a great experience. Checking in was smooth and communication was prompt and excellent. The rooms are small, the room with the second bed begin large enough just for the bed, but its the perfect size for 2 people, would be tight for 3 people. Bathroom was comfortable with hot water.

I thought the location was superb, in a non touristy area of Hong Kong, 10 min walk to downtown/metro. The food around the area is just excellent, with a local style dim sum place right across the street. I'm talking traditional, affordable, sitting at tables squished with strangers, and elderly ladies rolling carts of delicious food kind of dim sum.

Unfortunately I do have to mention one negative aspect of the room. We were not aware that you could hear the elevator every time it was in use. The elevator created this loud rumbling heard from both rooms that did not allow myself or my fellow traveling partner to have any good night sleep for the 5 nights we stayed. 

Its unfortunate cause other than the elevator, it was quite a lovely stay. All amenities provided including a converter. If you are a heavy sleeper or plan on waking up early/being out most of the days, this apartment is a great choice.

-Thanks
It was very nice to stay in here. Well located in a nice neighborhood.

The host was very easy to communicate with. The apartment was as described, with the main bedroom and a smaller side room that my friend slept on. Very convenient location. The only downside is that the elevator is quite loud in the mornings and the apartment has a slight tremble during the afternoon, I think due to commuter train traffic.

We stayed at the apartment for 4 nights--it more than sufficiently served our needs. The apartment is well situated to public transportation, with many buses stopping right in front, as well as Central Station only being about a 10-min walk away.

L'appartement est très bien situe et bien amenage. 
Mais il est beaucoup plus petit que ce que laisse croire la photo ! A peine 20 mètre carre.
Et surtout ou se trouve le roof top ?  Je n'ai vu que de pauvres habitats en tôles comme il en existe malheureusement encore beaucoup sur les toits des buildings de Hong Kong !
We love the room with the tiny kitchen even we had no chance to use it. Towels with colors are nice to tell whose towel is. Every thing was lovely including our kind host team.
lovely place to stay in HK. Clean, cozy and convenient.

Brend's flat in Sheung Wan was centrally located, clean and well-maintained. It is close to the new MTR which opened, Sai Ying Pun, which made it easy to get around.  Checking in and out was also a breeze!  I loved that Brend left a blue book with tips on good food and great places to see---we tried some of these restaurants and they were indeed spot on.  Would definitely stay in one of his places again.

I recently stayed 5 nights at Brend's place and it was an enjoyable experience.  He is very easy to communicate with and very prompt.  The place was just as pictured and is located in a great area--very easily accessible to public transportation, markets, and night life.  The apartment was a joy to stay at and I would stay again if I come back to Hong Kong!

I originally booked other place from Brend but It wasn't accurate from what I saw on photo. I wasn't happy with the place that I booked in the first place and Brend , fortunately, switched it to this place for me. The host responded to my request very fast in general and he tried to help me a lot while I'm staying there. He is good host and the place is a bit small but cozy and has a good view.

We had a good time in this apartment in a nice area in Hong Kong, while waiting for an apartment to move into permanently.  It is small, but cosy and has everything you need for a longer stay in Hong Kong. Communication was very good and we were received well. The area is nice, close to a lot of public transport and nice restaurants,  both local and international.  Because the apartment is at the back of the building, it is very quiet!

My friend and I had a great stay in Brend's apartment. Unfortunately it rained the entire time we were in Hong Kong, so we actually ended up spending a fair bit of time in the apartment. Small, but cozy. Location was perfect. Brend was always quick to respond and made sure our stay went smoothly!

Good location and great price for the budget traveler. Suitable for couples or small family with one young child (under 14).  

There is a nice 'sliver' of a view from the main window to the harbor.  The apartment is located on the edge of several neighborhoods - you can walk, tram, bus or metro to so many places!  

Our main issue would be the same as many of the other guests have already mentioned - the elevator was very noisy particularly very early in the morning!

It was a clean, well furnished apartment which was as described. Brend was always helpful and quick in replying to emails which made planning the trip much easier. The extra single room is pretty small but was excellent for us as we could put a portable cot for our baby and we could still have lights on and chat in the main TV/bed area while he slept. Check-in and check-out were easy and straightforward too. Brend - thanks for a great stay.
房子区位很好,居然还有海景真是让人惊喜｡房间设施各种完善,入住时虽然对时间沟通出了点小问题,但是马上就给解决了,各方面都很完美的房子｡唯一的小小不足是最近的西营盘地铁A2号口没有电梯,我们带了箱子很沉从A1出来走了很久｡

Host was unresponsive for ~2 hours at previously agreed upon check-in time; when he eventually showed up at the flat to let me in, he was rushed and thus provided us with the wrong information for the Symphony of Lights show so we missed it. Upon check-in, it was noticed that the cable TV did not work. It was fixed the next day. In the middle of our stay, the main light went out. It took two days to fix. On our second to last day, the host's assistant entered the unit while we were there, without knocking. She thought we checked out already, but apparently, had us mixed up with another unit. Each of these situations were brought up to the host; with the exception of the assistant entering w/o knocking, the host was unapologetic, if anything, curt and borderline rude. 

The flat is very convenient to the bus stop; however, the MTR is a bit of a walk. Lots of dried seafood shops and some eateries nearby.

We were met by Michelle who helped us with our luggage and she settled us in. The apartment was just as we expected it. Clean, neat and a very comfy bed. The location was great with local transport on the door step, the metro down the road and interesting restaurants close by. The only drawbacks, which no one can control, were the steep stairs up to the next floor at the elevator level, the smelly fish smell outside and the noisy elevator motor going all hours of the night. Thank you Brend and all your team for an enjoyable stay. Nicky
入住前跟房东联系时沟通上出了一点点小问题,转了好几圈终于找到房子｡这次来香港很不幸运地遇到了冷空气,所以房间里十分冷,但和房东说了之后马上送来了被子和小暖气~房东很好,房间很好,地理位置简直完美,总的来说是不错的体验!

After using Airbnb for over 300 nights in the past 3 years, this is my first review. 

This is the second time that we stayed at one Brend's properties and we had the same experience of having to wait for an inappropriately long time for the host to provide access in both stays.

The problem is clearly a common one, based on our experience and reading other customer reviews.

After being made to wait outside in the rain for our first stay, we were careful to make precautions with her to ensure that this would not occur again.....and yet despite our best laid plans the long delay happened again.

Even more infuriating, in both instances, the host was upstairs in the apartment waiting for us to arrive!!

Unfortunately, despite advising the host that we didn't have roaming coverage in HK , so had no means to call to say that we had arrived, and after calling from the free phones at the airport and providing very accurate arrival times at the property, the host in both cases waited upstairs whilst we were left outside in the cold and rain.

The arrival process is the most important interaction with the host and in both cases it was entirely botched, through at best a breathtaking display of absent mindedness or perhaps worse, a complete lack of guest care.

We travel to HK frequently and I would not recommend staying at any one of Brend's multiple properties, unless you were prepared for a long long long wait outside of the property.
Great central location for visiting HK. What more can I say?
Very lovely room.

The host was waiting for us upon our arrival.  The flat was clean and in a seemingly safe and good location (very close to public transportation and two blocks from a harbor-side park).  The one very minor maintenance issue was addressed within about an hour.  It was a good value.

Brend's room was really clean and cozy. Everything is prepared so you just need to go and have fun there. :)

쟉지만 리녠 등이 매우 꺌끔햬요.
주인이량 연략을 해아만 들어갈 슈 있어셔 홍콩 심카드가 엾으면 쳐음에 들어가기고 여럽고, 작은 뱡은 침대가 녀무 작아셔 180 이샹인 사럄은 먆이 뷸펀할 거에요. 계속해서 옐리볘이터 쇼리도 들리구요.

Host was very welcoming, met us and showed us anything and everything we might need in the flat. It was very clean, and well organized, great amenities such as Toiletries, Air Conditioners in each room and portable Heaters. Location was the best, within walking distance and near all forms transportation and different types shops, etc. open and running 24/7. 

*Tip: For the Night Gate/Door lock, turn the key counter clockwise. We were not the only people staying at the building that had problems unlocking it.
Pickup was prompt, phenomenal location. Great little spot.
Very nice and helpful host. Very fast response rate. The apartment is the same as on the picture, no bad surprises. Everything went well and smoothly.
It is a small, but comfortable apartment. It is located in a lively, interesting, traditional neighborhood, but the apartment is quiet and relaxed. ^_^
Nice host and lovely apartment~
The house is small but clean,and Brend is very patient to answer every question we asked. The location is very convenient to take a bus or subway.
Brend is a very nice and easygoing host that will let you feel secure and being take care. Thank you:)

We highly recommend this place. The apartment bright and friendly, and has everything visitors need. From the main window you can even see the harbor. The location is fantastic: on Hong Kong island, mere steps from bus and tram stops, across the street from the Wellcome food market, and a block away from the MTR's Island Line. The host was great, both responsive and friendly. We were met at the door, and shown all amenities. 

A minor note is that the apartment is fantastic, but small. It's a good base for exploring Hong Kong, not a venue in and of itself for leisurely relaxation. The photos are very accurate, and there isn't a square centimeter more than what's pictured. We thought of it as "cozy and compact" in a very Hong Kong way, and good value for money.
호스트는 굉장히 친절했습니다. 여행전부터 친절하게 설명도 해줬고, 숙소 위치도 이동하기 편리했고, 바로 도로변에 있어 편리했습니다. 바로앞에 마트와 편의점이 있으며, 건물의 맨위층에 있는 숙소라 창문너머로 바다가보입니다. 숙소안에 조리도구도있어서 간단히 음식을 해먹을수도있어요. 정말 편안하게 잘 머물다가 왔습니다.
Good location and very friendly host!

Brends place is well situated & a decent space for HK apartments. However, the actual pictures to what you walk into are 2 totally different things. The furniture isn't even laid out the same on the pictures. And clearly the pics are a couple years old when everything was new. Now, everything is well dated. Not much of a rooftop... & despite its high floor, you hear the lift running irrespective of which floor it's on. Light sleepers take note. As well as no black out drapes... so vast amounts of light is exposed in the room by sunrise.

Great wifi

Late host by 40 minutes whom did not have the courtesy to let me know.

Be aware that construction is always happening in Hong Kong. The apartment is adjacent to a construction project so there was noise 24/7. Absent this nuisance, my friend & I enjoyed our stay. The apartment is close to the metro line of Sai Ying Pun (make a right out of apartment, cross the street, find Eco Tree Hotel, and there's the entrance). We found some good, inexpensive restaurants (hole in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) was a 30 second walk and catered to the locals (it was our favorite) (head toward Ibis Hotel and it is before the end of sidewalk). 

Once we found the metro line, it was easy to hop on the metro and explore Hong Kong. The airport express was awesome, easy and efficient. Don't forget to buy an Octopus card and refund it at the end of your trip! Have a great time in Hong Kong!!!

Any negative comment left on this apartment is absolute rubbish. First of all, Bren was so accommodating with check-in and check-out, it was so relieving to be able to arrive and settle in right away. It is exactly as pictures - no more, no less. A very clean apartment, small and cozy apartment. Very comfortable to hang out in at the end of busy day walking around the city. The rooftop terrasse has a view of the harbour which is where I loved to have breakfast. It is also a 20 minutes walk to Central and the main street for bars&going out. It is also 5 minutes away from Sin Yin Pin subway stop, on the same road as the appartment (Des Voeux) so super easy to get to. Wifi was refreshingly reliable after traveling through the mainland. Honestly, not a bad thing to say about this place. My parents and I were super happy with sleeping arrangements - if you want a big place, better pay the big Hong Kong price.

The apartment was in a fantastic location. We could easily walk to the subway and ferries, and to restaurants and shops. Brend was a great host and provided us with extensive check-in and transportation tips

We found the apartment clean and full of any confort. In the first days we had some troubles with the internet connection, but Brend helped us in all the ways possible, until sorting out the solution. He satisfied all the additional needs we discovered to have along our journey. Not more than this I can say: Brend is a great host!
The apartment has a very strategic position: walking distance from the centre of HK island and from the MTR station.

If all you need is a place to lay your head at night, this is place for you! Hosts are great and very accommodating. Location is a bit away from the main area, but that is why you pay less. There is still places around  the apartment and the main nightlife is a quick walk away.
由于特殊原因没能入住 但房东并没有把钱退给我们
Great location, great host. Would have been nicer to make a later check out (take into account the departure time of the guests). Other than that, we had everything we needed!

The apartment was a good enough size for the 3 of us -- we were expecting it to be smaller (because Hong Kong) so we were pleasantly surprised! Everything else is as per the listing, location was convenient and close to MTR stations. It's also right smack in the middle of "Dried Seafood Street", which definitely makes for an interesting ambiance. All in all, a great stay. Thanks Brend!

Well located app. close to the ferry harbour and train station. Everything you need is close by, restaurants and supermarkets. Easy to get there from the airport by airport express. Very close to the waterfront. For HK the place is spacious.

We had a great stay in this apartment. Everything was very clean and it was nice to have the separate bedroom instead of my friend and I crammed into the one room. The host was very responsive and left great details and tips for the city. Communication was quick and easy. The location is very convenient for buses and trams and not terribly far from the mrt. It was nice being on the main road toward central so most of the transportation went there. It was nice to have the local diner and a Starbucks across the street and it was a nice walk to the midtown area with lots of shops and restaurants along the way. The local dim sum restaurant across the street on the 2nd floor was probably the best meal we had there and it was all locals and quite an experience ..a highlight for sure. Some small details to expect...There isn't much of a balcony on the roof and it felt like we were walking through someone else's space to get to it, so that's not a great selling point.  The walls are very thin so the neighbors woke us up in the morning and the water pressure is kind of low, but not terrible. It would be nice to have some more options for tv or movies, but next time I would just take my computer and stream so that's not a huge deal. Overall it was a very good value and we really enjoyed our stay here. Brend was a great and attentive host.
Well located. Clean. Fully equipped. Go for it !

We enjoyed our stay at Brend's place.  It was accessible via MTR, bus or tram. And they had bus and tram stations right outside the building.  It was clean and had everything we needed.  Check-in and check-out was a breeze and Brend was very responsive to questions.  A book of tips and suggestions can also be found in the unit and it was very helpful.

언제든지 연락가능했으며 숙소 위치를 지속적으로 설명해주었다.
크기는 예상했던 크기이며 교통수단은 트렘이 가장편한것같다 숙소 바로앞에 정차하므로.

에어비엔비에 등록된 주소와 다른 위치에 있어 찾는데 고생했으나 빠른 답변으로 쉽게 찾아갈 수 있었다.

사전에 많은 여행정보를주어 감사한다

Can't comment on 63 Des Vouex as due to aircon malfunction redirected to 25 Des Vouex: a functional bedsitter; all facilities you'd want; excellent info provided by Brend; excellent central location for walking to locations; immediate to tram/bus and minutes to train transport.
Great place. Would definitely recommend it to a friend and definitely stay there again. Very clean and easy communication. Rooftop was a huge bonus!
房间位置很好,坐车方便｡入住退房都很便利｡房东很热心,给予我们很多帮助｡房间不大适合两个人住｡
总体来说不错,但是希望在清洁度上有所改善!

AC'n var väldigt högljudd men överlag var detta ett väldigt bra boende. Gångavstånd till bra nattliv, taxis som stannade en gata bort och affärer i närheten. Dessutom fanns allt man kunde tänka sig behöva i lägenheten - kyl, dusch, spis osv. Mycket bra ställe.
交通很方便,房东人很好,房间还算大,干净,缺点是每次做电梯总会被吓到…下次有机会再入住,感谢耐心回复我消息｡
首先房东热情,地铁站非常的方便,可以看到海.实用性很好,性价比高!3个人合适
厕所真的该维修了

Brend place is so nice, clean room, near MTR, near convenient store (just cross the street), near Ferry harbour also (if you have a plan go to macau or just using to cross HK island). The Host is also the best, so helpful and will provide you a lot of information about HK
比想象中的要好,房子很干净,位置很好｡

The Airbnb's location is near the station and there are quite a few food options around. Good luck cafe is pretty decent as a quick breakfast stop! Thank you for letting us check in super early too, it was really helpful. The only issue is, the lift for the building is pretty small and there is a small flight of steps in the main corridor so people with big/bulky luggages might have some problem. Besides that, the airbnb was good! :)
싸찐하꼬너무딸라요.깨쮜꼬리만하꼬따무너쪄까는방임.위치는굿.

Brend's place was just right for our family of three (2 adults and a 4-year old) for our week in Hong Kong!  The location was great, with easy access to the MTR (3-4 blocks), numerous buses (right outside), several great playgrounds, and the municipal pool and other facilities at Sun Yat Sen Memorial Park.  The apartment is small but nicely organized, and we enjoyed the view of Victoria Harbor from the apartment and the small rooftop patio.  One caution: there was a lot of noise from the elevator and common hallway (and we're long-time apartment residents).  No problems sleeping between jet lag and ear plugs, and we never heard any noise from the neighboring apartments, but something to keep in mind.  That said, I'd stay here again anytime!

The appartment was small but nicely furnished (although it could use a bit of fresh painting!), and has a small separated bedroom with a single bed, which was very convenient for our daughter. It was unfortunately a bit noisy at night, especially because of the elevator that is located just next to the appartment. 
The location of the appartment is perfect, the MTR is less than 10 min walk away, and it is also possible to take the bus or the tram. 
Although we never met Brend (self check-in and check-out), the communication was easy and he always replied quickly. 
A good address to spend a week end to discover Hong Kong!

Near MRT but nothing much to see in the location, near seven eleven and starbucks. 

The elevator is scary, it seems so old
Good apartment for experiencing local life in HK Island, accessible by metro and tram. The area is a traditional area ! The apartment is clean and comfortable
It’s conveniently located, and Brend is good person,I want to stay once more.
除了噪音略大 休息不是太好之外 其他还是很不错的 位置相当舒服 去哪里都很方便 附近还有好吃又便宜的茶餐厅 点赞
위치는 좋은데 상당히 좁습니다. 화장실은 변기에 앉으면 다리가 벽에 닿을 정도 입니다. 덩치 있으신분들한테는 비추입니다. 그거 빼고는 괜찮아요.  위치나 와이파이 상태도 좋구요
Эта квартира - хороший вариант для тех, кому нужен центр. Рядом трамвай и метро.
地理位置出行非常便捷,楼下就有巴士站和叮叮车站,步行去上环码头10分钟左右｡
Brend's apartment locates conveniently, it is easy to access many iconic place near Central , HK West. Recommand for 2-3 person accommodation for this apartment.

This is a fantastic little place. It is tidy and efficient—perfect for us and our 10 year old. The building has lots of character and a tiny harbour view. Enjoyed our time on the rooftop. Transport team stop just out the front door and grocery across the street. Brend is helpful and quick to communicate. Would definitely stay again!
Excellent host, very convenient location. Definitely recommend.
We enjoyed our stay in Brend's apartment. it has a great location for exploring Hong Kong and we enjoyed the view of the water through the buildings.

The apartment was perfect for what we needed it for - 2 night stay in Hong Kong. It was very clean and had all the essentials. The Wi-Fi was really poor and was intermittent constantly. Before we arrived I had good communication with Brend and plenty of information, he also gave me notes about the original aircon system not working and a secondary had been fitted and full instructions on how to use it. However, none of the air con systems were working and we had to open the window to try and get some kind of air, this had resulted in myself and my boyfriend being covered head to toe in mosquito bites. Apart from the wifi and the aircon this perfect for what we needed it for.

Brend was very easy to communicate with as he was always available and responded quickly. The space is small as it is in a central location in Hong Kong but was big enough for the three of us to come and go.

There is an elevator which is necessary because the apartment is on the 11th floor. But there are some stairs to climb with bags before you hit the elevator. 

The apartment is a bit further west from the main shops and restaurants of Sheung Wan/Central, but we enjoyed how this apartment was just a bit further from the hustle and bustle. 

It seems that this apartment is in high demand as Brend had bookings back to back. Brend was so accommodating to us by having the apartment cleaned up and ready for an earlier check in. This made a huge difference as we had such a long travel day the day before. Thanks Brend!

Very convenient location, central, close to the subway+bus, excellent for 3ppl, especially if you have one person that needs their own room.  Compact apt but has everything you need.  Tight but clean bathroom.  Shower and sitting on the toilet might be a bit tricky for a big person. ^^;  When we first stepped inside we were disappointed because the place looked outdated, dull walls, with dim lighting, and old linens.  There are many more clusters of stuff laying around which makes the place look different from the photos.  On the bright side, although it doesn’t look as bright and IKEA’ish as it did in the photos, this is still a great place to stay overall.  Clean, convenient, and most importantly, it is not easy to get a separate bedroom for a 3rd person for this price.  Highly recommended for a budget traveler.
Comfort place for stay although the apartment block is quite old.

check out时漏了东西,很抱歉打扰到了日理万机的房东,房东很忙所以没讲完直接挂我电话还不忘讲拜拜,文字上都是复制,真正沟通就懒得理我,建议房东平时可以泡点菊花枸杞降降燥｡
房子位置ok,离码头和地铁站近,楼下有巴士站和叮叮车站,附近很多便利店和餐馆｡
不足就是空调非常吵,对睡眠质量有要求的朋友放弃吧,房间里有一幅诡异的挂画,想订这间房的朋友看清楚｡

Small flat with very small bathroom but I guess this is quite normal in HK.
Brend is helpful and ready in replies.

Although the building was older then I expected. Flat itself was pretty accurate to the photos.

Location was really good. It was close to both IFC and ferry terminal.

Brend was very friendly and quick to respond.

Overall it was a great experience!
I was acknowledged that the air-con did't work at 30 mins before check-in.

The studio is nice, however small compared to how it looked like on the pictures, hence a little expensive for what it is. It is ideally located, and clean. Brend is very nice and answers messages quickly.
Thanks! We had a great stay. Nice clean apartment and fantastic location.

Brend's place is simply clean and tidy. Though water pressure of the shower is a bit low, the place has all amenities I needed(especially iron and hair dryer). Location is great where public transports and local restaurants are just within few minutes walking distance. 
On the other hand, rooftop area is not that cozy as shown in the photos and you have to take stairs before you reach the lift lobby.
Everything was as promised and we had no problems getting into the apartment! It was in a fantastic location!! I would recommend!! Thanks again!!
位置还可以,周围有地铁和车站,离西环泳棚和上环码头很近,房间比预想的小一些,卫生间也比较紧凑,小失落是没有找到露台,空调声音有点大,但玩了一天超级累了,很快就能睡着,影响也不大,我们是两个人住,另外一间单人间就用来放东西啦,电梯有点吓人,每次到了后会沉一下,后来也就习惯了,房间是可以看到海的｡

Great location between Sheung Wan and Sai Ying Pun. Some views including from rooftop however managing expectations that the pictures may somehow be too Ikea. Rooftop is basic (1 chair one table) and shared with older people living there. It's more a studio with a side single bed room. Only issues were small fridge and the noise of lift at odd times so overall good.

I loved staying at Brend's flat. I was there for a little more than 2 weeks. There was everything we needed, very clean and such a good location!! Literally just a min away from the mtr. It's typical Hong Kong sized, so don't expect too much room - but it's all you need for a vacation.

Brend's apartment is perfect if you want to be in the centre of the experience of life in Hong Kong.  Walk out the front door and you have  choice of the iconic island trams, the buses or walk a few meters to the train system.  You are surrounded by the very pulse of historic Hong Kong.  Directly across the road is a Wellcome supermarket, and if you  come out of the entrance in the early morning, turn right , and then right again, you  will come to a fantastic local noodle bar where the taxi drivers eat.  Walk around 1km from the apartment and you are at the Star Ferry terminal, walk out of the apartment , cross the road  and turn left and you are at one of the best dim sum restaurants on the island.  I cannot recommend this place highly enough.  If you want to immerse yourself in everything Hong Kong, stay here.
Amazing location with public transport out the front. Moderately quiet, and a real HK neighbourhood experience.
muy buena ubicación

Convenient location, easy access to MTR, bus and tram. Less spacious and Ikea-esque than the photos might suggest, but served our trip well. Points to note:
- flight of stairs before reaching lift lobby, so heavy luggage might be a struggle
- shower very low water pressure
- toilet seat sandwiched tightly between shower curtain and bathroom wall
Overall a good stay, host responsive, beds comfortable, aircons working, easy location.

Our stay at Brend's house was excellent.
The house was clean and well equipped.
Brend was a great host as she was always available for us and provided us with great info of places to visit and eat out in Hong Kong. 

If any friend of us goes to Hong Kong we will surely recommend this place :)

Location is good. I enjoyed the stay in Sai Ying Pun this neighborhood, it’s less crowded and you can find good restaurants, convenient stores, great cafes, and of course all the 海味and臘味 here. 
Double bed is slightly smaller than normal Queen size bed. It would be great if there’s a chain lock on the door, female travelers will feel safer.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Brend's place the past week and a half. It's in a great location and had everything we needed. It's quite roomy by HK standards and was comfortable for 2 people. The tram stops right outside which brings you into central for only 26p. Overall we were very happy.
Great place. Very convenient :)

Very disappointed. Apartment much smaller than expected and doesn't look anything like the pictures, sofa broke and gave us stools to sit instead, not all TV channels work, bathroom door lock doesn't work, lift outside is extremely noisy and couldn't get to sleep or would be woken up if someone was using it in the middle of the night. Alright for a couple nights but not for anymore than a few days.

name: Otimo apartamento no Leblon
summary: Apartamento tranquilo, silenciado, claro e arejado.  É um apartamento confortável, que acomoda até 5 pessoas. Está localizado em ponto excelente, dois quarteirões e meio da praia, rua calma do Leblon, perto de vários bares, restaurantes, supermercados e farmacias.  Não possui elevador, são 3 lances de escada. Sejam bemvindos a uma acomodação tranquila.
space: Ar condicionado e ventilador de teto nos 3 ambientes. Além disso tem: Quarto 1: Cama de casal, armário, TV a cabo, blackout. Quarto 2: Cama de solteiro, armário e blackout. Sala: tem um futon (podemos colocar o colchão extra para ficar mais macio). Tem uma mesinha de trabalho, TV Smart, mesa com 4 bancos. Fornecemos lençois, toalhas de banho e rosto, cobertores, travesseiros, secador de cabelos e ferro de passar. Televisão Smart na sala, e TV a cabo no quarto maior.  Conexão Wi-fi. Máquina de lavar roupas no apartamento. Cozinha completa com fogão a gás, geladeira, microondas, forninho eletrico, sanduicheira, cafeteira, liquidificador, mixer, panelas, utensílios.  O banheiro social tem chuveiro elétrico. Existe outro banheiro que só tem vaso sanitário. Os hóspedes recebem o apartamento limpo e organizado e durante a estadia ficarão responsáveis por conservá-lo da forma como receberam. Caso precisem de faxineira, teremos o prazer de indicar. Caso alguma coisa estrague ou deixe de funcio
description: Apartamento tranquilo, silenciado, claro e arejado.  É um apartamento confortável, que acomoda até 5 pessoas. Está localizado em ponto excelente, dois quarteirões e meio da praia, rua calma do Leblon, perto de vários bares, restaurantes, supermercados e farmacias.  Não possui elevador, são 3 lances de escada. Sejam bemvindos a uma acomodação tranquila. Ar condicionado e ventilador de teto nos 3 ambientes. Além disso tem: Quarto 1: Cama de casal, armário, TV a cabo, blackout. Quarto 2: Cama de solteiro, armário e blackout. Sala: tem um futon (podemos colocar o colchão extra para ficar mais macio). Tem uma mesinha de trabalho, TV Smart, mesa com 4 bancos. Fornecemos lençois, toalhas de banho e rosto, cobertores, travesseiros, secador de cabelos e ferro de passar. Televisão Smart na sala, e TV a cabo no quarto maior.  Conexão Wi-fi. Máquina de lavar roupas no apartamento. Cozinha completa com fogão a gás, geladeira, microondas, forninho eletrico, sanduicheira, cafeteira, liquidificador, m
neighborhood_overview: Este apartamento está localizado no Leblon, um dos melhores bairros do Rio.  Você estará perto de muitos restaurantes, bares, mercados, lojas e a praia, é claro!
notes: Não possui elevador. São 3 lances de escada
transit: Caminhe até a praia, a apenas 2 quarteirões e meio! Estação do Metro, Taxi e ônibus a 2 quadras de distância do apartamento! A área oferece todos os serviços (mercados, farmácias, restaurantes, bares) muito perto do apartamento. Na maioria das vezes você estará passeando a pé.
access: A praia fica a duas quadras e meia de casa. Aproveite !!
interaction: É um prazer ter convidados e estou feliz em dar dicas e ajuda no que puder para tornar a experiência do Rio realmente incrível.
house_rules: Horario de silencio de 22 as 8am

host.host_location: Rio De Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Hello, i am originally from the south of Brazil (Porto Alegre) and i have lived in the United States, Mexico, Fortaleza (northern part of Brazil) and i am in Rio since 2004.
Besides Portuguese, I speak English, Spanish and some French.
The most different places i have visited were Poland (communist time) and China.
I have 2 cockatiels, and sometimes they come with me for the checkin!
I enjoy very much meeting people and talking about my city.

reviews.comments:
Apartamento muito limpo e bem equipado, não falta nada! Ótima localização e a rua é muito tranquila. Só tem um problema que é o fato de estar no quarto andar e o edifício não tem elevador, fica um pouco complicado para crianças pequenas ou idosos. 
A Andrea é uma ótima anfitriã e mostrou ótima disponibilidade o tempo todo!

El departamento está perfectamente ubicado en una zona residencial super linda y tranquila, muy seguro todo! Nuestra anfitriona súper atenta siempre respondiendo nuestras consultas! Super recomendable el lugar! Volvería sin dudarlo!!

name: Sunny 2br condo for 1-4 travelers!
summary: Spacious two bedroom condo walking distance from Central Park (8 blocks) and Columbia University.
space: This is a spacious and bright 700 sq ft two bedroom condo in a pre-war Harlem building (3rd floor walk up so try not to bring 15 suitcases!) The main bedroom has a queen size bed, the living room sofa folds into a full size bed, and there is a sectional in the small bedroom which folds into a full bed.
description: Spacious two bedroom condo walking distance from Central Park (8 blocks) and Columbia University. This is a spacious and bright 700 sq ft two bedroom condo in a pre-war Harlem building (3rd floor walk up so try not to bring 15 suitcases!) The main bedroom has a queen size bed, the living room sofa folds into a full size bed, and there is a sectional in the small bedroom which folds into a full bed. Guests will have access to the whole apartment. Both bedroom dressers are empty so there is plenty of room for clothes. The kitchen cabinets have dry spices, olive oil, etc and the refrigerator is empty for the exception of a water filter and condiments which you may use. I will meet the guest at the apartment to give them the keys or ask the guest to pick up the keys at my lock box.  Check in after 4pm and check out before noon There are many great restaurants and coffee shops (The Red Rooster, Chez Lucienne, Double Dutch, Lido, Patisserie des ambassades, Silvana).  The apartment is two blo
neighborhood_overview: There are many great restaurants and coffee shops (The Red Rooster, Chez Lucienne, Double Dutch, Lido, Patisserie des ambassades, Silvana).  The apartment is two blocks from Morningside Park and 8 blocks north of Central Park.  St. John the Divine and Columbia University are within walking distance.
notes: Each room has their own air conditioner.  Please turn off the air conditioning before you leave the apartment!
transit: The apartment is two blocks from the 116 street crosstown bus and local subway (C & B train).  If you are planning on going downtown, you can take a 5 minute walk north to 125 and take the express trains downtown (A & D trains).  If you are renting or own a car, there is plenty of street parking along Manhattan avenue.  With four train lines and multiple buses in walking distance, you can go virtually anywhere.  A taxi from la guardia airport should cost around 35-40 dollars.
access: Guests will have access to the whole apartment. Both bedroom dressers are empty so there is plenty of room for clothes. The kitchen cabinets have dry spices, olive oil, etc and the refrigerator is empty for the exception of a water filter and condiments which you may use.
interaction: I will meet the guest at the apartment to give them the keys or ask the guest to pick up the keys at my lock box.  Check in after 4pm and check out before noon
house_rules: - I am no longer completely flexible on check in and check out times, I've run into some problems and ask that all new reservations check in after 4pm, and they must check out by noon. -Treat the condo as if it were your own home. -No pots or pans in the dishwasher, they must be hand washed or they will get destroyed! -Smoking by the window is fine, there are many windows to open.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I'm a 28 year old gay artist living in Queens, I'm renting my friends spacious and light filled two bedroom condo with a dishwasher and washer/dryer while he is out of town for the summer.  There are two bedrooms and a sofa bed in the living room so there is plenty of space for a couple or small group of friends.  

I am available in case you have any questions or concerns, I live in Astoria so if there are any emergencies or questions, you can always call me.

reviews.comments: This was a great experience.  Kev is a wonderful host. The room and apartment is comfortable. The location is close to Starbucks, good restaurants and a grocery store - try the barbecue there!

Kev welcomed me and we had a nice dinner in the area. He is a nice chatty host, who gave me also some nice tips for sightseeing. All arrangements were went pretty smooth and I had a great time.
The location is perfectly situated between Central Park and Morningside Park. I used to have my breakfast out in the parks, just a few minutes walk.
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I stayed here for almost 2 months during this summer. This is an spacious and bright apartment, well communicated with A/B/C/D lines, West 125st Stop is less than 10 minutes walk distance, West 116 st is even closer, and Central Park only a few blocks away. There's a pretty big supermarket less than a block away, also 24h pharmacy, Starbucks, restaurants... West Harlem is a pretty quiet and very residential neighborhood, people is nice and distance to downtown definitely a plus. Kev and I were almost all the time working, but when we met at home we had good times chatting, he's a great person, fun, and did everything to make my stay comfortable and to make me feel home. Highly recommended.

Kev was kind, responsive and helpful, the place is really nice and as advertised. The neighbourhood is safe and the apartment is only minutes walk from the subway. The only downside really is that there is no elevator but it's a second floor so it's not too bad. Ultimately Kev is very respectful, left us plenty of privacy and most of the times we had the place to ourselves.
Great place, nice guy, no hassle stay

A+++ stay in this completely renovated and most comfortable two bedroom, one bathroom apartment. Kevin provided exceptional communication prior to and throughout our stay. The area is super safe. The beautification of the upper west side of Harlem is incredible based on how I remember it back in 1989. The building is secure and we were wondering if anyone lived in the building because it was always very quiet. People are super friendly and restaurants, grocery stores, and shopping are within walking distance. My family members live in small studios or one bedroom apartments in NYC so finding this AIRBNB rental was such a blessing to us as a family. We were able to meet up at the apartment to spend time together as a family. The apartment is equipped with everything you'll need to feel like your at home. The strain is within walking distance and catching a taxi is simple. There is a park not far from the apartment if you want to picnic or BBQ. We can write a book about our A+++ experience. Thank you, Kevin!! We will definitely be back.

Kevin's place was exactly how described, located in a great location close to public transportation and a plethora of attractions. The apartment slept three comfortably everything was clean appliances were up-to-date and building was quiet. I definitely recommend this property and Kevin was a great host who answered all of my questions and concerns in a timely manner

Kev is very nice guy. The room is very clean and convenient . There is anything what you want in kitchen. The location is perfect , and subway station and metro is two minutes walk away. Even you can walk to Central P ark in ten minutes. It's really perfect apartment. Definitely I will come again!

This place is exactly as pictured, spacious and spotlessly clean; and a cool and comfortable respite from the hot streets of NYC (we visited on a blistering hot day).  Kev was very accommodating about coordinating the time for key pickup with us.  Bathroom and kitchen are fully updated and also spotless.  Just the place we needed for an overnight stay, and perfect if you have friends or family at Columbia U--which is just a quick walk from the apartment.
Great place! Fantastic host. The apartment and its location was super. Highly recommend it.
Kev was very patient waiting for my Fiance' as she was late arriving from the airport. the property description was as per the listing. everything was great.

Our trip started as a nightmare : 6hours of flight delays , lost luggage... And our sunshine was called Kev !
He waited for us, and helped us in all our procedures by calling the airline, carrier, ... and keeping us informed . He was kindness a lot.
The apartment is entirely consistent with the description. The place is quiet. Convenient because 5 minutes from the subway. Many shops and restaurants around.
Well equipped kitchen. Bathroom with all the necessary products.
Spacious, and very well equipped.
If you are going to New York, it's a great place and a good adress ! Highly recommended !

This is a great apartment.  It's in a perfect location to access the express trains and in a lively location in Harlem.  The apartment is outfitted with almost everything one can think of including a French press, a Bluetooth speaker, etc.  Each room has a separate air conditioner.  It's clean and safe.
