The apartment is a 3rd floor walkup, so keep that in mind if you have access issues or lots of luggage.  We had a great stay.  Thanks Kev.

We stayed in Kevin's place with 4 adults and a baby for one week.  We liked the location, it was so quiet at night and we felt safe.  We were especially thankful for the comfy pull out couch in the living room and for the washer/dryer for baby clothes. The apartment was perfect for what we needed and we would definitely stay there again.   It is around the corner from a great grocery store, and from the 116th subway station.  Thank you Kevin for setting us up for an adventure in Harlem!    We highly recommend the chicken and waffles, and the sweet potato pie at Amy Ruth's in Harlem!

My wife and daughter visited NYC and stayed at Kev's place and it was as described.  It was close to the MTA station and had room for my 1 year old's crib and a separate room for us to stay in.  Kev met us at the door and was very helpful in getting us all set up and ready to explore NYC.

The place is well furnished and is a great place to make anyone feel right at home.

The condo was very nice and clean for my wife's and my visit to New York. We took advantage of the open and comfortable living room to relax with a little wine our fist night after our travels.  Kev is a thoughtful and accommodating host. I recommend this place and would consider staying here again.

Good experience. We texted from the airport, and Kevin met us in front of the condo. He allowed us to drop our bags off earlier than the official check in time, which was great. The condo was spacious and the building was very quiet -- not once did we hear any neighbors. I'm a light sleeper, and the layout/structure of the condo was great with respect to that -- my son stayed up later than me, and I never heard him in the kitchen, bathroom, or living area (i.e., didn't hear the shower running, toilet flushing, etc.).

Kev was a great host! The apartment was in a perfect location to Columbia university and close to the subway. The apartment was very cozy and clean. Nice bed, pull out couch, and good linens. We would stay here again!

We have stayed for 5 days in Kev's apartment. It is a great place, safe environment, good supermarket, coffee and subway station only 1 block away.
Central park is close and it takes aprox 15 min to Times Square with the subway.
The apartment is clean, great bed en soft sheets ;-)
Good wifi, big TV and good equipment in the kitchen
If you use the sofa it is suitable for 4 persons.
I can definitely recommend this place

Bel appartement grand, bien arrangé, meublé avec goût et confortable. Il est proche d'une station de métro et de Central Park.
L'équipement est complet, de qualité et pratique et convient bien à quatre personnes (peut être un peu juste pour plus).
On trouve de nombreux commerces dont un petit supermarché très bien achalandé à 1 bloc.
L'appartement donnant sur une avenue, il est un peu bruyant (mais New-York est une ville bruyante).
L'accès au centre de Manhattan se fait en une petite demi-heure en métro (il y a aussi des bus qui permettent d'aller sur EastSide).

Kev répond très vite aux questions et est très réactif et efficace quand il y a un souci (mineur dans notre cas).

The apartment was perfect and exactly as described!  Perfectly located for Columbia families.  Very clean and very spacious.  Neighborhood was awesome, fun and delicious restaurants.  Overall a great weekend!!

Kevin is a wonderful, very accommodating host.  
Apartment looked exactly like in description . 
Very nice / safe location close to many amenities.
Was a very nice stay and nice place. Would recommend this place to anyone. Thanks again.
Very central, spacious and clean flat. It was a very nice experience. Kev was always very helpful. We had a very good time.

The apartment was great! The location was very convenient for getting to Columbia. The environment was clean and welcoming. Kev met us late on Friday when we arrived and was very welcoming. I would definitely stay there again!

Kevin was an awesome host. Super helpful, attentive, and also very laid back. Was there to greet my friend and I on the first day, and showed us the room. His apt was as expected, in an awesome location. 15 min walk to Central Park, and a 10 min to the closest subway station. Also, very convenient that there happens to be a rite aid a couple blocks away. Can't go wrong, would check in here again if I were to come back.
Had a great time staying in this apartment and Kev was cool. The apartment is exactly as described and clean. The subway wasn't far away either to go around town.

This was a great, clean, spacious apartment that is in a good neighborhood and was convenient to everywhere we needed to go.  I really enjoyed my stay and I would definitely recommend renting it.  Kev was a good host and the check-in/check-out process went very smoothly.  This place is an incredible value.

My friend Maria and I were guests in Kev's West Harlem condominium this past week and were delighted with the entire experience. Kev was there to greet me when I arrived and we found everything we needed to make our stay a real pleasure. He had maps and brochures and the kitchen was totally set up for a full cooking experience. 
I loved it and would definitely return on my next NYC visit.
Thanks Kev
Prima appartement, op een goede ligging in. Goede uitvalsbasis voor de rest van de stad. Lekker ruim met alle faciliteiten die je nodig hebt.

The apartment was spacious and super convenient- especially those needing access to Columbia U. Lovely park nearby, great walking area, and close to public transport, restaurants etc...A more residential feel, but still very city for those looking for both aspects. Place had a great kitchen and bathroom and the bed was super comfy. The living room was comfy too. Kev was helpful and available if anything came up.

We had a great stay here in Harlem, very friendly neighborhood. Kevin was very friendly and welcoming. The apartment was exactly as described, very spacious, clean, and had everything we needed. 3 minute walk to the nearest metro stop, shops and restaurants. Very happy to have chosen this accommodation.

We where a hour late but that was no problem with Kev. He welcomed us and explained everything very well. Kev is very helpful, friendly and made us feel welcome.
The apartment is very spacious and clean. There are two bedrooms which was perfect so we both had our own bedroom. The bedroom both have a two person bed and airconditioning which was more then plenty. 
The living room is rather large with a big tv and a large couch and even a diner table. 
The kitchen is connected to the living room and has dishwasher and an washer/dryer. It's very clean and has everything you could possibly need. 
The bathroom is average by size but has a bath, toilet, sink and a good shower in the bath.
The neighborhood is great! The apartment is located at the bottom of Harlem  on a quiet and characterful street with a Metro station around the corner. Harlem is a great place to eat, especially chicken. And there are loads of good restaurants in this neighborhood. 

Overal, a good apartment and host located in a great neighborhood.

Well...he really didn't make us feel welcome! It was kinda of an awkward situation...maybe because we didn't arrive at 4:30p as we mentioned running late due to train connections, this should not have mattered though unless there was some place you needed to be, also I asked about check-out time and was told it was flexible...we had to ask questions on where we could grocery shop, coffee house, restaurant for dinner, etc. There was no book on what to do or see in the neighborhood, no directions to the subway, or using the condo appliances, etc. The bathroom and kitchen trash cans had not been emptied from the last guests, the refrigerator wasn't wiped cleaned of something that split, there was left over expired food in the refrigerator. It looked like the place hadn't been dusted in awhile. Also, this was extremely gross, the shower curtain was all mildewed!!!! These liners cost $2.00 if that and it's an easy fix! Also, mildew in the corners of the shower as well.
I would imagine if you would like clients to return or spread word of mouth how great the place was, wouldn't you think that you would do a better job of the cleaning and up keep of your place? I asked about check-out time and was told no set time, so my son and I go into the city to return by 3:35p, and I mentioned this to Kev to be told well, I need to be in there between 2:30-3:00p to clean because the next guest arrive at 4pm!!!!! Yikes....had we known in advance than we would have planned our day differently! When we arrived back at the condo to retrieve our luggage, he was walking in with the next guests..the guest were more polite than Kev was, he wouldn't look at us or even acknowledge that we were there, didn't ask how our stay was...nothing! The new guests asked how our stay was and my son and I said great, you will like the neighborhood and they asked if we were taking off I said yes, we needed to catch our (Website hidden by Airbnb) which Kev upon walking by me had some comment to make just loud enough for me to hear!!! And it wasn't a nice comment either!

So...whom ever sees this review I hope that you will take to heart what was said above and take action! I would consider staying again or recommending this condo, but I really have my doubts now.

kevin is wonderful, welcoming, laid back and if we had any questions he replied immediately.
appartment is exactly as described, 3 min. to next subway, short walk to central park, neighbourhood was awesome, delecious reataurants, bars, supermarket + everything else we needed.
Overall more than a perfect stay!! we definitly recommend this place!
thanks kevin!

Nous avons passés un excellent séjour dans l'appartement de Kevin. Il est dans un quartier calme, idéalement situé à proximité de restaurants, supérette (Best Market), pharmacie et surtout à moins de 500 m du métro. L'appartement est fidèle à la description donnée, vous trouverez tout ce qu'il vous faut (même un sèche cheveux!) et cerise sur le gâteau, le lit est d'un confort exceptionnel!!
Encore un grand merci à Kev pour son accueil et sa patience malgré notre arrivée très tardive à plus de minuit. Nous recommandons fortement cet appartement.
Kev's place was just as described, bright and sunny clean and very quiet.  Neighbourhood was good with plenty of places to eat and a good supermarket nearby.  Check in went well with Kev.
Great place! Highly recommend it, specially for Columbia  Univ guests. Kev was very friendly.

We really enjoyed our stay in New York  
The apartment was spacious and Kev was a jewel. I would certainly recommend the apartment .

We had a wonderful stay! The apartment was exactly as described. Kev went above and beyond for us the day we arrived. The location was perfect. Quick walk to the subway, store, restaurants and a Starbucks. We kept  the windows open at night and it was pretty quiet. If we are ever in NYC again we will definitely check to see if this place is available. Thanks again Kev!

Kevin was an awesome host telling us about places that were close by. The apartment was fabulous clean and had everything we needed and was so close to the subway which by the way is the only way to go when your in New York .We will return Kevin thank you once again

Great place to stay- I was attending a conference at Columbia the location was perfect an easy 10 minute walk. I didn't realize the second bedroom didn't have a bed in it (my fault for not reading closely) but the couch in the living room folds out into a very comfy bed.

Kevin was very helpful in getting us into the place despite our changing schedule due to car issues. The condo is tastefully appointed with thoughtful touches throughout that made our stay very comfortable. Furthermore, whenever we had a question, Kevin got back to us pronto. Easy walks to Best Market Harlem (large grocery) and Metro. Our only caveat is to mention loud street music on the weekends that thankfully shut off around 9PM. If you play music or turn up the TV, it can be pretty much ignored. Kevin also made some wonderful suggestions for local eateries. All in all great "nesting" spot to stay while visiting NYC.

Great apartment! Kevin communicated promptly to answer all questions. Excellent location. Terrific grocery store just 2 blocks away. We did a lot of cooking and found the kitchen well equipped. The apartment was clean and roomy. Would definitely stay there again! Loved it.

Alles was perfect zoals de beschrijving een mooi ruim appartement met mooie keuken en kleine badkamer . Airco op de kamers was meer dan welkom bij dit warme weer.
Kev was aanwezig bij aankomst en goed bereikbaar via sms .
Er waren voldoende propere lakens en handdoeken aanwezig. 
Ik zou dit appartement zeker aanraden aan mijn vrienden. 
Er is een goede supermarkt juist om de hoek en op 5 min ben je aan de metro dus eigenlijk ideaal gelegen om alles te bezoeken.
Bij het uitchecken was Kev niet aanwezig, omdat er mensen op het laatste moment hadden afgezegd en mochten we gewoon de sleutels achterlaten en blijven tot we terug vertrokken.
Het was een leuke ervaring met air bnb
Kev was very accommodating. Everything was just as the pictures showed.  Nice, spacious,  clean apartment.  Even has a dishwasher!

Kev answered quickly. Nice big appartment (for Manhattan!) with a room with a nice bed, another small one with an air mattress and a sofa bed in the living room. Close to the metro and central park. Calm area. We had a nice journey!

Kev is a very professional host.  He made himself available to get us the keys, sent sms and was easy to reach.  He provided an excellent orientation and walk through the appartment that wasnt rushed but also didnt take too long.  The appartment was in imaculate condition and the bed sheets were so fresh and soft that I just wanted to lie down and catch some Zzzzz straight away.  The location is excellent a short subway ride to anywhere and a very nice neighbourhood.   All in all I was extremely happy with my AirBnB experience.

Kev was great, nice and there if we needed anything. 
The apartment was also nice, big and luminous. The location is just 3 blocks from a sub that leads you to midtown. Recommended place.

O apartamento é excelente. Espaçoso, confortável, iluminado e bem decorado. A cozinha é muito bem equipada e a máquina de lavar e secar funciona perfeitamente. A localização é muito boa, próximo a tudo: metrô, supermercados, lojas, Morningside Park, Central Park. Kev foi atencioso e atendeu a todas minhas dúvidas. Recomendo seu apartamento!

Kev was a great host and the apartment was perfect for our trip. It was exactly as described and lots of room! The place was very clean and Kev did a great job of settling us in. It was a great and relaxing stop in our trip!
We had a great stay at the apartment. Good location, close to shops etc and metro. Kev was helpful and always available. Thank you

Our plane arrived late but Kev was very communicative and we had no problems. We picked up the key from a KeyCaffe. Kev made sure we arrived well and provided us with all the necessary instructions. The place is situated in a quite zone, close to Central Park. You can find a subway station 300 meters near the apartment so you can get really fast to downtown. Thank you Kev, I would definitely come back!
The host canceled this reservation 51 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Die Wohnung entspricht genau der Beschreibung und ist auf den Bildern gut dargestellt. Es ist ausreichend Platz für mehrere Personen mit einem großen Bett (sehr weich!), großem Schlafsofa und einer Luftmatratze. Für uns hätte es etwas sauberer sein können, wir haben allerdings einen sehr hohen Sauberkeitsstandard. Wir haben uns wohl gefühlt!
Die Lage ist fantastisch, nah an der Ubahn mit super Anschluss zur Innenstadt in einer richtigen Wohngegend, wo man wenig Touristen sieht. Der nahegelegende Park ist toll und es gibt einen großen Supermarkt in direkter Umgebung, ausserdem tolle Weinläden und viele Lokale. Wer gerne läuft kann die Innenstadt Manhattans sogar zu Fuß erreichen, indem man den gesamten Central Park abläuft (ca. 1.5 h, aber lohnenswert!).
Die Kommunikation mit Kev war unkompliziert, er hat immer schnell reagiert und uns bei der Ankunft alles gezeigt. 
Insgesamt kann ich die Wohnung auf jeden Fall weiter empfehlen! 
Vor allem für Leute die gern nah am Geschehen sind ohne mitten drin im Trubel zu sein ist das eine ideale Unterkunft. Wir haben uns schon nach kürzester Zeit richtig 'zu Hause' in 'unserm' Viertel gefühlt.

Kev's apartment was lovely. It was a nicely renovated, spacious and very clean apartment with many windows throughout! The bed was very  comfortable and Kev had everything I needed for my weekend stay in NY. Kev met me at the apartment when I arrived, made sure I had everything I needed and gave me the rundown on things in the apartment. He made himself available if I needed anything or had any questions. I would certainly stay here again!
Kev was awesome in every way and his place was great..
Kev was a great host.  We were very happy with the place and would highly recommend using Kev's apartment if you are interested in staying in Harlem/Morningside Heights area.
The condo is perfect, suitable for 2-4 travelers , very comfortable, condo has everything you need for cooking,cleaning , etc. Very nice location, close to subway station.
Everything was great. The flat is even better in reality. Kev was discret but very reactive. Next time i'll be happy to come again in his place.

The pictures of the interior don't do the apartment justice. It is spacious, with high ceilings, comfortable, fresh-feeling furniture and open spaces. Kev was an excellent host and I would highly recommend this location, especially if your trip involves being involved in / on the Columbia campus.
Kev was a great host. Location  is fantastic just short walk from metro station, short ride to Manhattan downtown. Neighborhood is very nice and tranquil.
For NYC, this condo is huge. It was really clean, with sleek furnishings and neat art.  For the size and quality of the condo, this condo is a excellent deal.
If you have the chance to stay here, take it!!

This has been one of my favorite AirBnB stays to date. Kev wasn't lying when he quoted the proximity of the subway in either direction. Also, I've stayed in some spots that have quoted certain amenities, but did not follow through. (i.e. running hot water, wifi, working washer/dryer, etc.) This put all those to shame. 

The apartment is beautifully heated and insulated. I found myself removing covers when it was only 38 degrees outside. Half the time I didn't realize I had fallen asleep due to the comfort of the bed. The entire apartment is well lit and the water in both kitchen and bathroom heats and cools within seconds. 

Overall, I greatly enjoyed my stay here. It was nice to stay in an area that was just far enough away from any tourist traps, but still had extremely easy access to all the events and places I wanted to attend. 

I would stay here again for sure and I rate this apartment 5 stars! Thanks again!

Kev is s very welcoming and friendly host. Easy to work with. The flat is nice, bright and overall clean.  The location is good. Close to subway. The only thing that was slightly disappointing is that it's a 1 bed room (not 2) flat. The second bedroom had no proper bed. There was a a air mattress rolled up in one corner. So basically one of us had to sleep on the sofa. We didn't mind to much, but we expected 2 rooms. 

So unless you really want a 2 bedroom flat, this is a nice spot !
I enjoyed my time staying here. The place was very clean and comfortable.

Kev was very flexible with my check in time and was reachable by phone during the week. 

Great place.
Awesome location!  Very spacious.  Clean.  Perfect host!

Kev's place is just what we needed for our weekend stay near Columbia University.  The market a block away had a wonderful variety of specialty and everyday foods.  Also many wonderful restaurants and bakeries close by.  The neighborhood was very friendly and welcoming.  Thanks Kevin!

Si vous avez la chance de rester chez Kevin sauter sur cette occasion en or. Le condo est vraiment bien aménagé, avec tout le nécessaire pour vous y sentir comme chez vous. Le quartier est génial et près de tout. C'est un point de départ excellent pour visiter toute la ville.
It's pretty nice

The accomodation was just as descriped. It´s a light and spacious condo which covered all our needs during our stay. Both sleepingrooms have windows to the backyard (which was important to me) and it was quiet for sleeping. We appriciated the closeness to Colombia University as well as to public transport and Central park. The neigbourhood felt safe and we could find restaurants and groceries nearby. The communication with Kev was very good. He was very kind and helpsom as our flight was cancelled due to snowy weather and we came with one day delay. Kev was so great not charging the first night we couldn´t make. Thank you again for that. We really enjoyed our stay at Kev´s and can reccommend this appartment.

We stayed three nights at Kev's place with our two small kids (ages 3 and 1). It worked out well for us: we put the kids in the two bedrooms so that we could use the rest of the place (living room, kitchen, and bathroom) after they went to bed. The bed in the main bedroom is quite comfortable, and the fold-out bed in the living room is decent. The air mattress is an air mattress, but our 3-year-old was fine with it :)

Kev's place exactly matches his description and photos. It's pretty spacious for Manhattan, with great light coming in through the 4 large windows in the living room. Apart from the furniture it's fairly bare-bones: you've got all the essentials in the kitchen and bathroom, but not much else (no tissues, for example), so it doesn't feel as much like a "home" as some other places we've stayed. But we had everything we needed and enjoyed eating in for dinner as a family.  It was a nice, clean, comfortable place to stay for three days.

The neighborhood is great: tons of great shops/restaurants all around you, and a quick walk to the subway, Morningside Park (including multiple great playgrounds for the kids), and Central Park.  The street has moderate noise from buses, trucks, and the occasional siren, but it's pretty muffled in the bedrooms.  We had our car with us and had good luck finding parking on the surrounding side streets.

Kev was communicative and check-in/check-out were smooth.
We loved the set-up and decor. Kitchen was big enough for us to cook comfortably. Everything worked well besides the washing machine/dryer. Not too noisy. The stairways were lacking in cleanliness.

I'm a little biased because I used to live here, but this is one of my favorite neighborhoods in new york. It has great access to bus and subways, and is even reasonably walkable to the museums on the UES and UWS.
Kev's apartment was exactly as presented and perfect for a weekend trip. As mentioned by other visitors, the bed was super comfy. I'd recommend this place to my own friends and family.
Très bonne location, bien placée, sympa. Seul bémol, la deuxième chambre n'est pas équipée d'un vrai lit ce qui oblige à dormir dans le canapé lit du salon.

Kev's place is very convenient if you want to be in that area.  Easy access to public transportation, parks, and Columbia U.  Apartment was clean and had all the basic items you'd expect.  I would definitely stay there again.

We loved this place! It's definitely a great value. Totally renovated, high ceilings, tall windows, wood floors. Tastefully done with an urban, minimilast feel. Spacious for a city apartment. Loved the location too. Had fun checking out eateries on Frederick Douglass Blvd (recommend Lidos and Cafe Frederick), enjoyed Morningside Park, caught a 
show at the Apollo, and easily got around with Uber and the subway. Kev was helpful and responsive. We highly recommend it!
very nice renovated apartment in a cool and safe part of Harlem, excellent communication and host friendly
The place was clean and roomy. It was great for the price.

O espaço de Kev é maravilhoso, muito limpo e espaçoso. Adorei a decoração, a qualidade da roupa de cama e banho. Excelente estadia. O bairro é bem residencial e familiar. Foi uma estadia agradável. Kev foi muito atencioso conosco, recomendo o espaço do Kev a todos os integrantes do Airbnb.
Friendly and nice, more attention to cleaning.

The size of apt is very good. Just like on photos. Communications was easy and no problem. Kev was a good host. Everything was good except small food roaches in the kitchen. I hate it. Thats why we couldnt cook and eat there and tried to avoid kitchen at all. I know it's New York and probably its a common problem but still that was the only downside. If you're ok with it, its a good choice.

About the Host:
Kev is a great host,  he is friendly, informing and understanding.  You won't run into any trouble with him.

About the place:
The place is very well located if you are going to be most of the time in Manhattan. You will be 20 to 30 minutes away by metro to most of NYCs tourism hotspots.

The place is in a very convenient location in Harlem close to the 116th and 125th subway stations. It is very comfortable and large for New York standers and looks like it has been renovated recently.
The common areas of the building could be improved and cleaner,  but that does not detract from the experience once you are in the apartment .
The communication with the host was very good. The check in and check out were easy . I will definitely come back next time I am New York.

I stayed at Kev's place for a visit to Columbia University. It is within walking distance, or a short cab ride. The apartment is very spacious, can easily host 4 people, and probably a few more. Clean and comfortable. I didnt get to meet Kev, but communication was smooth. The key could be picked up from a dropbox around the corner. Neighborhood is fine, although at night I preferred a cab over a walk.

Rare find in NYC, an apartment with windows on 3 sides!  I spent an entire week here, mostly inside of the apartment due to a work project.  I loved sitting in the window sills and watching people walk by, and the fact that there was a grocery store coffee shop and metro station just a block and a half away.  Perfect location and floor plan.
不错的体验,在117街和曼哈顿街交汇口,交通方便,公寓内部不错,入口处和楼梯稍旧,房东很nice!该有的生活用品都齐全｡

Superbe appartement tout confort, rue très tranquille, très proche du métro et des bus et pas trop éloigné des musées. Un vrai plaisir. Kev était présent à notre arrivée et nous a donné les indications nécessaires.

I recomend this apartment for a stay in NYC. Close to the subway and some good restaurants.
The apartment is in a quiet neigbourhood. It is well maintained and well kept.

We really enjoyed Kevin's place in Morningside Heights. Chose this area to minimize driving in NYC, but easy to get around via subway and that worked out great. Very quiet street and was able to find on street parking fairly easily for all 3 nights (street cleaning rules require you to move it every couple of days). Two subway lines located within a few blocks. Quiet neighborhood, but neighbors hanging out on the stoops give it a nice and safe vibe. Check out 116th street around the corner and all the African restaurants and stores! Would definitely stay at Kevin's again.

Kevin was informative and his place was exactly as presented. In a really good location and we went to one of his recommended places (st. John the divine's cathedral) and it was great.

Would definitely stay again.
The apartment is large and sunny. The neighborhood is mostly quiet, close to the subway and Columbia/Barnard, and elegant. Kev was very easy to work with.
This place is immaculate, quiet and a great location.super easy to get around from here thx to proximity of subways....lots of good food within 15 min walk. Great value
Kev's place was in close proximity to the subway. Everything we needed was in the apartment. Had a great stay and would stay again.

Super appartement, propre,  300 mètres du metro et commerces,  quartier sans problème
20 minutes en metro de Times Square et 500 metres de central Park Nord et Harlem

I stayed at Kev's place for 1 week with wife and 5yo daughter and it has been absolutely great! The apartment is very nice and comfortable and equipped with all you need and Kev keeps it very clean and in great general conditions. Everything went incredibly smooth: super easy arrangements for keys pickup and drop and Kev has always been available and quick to reply for any questions. Highly recommended!!

We were visiting my brother who lives nearby, so Kev's place worked out perfectly. The apartment was more than enough for my wife and I, but you could probably fit up to 4 people in there, no problem. Apartment was clean, Kev was friendly and accessible and the location was perfect. If you're looking for a place to stay while visiting New York, I highly recommend staying here. We'll definitely be back.

Kevin was very accommodating and utilized great communication skills. When we arrived we found a clean, warm apartment with a candle glowing in the bathroom! The apartment is very well located, just a short walk to the bus, subway, Central park and Morningside park.

My partner and I departed from California and arrived in New York around 10am. Our check-in time was around noon. We asked Kevin ahead of time if he can accommodate us by letting us drop off our luggage before checking in and he was okay with it. He really saved us the hassle finding a place/storage for our luggage. The airbnb is located next to a subway which made traveling very easy to do. Also, there were a lot of Deli's around for a quick bite if you don't want to cook. The airbnb is clean and very simple yet nice looking. Kevin is a really nice guy. Kevin gave us local tips which made our traveling easy and fun. You won't be disappointed. Thank you Kevin !

The host is very accommodating and has great communication! This is a great place very close to public transit. It was nice not being in the middle of downtown craziness but still  close enough to visit if you wanted to. The place is clean and comfortable and the directions and communication were very clear.
I think Kev should hire a professional photographer. This home is much nicer than the photos showed! The location is great, and the street is quiet. Everything is excellent!

My trip was cancelled due to extreme weather, but all my dealings with Kev were wonderful: he’s thoughtful, kind, was responsive quickly to all enquirers, and so understanding when things fell through. Can’t wait to try this stay again!!

Kevin's apartment is amazing, spacious, clean and in a great location. It has everything you'll need if you're cooking, and the temperature is pretty easy to adjust if need be. Kevin is also incredibly accommodating and kind! Highly recommended.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Appartement très bien situé à 3 minutes du métro qui amène en 15 minutes dans le centre de Manhattan. Commerces à proximité. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. Appartement très fonctionnel. Kevin est dispo si besoin. Vraiment top.
Kev was an awesome host. Very flexible. The space was great. I would definitely stay there again
The condo is very clean and confortable. Thank you

Kevin was an amazing host and so understanding. The apartment was great! At night you hear a whole lot of nightlife but with the bose speaker he has there it tunes them out. Thank you again Kevin for making my visit even better than I thought!

The apartment was good, spacious enough for 4 people.  There are alot of stairs in the building to get to the apartment so if you have alot of  luggage it may be a problem for some people.  The stairwell to the apartment was not very clean but the apartment was fine.  The area is very safe to walk around at night with some great restaurants & nightlife. Close to subway.

Appartement très spacieux . La présence du WIFI est incontestablement utile pour le voyageur qui veut préparer ses visites de la journée, et maintenir le contact avec la Famille. 
Il est bien situé. A proximité d'une station de métro, dans un quartier et un immeuble plutôt calmes. Pas de surprise particulière sauf le détecteur incendie qui s'est mis en branle , suite à un peu de fumée ( mais vraiment sans trop ) provenant du grille pain.
Nous avions le plein usage des locaux , et avons beaucoup apprécié. 
Nous recommandons cette solution de logement
Great place to stay. Kiev was very helpful and flexible with check in times. The bed was comfortable.

Great space, open living room/dining area. Big beautiful windows if you’re a fan of natural light. Minute walk from the subway. Check out Silvana on 116th, truly delicious North African/Middle Eastern food.
Solid place!!!

Kev's place was awesome. The pictures he provides make the place look great, and it is even better in person. You won't find a nicer place to stay for the value on Manhattan. It is two blocks from the local train and five from the express train, so you can get anywhere in the city quickly and easily. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for somewhere to stay in the city!

Kevin was a great host.  He replied very quickly to any questions (before and during our stay).  Provided tips for local attractions, grocery stores, etc.  Condo was convenient to a few train stations.  Overall, we had a very enjoyable trip to NYC.
Kiev’s place is great. We stayed for 3 nights with our two kids. Lovely open space, v comfortable
Awesome location, great place. Kev is an great host.
Excellent place to stay with great location. Clean, comfortable, and convenient! We hope to return at another date. Kev was very responsive and helpful.

We had such a great stay! The condo is really close to the subway station and there are a lot of great places very close by! Everything looked as in the pictures. We also found a parking spot just in front of the door for all weekend! I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone coming to NY. The only thing I would have liked to know is that the best way to communicate with Kev is by texts (or What'sapp) instead of going through Airbnb.
Great apartment and great location.
Kev was a good host and it was a pleasure to stay at his apartment. Thanks, it made our trip to New York great!

Kev's place was great, very clean and a good size with a well stocked kitchen. It was in a nice area with multiple subway stations within 5 minute walks, also just a short walk to Central Park. Kev was very responsive and clear with messages. Would recommend!
The flat was very clean and near to subway! Perfect to visit NY

Kev ist ein super Gastgeber, der über Whats app auch immer erreichbar ist. Die Wohnung ist sauber,ausreichend groß, hat eine gute Lage und ist nur wenige Meter von der Subway entfernt. Diese Unterkunft ist auf jeden Fall zu empfehlen.

Kevin was a great host. The check in and check out process was quick and simple. The apartment had all the amenities we needed. My parents were in town for my graduation and they also loved the apartments decor and the space.
Amazing place! Very spacious, the apartment has great natural lightening. The bed was very comfortable to sleep on. Kevin was a great host. Definitely recommend
Great place! Really close to the subway and not far from Central Park! Great stay for a few days! Would definitely stay again. Thanks Kevin!!
Great location, easy communication with the host.  Highly recommend!

Kev was an amazing host - easy to get in touch with. The accommodation was exactly as shown in the photos. Location was great - close to shopping and transit.  Would recommend Kev's place to a friend.
It’s a great space.  Very convenient to the subway, good shops for groceries or wine.  Enormous towels.  Having 2 bedrooms is really nice.
This place is a superfecta: excellent location, easy access, quality accommodation, and great food & amenity options nearby!

Kev’s place is very close to subway with minimal walking, decent neighborhood and it is easy to get in touch with him as well (quick response time). The apartment is very clean and nicely updated. Enough space for 3+ people to sleep comfortably. The air conditioner kept the place nice and cool for the hot weekend!! Finding the hot water in the shower was tricky at first but once you figure it out you know it works! I’d definitely recommend this place and use it again!  Thanks for letting us stay!
Great place. Kev was awesome and attentive in communication.
Good deal. Clean, affordable and in a decent location
This was the second time I stayed at Kev's place and both times were great. Fantastic location, excellent space, and very comfortable and clean.

Kevin's apartment was very nice and spacious especially for New York city standards. I appreciated how he let us check-in early since our bus arrived early. Located conveniently near the subway station in a nice neighborhood where we enjoyed the local restaurants. My friends and I loved the apartment and all the amenities he provided that made us us feel at home.
Great place to stay and will plan on staying there again on a return trip!
Great place to stay in NY! Quiet area at night, super super spacious apartment, and enough space for people to sleep. Thanks Kev for a great stay!
Great communication by Kev
Great location, great communication from Kevin!
Great location near lots of good eats and public transportation. Kevin was prompt with responses. Would stay here again.
Great location, prompt responses from Kev, and tons of space. The price was a super value, and it was very close to the subway.
Great apartment, very comfortable, clean and excellent location.
Nice condo in Harlem.  very close to the subway.  Communication was painless.
Close to Colombia, central park north and several subway stations so convenient to get to where we needed to go. Kev was very responsive and accommodating to whatever came up.
great place! It was very easy to get in touch with Kev. And location is amazing for the price

Very spacious place in an up and coming neighborhood. Easy access to Columbia University and quick subway ride to midtown. Kev met me in person and was a very responsive host. Overall experience was positive.

The place was not ready at the stated check in time (1.5h delay), some parts were dirty (hasn't been dusted in a while, shower curtain was quite dirty, etc). Washer/dryer did not work properly, although Kev did warn me that there might be issues

Great space and great location! Kevin was an awesome host and made sure to communicate prior to our travel so we didn’t have any trouble getting from the airport to the air b&b. He made himself available easily by text and phone. He also kept his space clean and accommodating. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would do it again.

Kev’s place was more than we expected. It was great to have a full apartment to stay in, verses the hotels we normally stay at.  The bed was comfortable and we slept great. Only issue was finding the sweet spot for hot water/water pressure in the shower. Check in/out was easy. It is on the third floor, so careful with how many bags you have to carry up and down.

My husband and I stayed at Kev's place for a short trip. It was a great location and price. Super close to 2 different subways. Kev was always easy to communicate with and the check-in/check-out was great. Would recommend staying here for up to 4 people! A great place to get the best of Manhattan.
Clean, well kept two bedroom apartment in a great location. Kev was a great host, very prompt, good communication.
Kev's place was in a good location with lots of local food and entertainment.  Kev was very response to any questions.
Good host. Not sure how safe neighbourhood was at night, we didn’t go out at night. Easy checkin

Location is perfect. It is close to the subway that runs along 8th Avenue, giving easy access to the whole of Manhattan. There are excellent restaurants within mere feet of the apartment. Central Park and Columbia are within walking distance. There were some maintenance issues as it is an older building but Kev offered solutions and quick responses to these issue. Kev made check-in easy and provided excellent communication and information.
good location and nice and cosy appartment

Kevin was a very good host and met me at the apartment to show me around and give me the keys. He was very gracious and even allowed me to drop off my bags early and officially check in later. 
On the first night, which was quite cold, I experienced a notorious New York loss of heat. I alerted him in the morning and he came to help and determined the cause was a building wide boiler shutdown. He was very attentive to the issue and purchased space heaters for a temporary solution. 
The apartment was in a convenient location for upper west side locales and close to subway stations and bus lines. It is a short walk to the cathedral and Central Park and many good restaurants and shops 
There was plenty of space for 2 or more guests with 2 bedrooms and a pullout sofa in the living room. It had a decent sized kitchen for cooking meals if one chose to. 
The only down side is it is on the third floor of a brownstone (without an elevator) so I would take that into consideration when booking if not traveling light or one has an inability to climb stairs. 
All in all, it was a good experience and I would stay there again.
Great location and Kevin was a great host.  Very roomy space for Manhattan.  We would definitely stay again!

It turned into a residential district by the time of the Olympic Games, with the construction of Vila Olímpica and Paseo Marítimo. Check in time is at 3pm or later. summary: The best location in Sydney, within minutes from Hyde park and Sydney CBD. Placed on the famous Oxford street, but facing north onto a quiet park, which provides tranquility when within the room. Nevertheless it’s surrounded by awesome restaurants and nightlife, with buses running every 3-5 minutes direct to Bondi beach.
space: The apartment is modern and well furnished, always clean and nourished with fresh flowers. Has an abundance of natural light with large living spaces. A well lit and airy room facing the east, but with the ability to be blacked out and removed from the world.  A well kept private bathroom, equiped with hair dryer and other essentials. Having easy access to transport, it is a strategic place to enjoy vibrant Sydney at its most.

host.host_about: I work full time for a Law Firm, big into fitness, cooking and love meeting new people. I enjoy hosting on air bnb from time to time and am happy to give you all the tourist info you need :)

reviews.comments: Nick & Ed were so warm welcoming & friendly. They helped me get settled in, recommended a good spot for dinner & left me alone. I slept peacefully & the location was perfect :)

Nick is an excellent host and his place is 5 star standard. Great central location, beautifully furnished, spotlessly clean, good amenities, you can't ask for more. Check in and check out was easy and Nick is a great host. I highly recommend staying with Nick and I would definitely stay again!

Really lovely room in a stunning apartment overlooking the city. The bedroom was super quiet and Nick was very generous in making us feel at home, encouraging us to make use of all facilities - even the booze cabinet! He also gave great recommendations for places to eat and was very friendly and welcoming. Thanks Nick!

Nick has a stunning apartment in a perfect location walking distance to everything. Gorgeous city views and a super comfy bed.
Nick is a friendly and accommodating host with great style. Highly recommend a stay here.

Definitely not recommended! Only book if you're willing to take the risk of being homeless midstay!

The host was unreasonable, appallingly proud and would assume the worst of you. I'm gonna be honest, the place was nice and the location was great, but the host made the experience a nightmare. 

I made a booking for me and my dad to stay for two nights. There was a mistake in my part where I booked for one guest instead of two. However, I messaged Nick and told him WE (two of us) were coming. Nick also personally met my dad and me at check-in and he was fine with it. He later requested an extra charge for that (extra guest) and we duly paid. In the beginning, Nick seemed like a nice guy, showing us the place and told us to "feel at home" and "feel free to use the washing machine etc etc.". We stayed the first night and it was all good.

Then, on the second day, out of nowhere, with no prior communication, we were told to LEAVE the apartment. One of the reasons being that we "abused" the facilities. Apparently, using the washing machine and dryer twice is considered abusing the facilities in this apartment. Mind you, we only used the dryer again because the clothes were still damp. On top of that, I was accused of taking advantage of them by bringing extra guests (plural) with no evidence. 

Nick and his partner would later contact Airbnb and claimed that they saw my parents (plural) and they heard a female voice from their room. I was amazed because I didn't know my mum could teleport. 

I also find it odd that the host asked us to leave in the afternoon when they had actually decided to kick us out from the early morning. It became apparent after I realised that I could no longer get a refund for the second night because it had started. They claimed to have felt uncomfortable hosting us but appeared to be more than comfortable to receive the money despite their sudden cancellation. 

We really tried to communicate and cooperate as best as we could with Nick to reach an amicable solution. However, the host and his partner are more than happy to let us be homeless for a night since they've got their money. 

I'm not saying that the host would kick all future guests out, but are you willing to risk getting kicked out midstay? Because I won't be the last one. All it takes is for one of them to say they're uncomfortable for whatever reason they may have and there's nothing you nor Airbnb could do about it.

This is an amazing apartment to stay in. The views are fantastic and Nick’s recommendations on restaurants were spot on. The place is spotless and nice extra touches like meeting me when I arrived even though my timing was out just made my visit more special. Nick is a very thoughtful host and certainly goes that bit extra to make your stay enjoyable. Thanks again Nick

Such a beautiful and cosy apartment with views from the lounge/kitchen that pictures would definitely do no justice. I felt like I was at home. Nick stayed in the front bedroom but it felt like he wasn’t there at all, not until we needed his help with a hiccup trying to get the bathroom door unlocked haha. He is such a beautiful person, and I would without a doubt be recommending his beautiful place to any friends that wish to stay in the city in the future!
Great host and a lovely place to stay! Would highly recommend
Nicks place is amazing, he is very helpful and knowledgeable, the place is outstanding and beautiful right near Oxford street I would stay here again

Everything was perfect !
Ideally located,nice appartement & view.
Hosts very nice, helpful, discreet and welcoming !!
ticks all boxes host was kind and friendly

Thanks to Nick for being such a great host! I truly enjoyed my stay, everything was great - the apartment absolutely clean, has amazing view and located close to everything (such as Bondi Beach and Sydney Opera House), Nick was very helpful with making me comfortable at his apartment and gave me several tips where to go in Sydney! Highly recommend this place!

Nick's apartment is well appointed and well located. The room is tastefully decorated with plenty of space and a private bathroom. I enjoyed staying with Nick, who was very friendly and hospitable. I felt very welcome and at home.

The apartment is protected with a professional alarm system (PRONET) and offers a free high speed Wi-fi internet access. The living room and the Bed room air conditioned. The apartment provides also for business travelers a writing desk.  The Pi House Bosphorus enjoys a location in Istanbul, just 500 metres from Princes' Islands Ferry Port and 600 metres from Istiklal Street. The accommodation is 600 metres (8 minute walk) from Taksim Square. And 250 metres (3 minutes walk) from Findikli Tram which goes to Old Town (Blue mosque, Hagia Sofia, Archaeological Museum, Basilica Cistern etc.) St. Anthony of Padua Church is less than 1 km from the apartment, while Dolmabahce Clock Tower is a 15-minute walk from the property. host.host_about: If you are reading this page you are planing to visit istanbul and needs a flat to stay. Just tell me your exactly plan and i will give you all my best. Therefore i m ready anytime to help you to make you feel as you are in your home.

reviews.comments: We had a fantastic time at Recep’s place, he is a very helpful host, very easy to communicate with. The location is perfect, in the centre of Cihangir. The apartment was very clean, the view is probably one of the best in town. We can only recommend it to all those who visit the city. We had a perfect long weekend, thanks also to the great apartment we stayed in.

Good View
Central Location 
Clear guidance from host

It was great to stay this weekend at Recep’s apartment with our kids; very clean and tidy place. You will find enough kitchenware for cooking, good heating and music system, a new washing machine.. 
Besides we enjoyed very nice Bosphorus view of the apartment and we are very thankful for Recep’s warm hospitality..
Lovely neighbourhood too!

The Pi House turned out to be much more better than the expectations and the scenery of Bosphorus was better than the pictures itself. Recep is a great host, who answers quickly to all questions. The house is big, bigger than you need, there are two rooms with big beds and two other small beds, and couches all around. This is a really good place to celebrate special days, just have a day off from everything, or live Istanbul with its famous view. 

Квартира намного лучше в жизни, чем на фото. Хозяин отличный — он быстро отвечает и помогает. Вид тоже шикарнее, чем на фото. Квартира большая такая, и очень близка к всему в Стамбуле. Вид и локация божественное даже для самих Стамбульских. Я очень советую.

The apartment was just amazing and the panoramic view was a breathtaking. The living room was spacious and modern with a cute dining table and a cool surrounding sound system. The kitchen equipped with a lot of the necessary tools and some food, coffee and water. The bathroom was clean and also fully equipped. Also is worth mentioning, It has a laundry, baby bed, slippers and umbrella! Reçep is a very nice person and super helpful and You won’t imagine how he took care of all the details. It was a very nice experience and I would definitely go back again!!!

Thanks again and would definitely recommend!

Definitely recommend Pi House as a great place to stay in Istanbul.

reviews.comments:
I wish I had spent a little more money and gone to a motel because this was an absolute nightmare of a house. There was dirt literally everywhere and it looked like the common areas, bathroom, and room hadn’t been swept in ages. The bathroom had grime and hair on the sink, floor and in the bathtub. The room was supposed to be two queen beds but instead was one twin and one queen and was super cramped and uncomfortable. The room was also supposed to have a “view” according to the listing but all we saw were the neighbors’ backyard as well as a huge pile of random trash. The soap dispenser in the bathroom had soap so diluted with water that we ended up using hand sanitizer to clean our hands. The listing also said it was close to downtown but it ended up being a 45-1 hour trip to downtown one way (bus and then train), and it was super inaccessible. Overall I’m really disappointed because the listing looked lovely and instead it ended up being super gross and really uncomfortable for all of us. Additionally there were a ton of people there and the lock on the door for our room was super broken down and could easily have been opened. I’m also pretty sure that mould/dust in the house is the reason my friend got sick the first night we were there.  

I have stayed in cheaper places that have been nicer than this and it was so awful to have this trip ruined for us. Our friend group was meeting for the first time in over 8 months and it was such a let down as the host seemed really nice and down to earth. We definitely learned our lesson to do more research and to plan further in advance to book a better place for New Years in the future.

host.host_about:
Hi there,

My name is Harry and I'm new on the Airbnb platform on recommendation of my friends.  Born & raised in Hong Kong I like to meet new people and cultures. So feel free too contact me if you like to explore Hong Kong and l love to show you what this beautiful country has to offer.

As a "foodie" I like to explore all kinds of cuisines and I also like to walk around in Hong Kong to discover all new restaurants and bars. Delicious food, a nice drink and a great conversation is a great way to enjoy life.

If you wish to stay in Hong Kong for a reasonable price in a new, modern and elegant apartment choose one of my apartments and you will be satisfied from the comfort, peace and silence you find in it. 

Don't hesitate to contact me, it is always nice to meet new people and/ or to help you to have a great time in Hong Kong.

address.street: 佐敦, 九龍, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 房间和图片一样 香港寸土寸金已经很不错了 很适合一家人
Great place to stay, convenient location, cozy place. Recommend for everyone
Harry's place was incredibly well located and a good value Airbnb. I would absolutely stay there again!!

房子的位置非常方便 就在佐敦地铁站对面 附近很多吃的 也有很多可以打卡的美食店
房间装修很有格调 床很舒适 一个干湿分离的卫浴和一个普通卫浴
就是最后一晚不知道为什么热水器坏了直到第二天退房都没能有热水澡洗 
总体来说是很不错的房子 性价比也很高
非常温馨
一次非常不错的住宿体验,干净整洁,闹中取静,衣食住行都超级便利,2个无小孩家庭入住非常合适,推荐哦!
位置佳(過馬路就是地鐵電梯入口),乾淨空間ok(2間房間,2套衛浴)

房间地理位置非常好在地铁站旁边
房间里有很难闻的空气清新剂味道 建议停止使用
建议立刻修复淋浴 现在是坏的
The refreshing spray used in the apartment is annoyingly smelly.
The shower is not working with the bathroom
房间干净整洁,距离地铁口也很近,交通非常方便,晚上也很安静｡下次再去香港还会入住｡
总的来说还是很不错的,三个人以上的话会有些挤｡不过那里交通便利,周围商场也很多,麻雀虽小五脏俱全,下次来还会预定的!!

Beautiful and stylish apartment. In cities like Hong Kong with very limited space and expensive properties, you are bound to stay at small units like this one but what made up for it are cleanliness and thoughtful amenities (i.e. USB-capable extensions cord/wire). Check-in and communication with hosts were quick and easy. When you hire a cab or Uber from airport or somewhere else in city, you may advise the driver to drop you off at Tak Hing St. (parallel to Nathan Road) as there is a back entrance to the building. Close to Jordan MTR station (exits D and E), 1-2 minute walk. You can walk along Nathan Road for some shopping and reach TST in a breeze.

reviews.comments: 房东人很好,很贴心｡房子空间宽敞,干净整洁,离佐敦地铁站非常近｡卫生间算香港很大的了,nice!
很好的房主,热情细心周到,房间干净整洁卫生
房間位置很好,樓下就是佐敦地鐵站,地方還是比較好找的,房間格局方正,裝修簡單舒適,大窗戶非常加分｡房東可愛又好說話,如果前後沒有預定的話入住和退房時間可以寬鬆一些,總的來說是一次非常好的入住體驗: )

It is well-located. It is a stone´s throw of Jordan MTR station, 24/7 supermarket, restaurants, etc.  The studio is bigger than the average in HK. The bed are just the right size for 2 people. No wifi. Instructions for checking in are very clear and easy. The host is quite responsive, solves problems quickly, and she is very kind.
有問題和房東溝通後很及時幫忙解決,房間寬敞,整潔舒服｡推薦~(◍´꒳`◍)

Super great location, 1 mins walk to the nearest subway station. The host is super nice and reachable, try her effort to accommodate my requests. And the check in is very easy, thanks for hosting the short stay.
Good place to stay! Very small but neat and clean. Lots of nice amenities and Moonie is very easy to communicate with.

房主非常非常nice  有求必应很贴心~
房源的位置也很好 到哪里都很方便
是一次很开心的旅行哦 推荐大家住在这里
房间较大,进门的台阶最好要有一个提醒标志呀,一进门差点儿就趴地下了,房间临街,晚上略吵但我可以睡着的,隔壁的小哥哥小姐姐们睡的也是很晚了,哈哈,其他都还好,可以考虑居住｡
Very convenient and you can stay here like local people.
房间算是很大的了,很适合一家住.地理位置很好,很方便
期待就好
离佐敦站特别近,房间很大很干净与描述相符,没看清没有wifi还好有租~
地理位置挺好的,周边有很多可玩的地方
服务态度很好,房间位置交通方便,室内空间适中,设施完整,非常满意的体验!
交通便利,就在佐敦地铁站b1出口左手边对面的大楼里｡房间真的挺大了,在香港这样的弹丸之地｡没有异味,床铺也干净,卫生间也没有异味,记得热水器要提前15分钟加热哦,不然打开是冷水｡空调遥控器有点按不灵,临街有一丢丢吵,但可以接受,不影响睡觉｡
房間蠻大的也很乾淨 地點離地鐵站很近去哪都很方便 只是房間靠近馬路晚上會有點吵 不過整體來說都是一次很不錯的體驗
非常干净!位置很好!而且真的性价比很高!那么大的房间真的非常舒服!不过隔音有点差,邻居半夜讲话听的很清楚,还有楼下车声真的非常大声,原本以为可以克服,但还是偶尔会被吵醒｡除此之外没有问题去!非常好!
首先,这家民宿位置极其便利,若你是动车到达香港,就只要从西九龙步行十几分钟即可到达｡同时,从民宿步行到海港城也只需十几分钟;再则,民宿的房间在香港算是很大的,有两张床,床挺宽,可睡4个人｡房中有微波炉,有家的感觉｡整体评价不错,下回来港会再次入住｡若要提点建议的话,入房前的过道可清理得更干净些,房内可适当再作点装饰,看起来更有情调一些｡

位置很好 地铁出来就是大厦
附近就是庙街 各种网红店
房间够大了 比很多酒店都大了
行李完全不是问题
moonie不会主动提供浴巾 
其实毛巾什么的还是用自己的比较好
卫生点 整个大厦基本上都是家庭宾馆
其实来往人员还是比较复杂的
建议上好锁 单身女性要有自保意识
我来往香港多次 酒店和anb因为很多了
这间房这个价格算便宜的 住2个富裕
4个人会有点挤 这次来香港
个人花销不过2k 我都佩服自己啊
Todo muy facil, un poco de ruido, todo correcto

name: Sydney Inner West room. Single or King bed
summary: located in Sydney's Inner West Suburb of Summer Hill, and only a couple of minutes from the train station, our apartment is a perfect home base for exploring what Sydney has to offer.
space: Our place is your place.  The lounge room and kitchen are here for you to relax, cook and hang out.  The room doubles as our library/study with a Bed that can either be a single or folds out to a comfortable king size depending on who is staying.
description: located in Sydney's Inner West Suburb of Summer Hill, and only a couple of minutes from the train station, our apartment is a perfect home base for exploring what Sydney has to offer. Our place is your place.  The lounge room and kitchen are here for you to relax, cook and hang out.  The room doubles as our library/study with a Bed that can either be a single or folds out to a comfortable king size depending on who is staying. We are as available as much or as little as you like, but we are happy to share our experiences and knowledge of Sydney with you. Our place is located in the the quaint suburb of Summer Hill in Sydney's Inner West.  Summer Hill has a village vibe to it with unique restaurants and bars to explore. We are a stones throw away from Summer Hill train Station which is less than a 15min train ride to destinations like Newtown, Redfern and Central Station.
