Mark amd Sarah are a lovely couple with a lot of tips for you about how to get the best around in sydney and what are nice places to go
If you enjoy to travel you will get more than just along with them

This was our favourite bnb so far. In a great location a couple minute walk from the train station, super easy check in and in a sweet little apartment. Mark is a super friendly host while giving you all the privacy you want. Would highly recommend to anyone!

Me and my friend loved staying with him. He was very friendly and we couldn‘t have asked for a better host! 
The room was very clean and he gave us some great tips!
Mark and Sarah are nice and welcoming people. Again, Thanks a lot for everything !

name: Modern & sunny apt in Copacabana
summary: One block from Bolivar St. In the best area of Copacabana, with 2 rooms and 2 bathrooms, it offers a very comfortable stay for guests. Walking distance from the beach (250 mts), bars and restaurantes including the ones in Ipanema (2 kms).
space: Full Furnished apartment ,  living room with  sofa bed , two bedrooms (1 suite and 1 bedroom) with queen beds. Fully equipped kitchen. Air conditioning, Cable TV and Wifi, noise-isolation windows. It is a small building with 8 apartments only so very quiet and familiar.
description: One block from Bolivar St. In the best area of Copacabana, with 2 rooms and 2 bathrooms, it offers a very comfortable stay for guests. Walking distance from the beach (250 mts), bars and restaurantes including the ones in Ipanema (2 kms). Full Furnished apartment ,  living room with  sofa bed , two bedrooms (1 suite and 1 bedroom) with queen beds. Fully equipped kitchen. Air conditioning, Cable TV and Wifi, noise-isolation windows. It is a small building with 8 apartments only so very quiet and familiar. The building does not have doorman so guests will have keys to open the gate and front door. I can be reached by phone and email anytime and will support you in case there are difficulties using the apt facilities. Copabacana is a place where you can find anything you need even though you won't need much. It offers such a variety of things to do, it is really fun to walk around and discover excellent food and shops by yourself. Once you want a change from feijoadas, barbecues and seafo
neighborhood_overview: Copabacana is a place where you can find anything you need even though you won't need much. It offers such a variety of things to do, it is really fun to walk around and discover excellent food and shops by yourself. Once you want a change from feijoadas, barbecues and seafood, you can have the authentic acai from Para in Arataca (R. Domingos Ferreira 41) and get some excellent arabic food in Baalbeck inside Galeria Menescal (N.Sra.Copacabana 664). Not to mention the marvelous Boulangerie Guerin few steps from home. Also very charming to spend an afternoon having a cold white wine in Confeitaria Colombo inside Forte Copacabana. All walking distance.
transit: Still you should visit Lagoa Rodrigues de Freitas (2 kms walking), Lapa and Sta Teresa (bus or taxi), Pao de Açucar (bus), Corcovado (bus or taxi) and Maracana (metro Cantagalo) at least. Don't lose the sunset in Arpoardor (walking). Wherever you want to go, Copacabana gives you easy access to buses and metro, also taxis are available 24 hours.
access: The building does not have doorman so guests will have keys to open the gate and front door.
interaction: I can be reached by phone and email anytime and will support you in case there are difficulties using the apt facilities.
house_rules: I kindly request that air conditioning is not left on when it is not in use since the electric costs are very high. Also, toilets are not good place to throw paper, so avoid having having it clogged. Then the usual request related to keeping the noise level down in consideration of the neighbors.

host.host_about:
Hello, 
even though I was born in Rio de Janeiro, I have been leaving out of the city for most of my life but always enjoying vacation here.
I like the freedom and easygoing way of life that Rio inspires. 
It is always warm and sunny and bright. 
Rio was gifted by nature in a very unique way. Its beaches and montains are so beautiful that you never get tired of admiring them. 
It will be my pleasure to host you and your family and to make your stay comfortable.
Welcome and have fun.

reviews.comments: Melina was professional and prompt at all times. All of the organizational logistics were impeccable and went smoothly. The apartment Is what we had expected from the pictures. I would stay there again. Thanks a lot. Urs

El apartamento es maravilloso, nos sentimos como en un hotel de 5 estrellas. Melina fué muy especial, al igual que Leo el portero, quien nos ayudó en todo. El barrio es muy lindo y seguro, con restaurantes muy cerca, a tres cuadras de la estación del metro y a dos de la playa. El apartamento es muy iluminado, los muebles, cortinas, toallas, ropa de cama son nuevos y muy lindos. La próxima vez que volvamos a Rio nos hospedaremos aqui de nuevo, super recomendado! We felt like in a 5 stars hotel, Melina was an excellent host, the apartment is wonderful, the furniture, towels, curtains, blankets, all are brand new. The doorman was very helpful, the neighborhood is very safe, and the apartment is close to the metro station, the beach and nice restaurants, markets and bakeries, so you can easily buy things for breakfast at the corner. It has a very quiet washing machine which was really helpful. Melina left us hairdryer, iron, soaps, coffee, beers, water, lots of towels, and many other nice details that made our stay an unforgetable experience. We were very happy staying at Melina' s place, we super recommend the apartment, you won't regret! Melina also gave us important advices before our stay, like the taxi fares, she recommended us some restaurants, and she was very quick and kind to answer our doubts before and while our stay. Next time in Rio we would loooove to stay at Melina's apartment again!
Es war alles wunderbar! Ich habe mich sehr über deine schnellen freundlichen Antworten gefreut, kuchen konnten wir für Weihnachten auch backen

Melina, adorei a estadia no seu apartamento. Lugar incrível, perto de tudo, inclusive do metrô. Apartamento completo, com roupas de cama, utensílios domésticos, me senti em minha própria (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei. Obrigada, Regina.

Tivemos uma excelente estadia!! Perfeita!! A anfitriã Melina sempre nos atendeu prontamente e fomos recebidos pelo zelador do prédio, que também nos atendeu muito bem nas pequenas demandas.
O apartamento é exatamente como mostrado nas fotos. Tudo muito novo e de muito bom gosto. É bastante equipado, com ar-condicionado na sala e nos dois quartos, TV a cabo, DVD, wi-fi, além de uma cozinha bem aparelhada e roupas de cama, mesa e banho.
Muito bem localizado, com padaria, supermercado, restaurante, lanchonete, bar, sorveteria, ponto de ônibus, metrô e praia num raio de poucos metros. 
Mesmo com todas estas facilidades nos arredores, o apartamento é muito silencioso graças as suas janela de vidro que ficam bem fechadas.
O prédio é pequeno e bastante familiar, numa área na qual nos sentimos em (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos a nos hospedar aqui num futuro próximo. Obrigado por tudo!!

We had an amazing time at Melina's apartment. Everything was as described and in excellent condition. Melina was highly responsive and gave us some great recommendations on where to dine. Also Leo (the caretaker) was very kind and supportive. The apartment is less than 4min. walking (200m) from the beach in Copacabana. 5* apartment and host.
Melina was very accommodating.  She was easy to contact and quick to  respond. The place was in a great location only a few blocks from the beach and shops. The place itself was very nice too.

La descripcion del departamento fue tal como lei en la pagina y las fotos lo demuestran. Tanto Melina como Leo, el portero, se portaron muy bien con nosotros, muy serviciales. Todo muy lindo! Recomendado 100%.

Departamento excelente, comodidad, confort, equipado con todo lo necesario para una buena estadia en Rio, ubicado en el barrio de Copacabana, a 20 mts de la Av. Copacabana y a una cuadra de la costanera..
El departamento estaba en excelentes condiciones, confort, limpieza, comodidad, muy moderno y bien equipado.. Ubicado en Copacabana a una cuadra de la costanera..
Minha experiência foi ótima! O apartamento esta do jeito que esta na foto, é super bem localizado, a proprietária deixou tudo bem organizado, limpo... Adorei! Com certeza voltarei mais vezes!

Apartamento rigorosamente de acordo com o anúncio. Totalmente equipado e com localização perfeita. Minha estadia foi super tranquila e Melina (apesar de não conhecer pessoalmente) foi super atenciosa e sempre disponível (por telefone ou mensagem). Recomento muito.

El barrio muy lindo esta a dos cuadras de la playa, el departamento es tal cual lo describen, muy fresco y luminoso. Melina es una gran anfitriona, muy atenta a los detalles y necesidades. En verdad es muy recomendable, nosotros lo pasmamos genial.
O apartamento é confortável e a localização excelente. Muito próximo da praia de Copacabana, restaurantes e bares.

El dpto era tal como se lo ilustro en las fotos. Muy limpio y totalmente aireado, con todas las comodidades. Muy buenas camas. Totalmente tranquilo ya que en el edificio habita muy poca gente. La ubicacion es excelente. 150 mts de la playa y concectado con todas la lineas de transportes.- Ya lo hemos recomendado a amigos que tienen pensado visitar Rio.-

O apartamento é exatamente como descrito, tudo funcionando como esperado. Melina foi muito atenciosa e prestativa e o Léo foi muito gentil. Super recomendo e certamente quando voltar ao Rio, me hospedarei lá novamente.

El departamento es perfecto, esta increíblemente equipado, tiene todo lo que necesitas para sentirte como en tu casa, todo en perfecto funcionamiento, los dos baños, la cocina, el smart tv, pueden dormir perfectamente comodas hasta 6 personas! Nos vamos muy contentos con las vacaciones. Tambien tiene muy buena luminosidad! Además la zona en Copacabana, cerca de la playa y del centro comercial. Gracias! Saludos, Nicolás.

Melina a viagem foi maravilhosa!! O apartamento é ótimo!! exatamente como descrito nas fotos: bem limpo, espaçoso, ótimas camas, cozinha completa. A localização não poderia ser melhor, tudo ao alcance: bancos, padaria, restaurantes, praias, supermercados, até um cineminha bem próximo.
Fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Léo que sempre esteve disponível quando precisamos de auxílio.

Melina's accommodations were more than I could have asked for.  From the moment I stepped in the door, I felt as if I were at home.  While my trip to Rio was short, Melina made sure that I had everything I needed to make the short trip memorable.

The apartment was large and full of light.  The windows opened completely so that you could take advantage of the cool breeze.  The location was as described, and a quick walk to the beautiful Copacabana beach.  

Melina was very quick to respond to any questions I had regarding the apartment, and eager to provide suggestions and recommendations on where to eat, and what to do in the area.  Overall, my experience was amazing thanks to Melina, and I would definitely stay here again.
A estadia foi ótima, a descrição do apartamento era exatamente a que consta nas fotos. Adoramos a permanência e a receptividade, com certeza voltaremos.

El apartamento es muy cómodo, limpio, luminoso y muy bien equipado. La ubicación es a 2 cuadras de la playa de copacabana y cerca para ir caminando a ipanema. A 3 cuadras esta la estacion de Metro  Cantagalo o bien a 2 tenes la avenida para tomarte un Bus.
Las habitaciones son amplias con camas muy cómodas y tiene placares bien amplios por lo que nos sentimos como en casa. 
Adicionalmente, el encargado del edificio "LEO" esta siempre disponible para cualquier ayuda que necesites o si te falta algo enseguida lo soluciona.
Altamente recomendable.

Desde que llegamos al departamento nos sentimos como en nuestro hogar, Melina se habia encargado de que no faltase nada y previamente nos habia respondido cada duda y recomendado diferentes lugares para comer, visitar etc. La descripcion del departamento era exactamente igual a las fotos. El barrio es muy lindo, lleno de bares, restaurants, supermercados y negocios y a 200 metros de la playa. Leo, el portero, nos soluciono al instante incluso un domingo los pequenitos problemitas con la mejor predisposicion.

Delicioso, confortável, muito bem cuidado são alguns adjetivos que posso usar para descrever o apartamento de Melina. Mas a sensação de estar em casa, aconchegado, seguro não tem descrição em adjetivos, tem que ir lá para sentir. Não nos arrependemos em nenhum momento pela escolha e a única tristeza foi ir embora. TUDO ali perto , padaria , supermercado, lojas , a Guerin( boulangerie) , a praia ! Tudo em um simples dobrar a esquina. Silencioso, exemplarmente limpo, com o Léo hiper cuidadoso a nos ciceronear! Valeu Melina , recomendamos sem dúvida seu apartamento e muito obrigado por sua paciência quando precisamos mudar a data ( graças a Deus que havia outra disponível ) e por seu belo apartamento. Retornaremos , com certeza !

Great apartment, just as described, clean and we'll located within a short walk of Copacabana beach. Lots of restaurants and bars nearby. Melina' s communication was excellent and  Leo the flat superintendent was welcoming and helpful.  Very happy to recommend this apartment.

Foi  maravilhosa a nossa estada no Rio!
O apartamento, a localização, o atendimento da Melina e do porteiro Léo, corroboraram  para o sucesso de nosso passeio.
Apartamento incrível em conforto e localização, fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Leo, recomendo e pretendo voltar no próximo mês, com certeza irei recomendar. Obrigada Melinda!

Melina foi uma excelente anfitriã! Apartamento conforme as fotos publicadas é muito bem localizado. Zelador responsável pela entrega da chave muito educado, prestativo é muito gentil! Certamente estarei por lá novamente.

Melina was a wonderful host. She was super friendly and answered all my questions quickly. Her place was conveniently located and was very close to the beach. It was clean, nicely furnished. We felt very safe and comfortable during the whole trip. Overall, we really enjoyed our stay at the place. Thanks Melina.

A estadia no apartamento foi incrivel, muito bem organizado limpo. Exatamente como mostra as fotos.
Localização otima, próximo de tudo.. padarias, mercados, restaurantes, praia.

Excelente departamento ubicado a 5 minutos a pie de la playa de Copacabana,  equipado con todo lo necesario e impecablemente limpio. El anfitrión proporciona todos los artículos básicos (jabón, papel, servilletas, sabanas, toallas, etc) El edificio muy tranquilo y seguro. Muchas gracias Melina y Leo, todo estuvo perfecto!

El Departamento es tal cual lo muestran las fotos, decorado con buen gusto y esmero, equipado completamente de acuerdo a lo descrito y más. La ubicación es muy buena: cerca de la playa y de comercios de todo tipo que facilitan la estadía. 
La atención de parte de Leo y Melina también es excelente, dispuestos siempre a atendernos y con respuesta inmediata.
Melina is quick in response to our questions which made our life very easy. The apartment is exactly like in the pictures, clean, bright, three min walk from the beach. We couldn't have loved more.

O apartamento da Melina é ótimo, fiel as fotos, com ampla sala, split's em todos o cômodos, todos utensílios necessários para acomodar os hospedes. Fácil comunicação, através de mensagens tive rápida resposta à tudo que precisei durante a estadia, o prédio tem ótima localização apenas à uma quadra e meia da praia, próximo à padarias, restaurantes e bares da (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendo para quem for ao Rio de Janeiro à ficar no apartamento da Melina.

When I arrive, I was given a warm greeting and shown the apartment.  The apartment was very clean.  Nicely decorated.  The beds were very comfortable.    I come to Rio at least twice a year and I believe this was the best apartment I've stayed in so far.

I would recommend this apartment to any and would like to thank Melina for a great stay.  I loved your apartment.

Melina's apartment is the best value for money in Copacabana. It is located in an extra safe area just five minute walking distance to the beach. 

The apartment is spacious enough for two couples (like us), has two bedrooms, two bathrooms and looks even better than it is represented on photos. We were happy to find washing machine and all kitchen utensils one can need.

Although we arrived pretty early, it was not a problem to check in even in the morning.

Special thanks to Leo who was very helpful (once we couldn't locate a light switch - and he helped us even in this case).

This apartment is definitely recommended to all traveling to Rio. It will make your stay in the city even brighter - I guarantee this.

Perfect place in Rio the Janeiro, you can walk in 2 min to the bank or to the copacobana/beach. Also the neighborhood is really safe!! We really enjoyed en the apparent is really beautiful!

Greets, Carmen from Amsterdam

We had a great stay in Melina's apartment in Copacabana. We loved it! The apartment is great, very comfortable, convenient and exactly how it looks in the pictures. It was probably recently renovated, as everything looks brand new. There are lots of room, with two large bedrooms, two bathrooms. It is always sunny and the three air conditioners make it very comfortable even in the warmest Rio days. The location is really great! Only two blocks from the beach, in a very nice area of Copacabana. The metro is only three blocks away, there is a supermarket a block away and lots of restaurants nearby. And of course, very easy to have a caipirinha by the beach. Leo, the building manager is very friendly and always willing to help. Overall we had a great stay in Rio at Melina's apartment. We highly recommend it!

We are a family of 4 and stayed at Melina's apartment for 2 weeks. This is a stylish flat, very comfortable and has everything you need. The location is close to Copacabana Beach and a metro station, you can also walk to Ipanema Beach and Arpoador for the sunsets in about 15 minutes.  There are banks, supermarkets and restaurants very close. I would recommend Pizza Caravelle and a visit the roof top bar at the Pestana Atlantica Hotel at night for great views across Copacabana. Melina is professional in her management of the apartment and is fluent in English. We were made to feel very welcome. I would be happy to recommend this apartment.
Muy lindo departamento, excelente ubicación en Copacabana, zona segura y tranquila. Lo super recomiendo. Departamento cómodo, bonito y funcional! No podría pedir más. Excelente!!!

Nos sentimos muy a gusto en nuestra estadia, nos recibieron en el horario pactado. El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, muy confortable y muy lindo, esta ubicado en un lugar especifico, a dos cuadras de la playa de Copacabana, y cerca de de las avenidas, y centros comerciales. Esperamos volver pronto!!!
Apartamento limpo, organizado. Ambiente agradável. Localização ótima. Melina sempre muito solicita na troca de mensagens. Léo foi muito gentil e nos recebeu muito bem.

El departamento es como aparece en las fotos. Es muy cómodo, luminoso, ventilado, tiene buenos colchones, todo funciona, el barrio es lindo y está cerca de la playa. Estaba impecablemente limpio, con jabones, papel higiénico, toallas y toallones. Tiene wifi y netflix. Melina es muy amable y atenta. También es importante destacar que el portero Leo es muy atento.
Apartment is very spacious, clean, and well-located. Communication with Melina and Leo was easy and our stay was great!
Excelente departamento, muy limpio, muebles nuevos,cocina bien equipada, y la ubicacion ideal. Muy recomendable!

Melina tu departamento nos gustó mucho, nos pareció muy cómodo y equipado. La ubicación es muy buena también, queda cerca de todos los puntos de interes de Rio, por lo cual es muy fácil moverse en la ciudad deade allí. Desde ya es super recomendable para cualquier viajero que desee visitar la ciudad. Muchas gracias por la hospitalidad. Lore & Leo

Muy bueno el departamento! es tal cual se ve en la fotos... amplio y luminoso. Ubicado en una zona muy cómoda, tanto para disfrutar de las playas durante el día, como para hacer vida nocturna. Esta cerca (4 cuadras) del Metro :-).
Por otro lado, tanto Melina como Leo son personas bárbaras! muy atentos y dispuestos a colaborar para que tu estadía en Rio sea impecable ..! sin dudas volveríamos!

Nice location, clean and compact place. Melina was reachable for any questions and immediately responded. The supervisor on site was also very helpful when we had some issues with hot water in one of the bathrooms. He even arranged a taxi for us at 4 AM.

A Melina cuidou de tudo para que eu e a minha família aproveitássemos ao máximo nossa estadia no Rio! O apartamento era ótimo, com cozinha e quartos muito bons, todos com ar condicionado!  Para quem deseja curtir o Rio como um verdadeiro morador, esse é o apartamento!! Super indico!

El apartamento de Melina es muy lindo, moderno y absolutamente cómodo. Es incluso más lindo cuando se lo ve personalmente que en las fotos. 
Nos recibió con el apartamento en un estado impecable de limpieza, y con todas las cosas que necesitábamos para estar cómodas. Está muy bien pensado para los visitantes, ya que hay de todo! Hasta paraguas! 

El barrio es muy lindo, la ubicación es perfecta, porque no sólo está a dos cuadras de la Playa de Copacabana, sino que está a unos metros de la Rua Nossa Senhora de Copabana, donde se pueden encontrar todo tipo de tiendas, farmacias y supermercados. Hay un Starbucks que abre las 24 horas a tres cuadras del apartamento, lo cual también es muy bueno y una tienda de alimentos gourmet en la esquina (se llama Santa Marta Gourmet). 

Melina siempre estuvo disponible para las consultas que tuviéramos sobre el apartamento, que realmente fueron pocas, ya que estaba todo muy bien. Siempre responde a los mensajes de forma rápida y amable, además de hacer que todo el proceso sea muy fácil, incluso para nosotras que llegamos muy temprano en la madrugada. Leo, el portero del edificio está siempre ahí para ayudar en lo que los visitantes necesiten y también es una persona muy amable y bien dispuesta. 

Realmente, todas vamos a recomendar este apartamento porque tuvimos una experiencia inmejorable.
Superb flat and location, Melina was a great host on call to make sure we had everything
Superbe prestation super accueil et très bonne situation  grand merci à Melina

Un très bon séjour chez Melina. 
L'appartement est conforme aux photos. Il est propre et très bien placé, à 2 rues de la plage de Copacabana, au pied des bus et du métro. Tous pleins de commerces à côté pour faire des courses, du shopping et même une boulangerie Française où le pain y est très bon.
En plus, sans être intrusifs Melina et Léo sont toujours dispo pour répondre à nos questions, pour nous dépanner si besoin. 
Si nous revenons à Rio, nous reviendrons sans hésiter chez Melina.

Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable dans un appartement bien équipé avec deux grandes chambres et deux belles salles de bain, à 300m de la plage et proche de tous commerces et du métro. Idéal pour profiter à la fois des plages et du centre de Rio.

A Melina é uma ótima anfitriã: sempre muito atenciosa, disponível e prestativa. O apartamento é exatamente como descrito nas fotos: bem cuidado, limpo e espaçoso. A localização é muito boa: perto da praia, padaria, supermercado, restaurantes, supermercados, etc. Fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Léo que sempre ato a orientar-nos e auxiliar-nos.

Nuestra estadía fue excelente. El departamento es tal cual como se ve en las fotos, muy cómodo, impecable, con todo lo necesario para 4/5 personas, y además muy bien ubicado. El barrio también muy bueno, a sólo 2 cuadras de la playa y a media cuadra de la (Website hidden by Airbnb) Copacabana, una avenida con mucho movimiento donde se pueden encontrar todo tipo de comercios, tiendas, bares y restaurantes.
Melina excelente anfitriona, no la pudimos conocer personalmente pero siempre estuvo disponible para cualquier consulta y/o asesoramiento, ya sea a través de la página o por (Hidden by Airbnb) .
Leo, el encargado del edificio, también muy atento a cualquier necesidad, y hasta nos reservó el taxi el último día para regresar al aeropuerto.
Sin duda recomendamos el departamento de Melina, y volveriamos a alojarnos allí en una próxima visita a Río.

We were very pleased with our stay. Melina was quite pleasant to communicate with via messaging. Her superintendent Leo was also very helpful in all our accommodations. The apartment is exactly how it is advertised. Very cute, cozy, clean and we felt right at home from day one till the very last day. Check in and out is very flexible which was a huge plus for us. There is no doubt in my mind I would be looking to stay in the exact place my next trip to Rio. We did have some technical difficulties with the WiFi. It would connect and disconnect every few minutes. So may want to check on the router and see why for future guests that may not have good international options with their cell provider. But it's not like we were in the home all day anyways so not too big of a deal. Other than that, I highly suggest anyone looking to stay in a good location to look into this apartment. The building itself is very well maintained, quiet and clean! Melina is super helpful and kind. I couldn't have had a better experience elsewhere. Thank you Melina & also thank you Leo!! Hope to be coming back soon!
Adorei o apartamento. Super bem localizado e completo. O contato com a Melina foi excelente, sempre atendendo prontamente.
Estadía muy buena. Departamento tal como es ofertado. Melina una excelente anfitriona. Leo muy amable y dispuesto a solucionar cualquier inconveniente.

Apartamento limpo, bem localizado, fomos super bem-recebidos!

Fantástico!
El departamento supera la descripción, todo súper limpio, las camas cómodas y la ubicación genial. Muchas gracias!!!
The welcome from Leo was perfect. Very good communication and very helpful with recommendations. Thanks

Pessoal... Localização perfeita, próximo a tudo, a bancos, restaurantes, muito próximo à praia. Fomos em 4 pessoas, o que acomodou muito bem, e acomoda 6 pessoas tranquilamente !! Instalações perfeitas, limpeza extraordinária !!! 
Muito bom, com certeza voltarei e super recomendo !!

Apartamento espaçoso e bem equipado, ar condicionado em todos os ambientes e isso foi muito importante. Tudo como está nas fotos. Bem localizado, próximo ao metrô, supermercado, praia e restaurantes. Adoramos e com certeza ficaríamos novamente no espaço da Melinda.

Quero agradecer a atenção da Melina e do Leo, tudo perfeito.
Se voltar para o RJ quero ficar na sua casa novamente.

Muito obrigada.

Melina es una excelente anfitriona, en todo momento estuvo pendiente de que nuestra estadía sea maravillosa. El apartamento es increible! super recomendable desde la comodidad, el equipamiento, la limpieza, la ubicación y todo. 
De volver a Río la volvería elegir

My husband, parents, and I stayed at Melina's place for two nights. The apartment was as pictured. Two nice sized bedrooms and baths. Plenty of towels. Lots of closet space.  We appreciated the use of the washing machine. Use of the kitchen fit our needs. The wifi was fast and reliable. Nice to have an elevator in the building after being on our feet all day exploring the city. The best part of this place is it's location. Three blocks from Copacabana Beach, close to a metro stop, and close to shops and restaurants. The communication with Melina was great from the start. She was quick when answering my questions. The check-in and check-out process was easy. Would definitely stay here again.
Hermoso departamento, tal cual lo describe! A dos cuadras de la playa y a media cuadra de una avenida comercial. Excelente la atención y respuesta de Melina!

name: Alcove Studio in Downtown Manhattan
summary: Spend summer in NYC!  Clean and comfortable 550sq ft alcove studio in downtown Manhattan.  My apartment can accommodate up to three guests and is centrally location at the junction of Chelsea/Flatiron/Union Square.
space: A getaway nest that you can retreat to after a day of activities and a night of adventure.  The apartment is located near bars, restaurants, theatres, and retail stores, easily accessible by train or Citibike.   I have many books that you are welcome to enjoy - just please leave them for me to finish reading!
description: Spend summer in NYC!  Clean and comfortable 550sq ft alcove studio in downtown Manhattan.  My apartment can accommodate up to three guests and is centrally location at the junction of Chelsea/Flatiron/Union Square. A getaway nest that you can retreat to after a day of activities and a night of adventure.  The apartment is located near bars, restaurants, theatres, and retail stores, easily accessible by train or Citibike.   I have many books that you are welcome to enjoy - just please leave them for me to finish reading!  THE APARTMENT :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: - 550sqft alcove studio - Wireless internet & Flat screen TV with Roku - Fully stocked kitchen for cooking - 3rd floor residence with elevator - Nighttime security - Roof access with views of Union Square and the Empire State Building.   THE BEDROOM :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: - Brand new, comfortable full-sized bed - Clean sheets and bath
neighborhood_overview: My neighborhood combines all the things I love about NYC - restaurants, theatres, parks, spectacular views - without any commotion.  I reside at the junction of Union Square, Chelsea, and Flatiron.  A ten minute walk will place you in the Meatpacking District, West Village, or East Village. Two stops on the 4 train take you to SoHo. Three stops on the F train goes to Times Square. Four stops on the 4 train take you to Chinatown. Five stops on the M train leads you to MoMA. Six stops on the NRQ train lands you in Central Park. Or you can just walk everywhere!
transit: Apartment can be accessed by F/M/L (10ft away), 1/2/3 (two blocks north), 4/5/6/N/R/Q (two blocks east), or A/C/E two avenues west.  There is also a Citibike station a couple of blocks away.
access: THE APARTMENT :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: - 550sqft alcove studio - Wireless internet & Flat screen TV with Roku - Fully stocked kitchen for cooking - 3rd floor residence with elevator - Nighttime security - Roof access with views of Union Square and the Empire State Building.   THE BEDROOM :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: - Brand new, comfortable full-sized bed - Clean sheets and bath towels  - A/C, Heating, and Humidifier
interaction: My super is very attentive and I will be accessible by phone, Airbnb messaging, and email at all times.
house_rules: Please share my home with respect to my belongings and courtesy to my neighbors.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am a hospitality professional.  When I am not running a restaurant, I am visiting one.  My greatest delights are food, travel, books, and fresh air.  

My home is more than where I hang my hat.  I am moderately compulsive about keeping things in order.   I value my living space and my city.  When friends come to visit, I only hope they find the joy and excitement I do each day!

reviews.comments: Natties apartment was perfect. Clean and cozy and great location. Nattie was a great host and made sure everything went smoothly. I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone!
Nattie was fantastic! She texted throughout our stay to make sure everything was OK. Her apartment is gorgeous and perfectly located. Could not have asked for a better place to stay!

This was my first airbnb experience, and Nattie has set a very high standard. She communicated often, anticipated most of my questions, promptly answered the few questions that arose during my stay, and made me and my family feel completely welcome in her charming apartment. We had a delightful time and Nattie was the perfect host.

Lovely well presented apartment in a good location. Nice places to brunch nearby. Apartment was quite warm and the aircon was noisy but other than that a pleasant stay. Nattie was helpful, a couple of queries over check in but they were cleared up promptly.

This apartment is in a good location, easy for Greenwich Village, Meat Packing District, restaurants, sightseeing and shopping.  The studio apartment itself is clean, tidy, modern, although we didn't use the kitchen it appears to have everything you could need for any food preparation.  We were disappointed with the lack of communication with our host, but not sure where the blame lay, with Airbnb or host.  We had no instructions as to how anything in the apartment worked, no designated cupboard space and so lived out of our suitcases, and were unable to use wifi, which is desperately useful if searching for restaurants etc.  There was no hairdryer and having travelled from the UK it was not something I had packed. This was our first time using airbnb and so we had no idea what to expect, on arriving in the apartment our initial reaction was - oh lovely - but there were a few niggles which because our visit was short were not worth worrying about.  Should we use airbnb in future I would be more questioning and more alert as to our requirements, small things enabling us to leave our destination thinking "that was a great holiday".

Nattie's flat was in a great location. Once we'd found out which flat in the building everything went smoothly from then on. The flat was spacious, clean and somehow quiet at night, even though the area was busy. All the popular restaurants and bars we wanted to visit were within 10 minutes walk and the subway (14th street) was right outside the door. Nattie was always available and checked we were ok regularly.

I stayed with my family (my wife and my teenage son) for 5 days in this apartment. We have never met our host, but the keys handover has been managed very efficiently. The location is perfect, very near Union Square. The apartment is nice and well furnished, exactly as represented and described. We’d strongly recommend this location for a staying in NY.

Nattie was a great host. She left us cookies and a six pack of Brooklyn beer which was very kind. She was flexible with our check-in and check-out time and responsive to questions we had during our stay. Her apartment was lovely. Very spacious. Close the everything. And fully stocked with whatever you need. As someone who had lived in NYC before I would highly recommend her home as a place to stay while visiting the city.

My friends and I stayed at Nattie's apartment for 4 days during our stay in NYC. She was very easy to get in touch with during and before our trip. Nattie was also helpful with providing amenities that we have requested.
 The apartment looks as good as it does in the photos and is in a great location! Close to the subway station (right across the street) and within walking distance to Union Square. Noises were also pretty minimal.
The door was hard to open but we finally got the hang of it halfway through our stay. 
I would definitely recommend Nattie's apartment to anyone travelling to NYC and would stay there again if I have the chance.

The apartment was in an excellent location, perfect for our stay in New York, Central to lots of bars and food places but also easy to walk to Chelsea, Greenwich, midtown and close to transport. Very nicely decorated, nice space to relax in. The shared rooftop was fairly basic with a few benches but cool views and any outside space in new york is a real plus point. Would recommend to others. (Host was responsive throughout).

Perfect location within easy walking distance to the Highline, Chelsea Market, Breads Bakery, Chisholm Gallery, and an interesting dessert at The Maritime Hotel. Nattie made herself available to answer all of our questions by text and made sure to accommodate our schedule. Her place was nice to come back to after a busy day. Plenty of space for two people, and fine for an extra person. Much bigger than most hotel rooms in NYC of comparable value.

Nattie is the perfect host!  Responsiveness and accommodating- felt like I knew her but we never got to meet as she was traveling but quickly answered all our questions .
Apartment is clean and comfortable and neighborhood has all you need !

name: QUARTOS INDIVIDUAL  COM AR CONDICIONADO
summary: Casa com 3 quartos individuais mobiliado e ar condicionado disponivel . Fica a 10 min do Cristo Redentor, Maracanã , Sambodromo . Tem onibus proximo.
description: Casa com 3 quartos individuais mobiliado e ar condicionado disponivel . Fica a 10 min do Cristo Redentor, Maracanã , Sambodromo . Tem onibus proximo.

name: 10B超讚2-3人公寓★3分鐘到高鐵西九龍站､地鐵柯士甸站★10分鐘到機場快線九龍站､地鐵佐敦站
summary: -24小時自助入住 -公寓有24小時保安 -電梯直達樓層 -位置極佳,旺中帶靜
space: -公寓內有私人廚房和廁所 -關上房門便是你的私人小天地了 -提供即棄式盥洗用品包括牙刷牙膏 -提供沐浴用品包括洗髮露護髮素沐浴露毛巾 -無限使用高速WIFI
description: -24小時自助入住 -公寓有24小時保安 -電梯直達樓層 -位置極佳,旺中帶靜 -公寓內有私人廚房和廁所 -關上房門便是你的私人小天地了 -提供即棄式盥洗用品包括牙刷牙膏 -提供沐浴用品包括洗髮露護髮素沐浴露毛巾 -無限使用高速WIFI 有什麼疑問或需要都可以隨時找我,我一定會幫上忙的^^ -便利店､超市､藥局(徒步1分鐘) -譚仔三哥米線､廟街､翠華餐廳､義順牛奶公司､澳洲牛奶公司(徒步5-8分鐘) 3分鐘徒步到高鐵香港西九龍站,該站連接中國各大主要城市 3分鐘徒步到柯士甸站,該站連接羅湖､福田口岸 10分鐘徒步到九龍站,該站連接機場快線､迪士尼､東涌等 10分鐘徒步到佐敦站,該站連接海洋公園､銅鑼灣､旺角等 10分鐘步行到中港城,該碼頭乘船去澳門､珠海等 12分鐘徒步到尖沙咀､海港城各大購物商場
neighborhood_overview: -便利店､超市､藥局(徒步1分鐘) -譚仔三哥米線､廟街､翠華餐廳､義順牛奶公司､澳洲牛奶公司(徒步5-8分鐘)
transit: 3分鐘徒步到高鐵香港西九龍站,該站連接中國各大主要城市 3分鐘徒步到柯士甸站,該站連接羅湖､福田口岸 10分鐘徒步到九龍站,該站連接機場快線､迪士尼､東涌等 10分鐘徒步到佐敦站,該站連接海洋公園､銅鑼灣､旺角等 10分鐘步行到中港城,該碼頭乘船去澳門､珠海等 12分鐘徒步到尖沙咀､海港城各大購物商場
interaction: 有什麼疑問或需要都可以隨時找我,我一定會幫上忙的^^
house_rules: - 請勿吸煙 - 進大門後請先於鞋櫃換上提供的拖鞋才進入房間(走廊都是乾淨的) - 每當外出時,請務必關掉所有電源 - 洗澡完後,請務必關掉熱水爐電源,以免消耗過度 - 晚上十點後請降低聲浪

reviews.comments: This small apartment is just a little gem at such a good price. As any other Hong Kong unit, don't expect something big. However, everything you might need is there, it's super clean and recently renovated, and well located in West Kowloon. Communication was fluid and directions to/from the airport and check-in instructions were clear and easy to follow. Thanks again for your hospitality!
房间很干净~和图片一样~性价比特别高~交通很方便~离中心景点也特别近~是旅行的不错选择~
离高铁站很近 走路就可到达 附近出行吃饭也挺方便的 Winkie人也很好 回复得很快 也会帮忙推荐好吃的餐厅~愉快的旅行~
很好的一个房东
太棒了,这是我在香港住过算大的房子了,这个价位也很划算｡房东很亲切,还给我们存放行李｡房间里很新很干净,厨房厕所设施也很好,位置也超棒,走路去尖沙咀都不远,很方便｡下次去香港还住这里,希望房东越做越好~

My stay at Winkie’s place was great! Very convenient location—just a short walk from a nice bakery and the Austin MTR station. The apartment was fairly large for HK, and was more spacious than I expected from the pictures. Would definitely recommend this apartment!
It’s a nice experience. The location is good since it is very convenient. The check in and check out procedure is also very convenient.
생각보다 글이 써진것처럼 침실이 하나 더있는게 아니라 원룸에 침대가 두개 있다고 생각하는게 맞습니다.  수건도 새로운게 필요하면 본인이 매번 미리미리 주인에게 알려줘야 합니다.
winkie的房间很棒,在香港可以住到这样大的房间已经很满足啦｡床也刚刚好,装修风格很赞｡入住前winkie会把交通信息和房间信息都发给大家,完全不用担心找不到地方｡楼下有一家点点心和711,超级方便｡对哦,还可以寄存行李,棒棒的
Nice host and very convenient location.

This room was great, it was very clean and easy to find. Winkie was very helpful with getting the room ready for our arrival, as well as direction on how to get there. It’s located in a decent area within walking distance to both the MRT and Airport Express train. I’d definitely stay there again the next time I’m in Hong Kong.
挺好的,楼下有便利店,小吃店
非常的好,环境也好,住宿也很方便,交通也很方便,下次去香港,还要住她家
交通非常方便 附近也有很多有名的美食呢! 住的非常的舒服 房东姐姐人很好 很热情❤️
房子地段非常好!临近庙街,附近有很多特别棒的餐厅,有各种香港明星都去那里吃过｡房主人非常好!解答非常及时!

从机场坐车40分钟直达,再根据图片清晰指引,步行5分钟即可到达民宿｡新装修,没有异味,房间比我想象中的宽敞,有几个窗户,够光亮,是我喜欢的｡民宿在旧居民楼,治安安全放心,旺中带静,楼下有茶餐厅,对面街有百佳超市,吃早餐,买东西十分方便｡步行10分钟可到庙街,15分钟可到九龙公园,广东道海港城,20分钟可到尖沙咀天星码头,20分钟可达旺角,全靠步行,省了很多交通费用｡房东很热情,也能尽力为我们解决问题,十分好沟通,房子的性价比高,值得推荐给大家｡下次去香港,会第一考虑住她家｡

name: Newly reno, convenient location, 2 brm for 6 ppl
summary: Clean & cozy. Convenient but quiet llocation, within walking distance from Taiwai MTR station, bus/taxi station. Direct airport bus. Easy to travel to any part of HK. Located at the edge of New Territories right next to Kowloon, the neighborhood is a perfect combination of convenience, space and fresh air. This is also a great pick if you are visiting the Chinese University, City University/Baptist University.
description: Clean & cozy. Convenient but quiet llocation, within walking distance from Taiwai MTR station, bus/taxi station. Direct airport bus. Easy to travel to any part of HK. Located at the edge of New Territories right next to Kowloon, the neighborhood is a perfect combination of convenience, space and fresh air. This is also a great pick if you are visiting the Chinese University, City University/Baptist University.

host.host_about: Like to meet new friends all over the world.

address.street: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The apartment is tidy and there are 2 rooms, one with one double bed and one with two single bed. There is also a sofa bed in the living room. The place is cozy and small (at least smaller than how it looks from the pic). In summary, it was a enjoyable night. Just don't expect too much.
Very modern home design.  10 mins easy way to MTR station and downtown.  Very nice customer service and response immediately.

The room is very clean and cozy. It’s about ten mins walk to the subway station and there are quite a lot of food options around. The lock is quite convenient as we had to check in later in the evening. In general I would totally recommend if you’re traveling to this area.

It's a convenient place. Simple and clean room.
Recommended for those seeking a calm night.
Nice
特别棒的房子,十分幸运来香港时住的是这样一套民宿,十分感谢房东,谢谢
房东很热情,住房条件也很好,非常感谢房东的招待
房子很适合短途旅行入住 干净整洁 房东回复及时
房屋干净,交通方便
环境还可以,房间有个园景房,能看到小花园;双人床两个人睡有点挤;门禁卡找起来有些挑战;离沙田城市广场比较近购物比较方便｡
很好,很方便,房东人很好,谢谢

name: Boutique room with attached private bathroom
summary: Private boutique chic style room. The place is in nice leafy neighbourhood only 8 mins walk from the train station and 5 mins walk to Crows Nest bustling village. It is located only 10 mins from Sydney CBD. Access by car, bus, train or even 45 mins walk.
description: Private boutique chic style room. The place is in nice leafy neighbourhood only 8 mins walk from the train station and 5 mins walk to Crows Nest bustling village. It is located only 10 mins from Sydney CBD. Access by car, bus, train or even 45 mins walk.
house_rules: - This place is suitable for single person

summary: When you walk into this apartment, a smile as big as the welcome picture will cross your face... kissMe Everything in the apartment is surprising...with the latest in modern furniture and lighting. You can find cool black ball lamps in the corridor.

Furthermore, we will be in constant contact with you, not only coordinating your arrival, but also during your stay, and finally when you are back home... We really want you to return and recommend us, to all your friends and family.
house_rules: **IMPORTANT: BEAR IN MIND THAT THE APARTMENT IS LOCATED IN A RESIDENTIAL FAMILY BUILDING, THEREFORE IT IS COMPULSORY TO RESPECT THE NEIGHBOURS AND THE QUIET HOURS FROM 21H TO 9H. 1. Please do not smoke in the apartment, this is a smoke free apartment.  You can do it in the balcony or outside of the apartment, enjoying the local street-life view. - 2. Please respect our neighbours, be mindful of noise levels in the stairwells as well as in the apartment, at all times.  Loud noise (from 21h to 9h) and parties are totally forbidden in the apartment.   Breaking this rule will lead to you being removed from the apartment at any time, day or night, without any refunds.  - 3. Use proper attire (shirt, trousers and shoes) at all times, while in the common areas of the building.  - 4. Use air conditioning and heating responsively, and remember also to turn off the lights when you are out of the apartment. host.host_about:
HIstory buffs, foodies, and party animals all flock to Barcelona - and being a bit of all that myself, it's always a treat to host them all.
Plus, I like to go out and explore the city, then share all the tips with you.

Here's a few

Favourite Foodie places
Can Ravell
La Taverna del Clínic
Xàtiva
Semon Nou
Monvínic

Top Gin and Tonic spots
Bobby's Gin
Milano
Dry Martini

And of course, travelling is a well known vice of mine - so I might just see you on one of my trips and you can host me too!

reviews.comments: Absolutely lovely flat, had a wonderful time here. Went as a couple but spacious flat and would easily accommodate four. Comfy beds, great showers, lovely little balcony we had breakfast on every morning. Our greeter Ali was friendly and helpful, giving us tips about current things going on in Barcelona. Cannot recommend this place enough.

Juame made us feel right at home! This was the perfect house to stay in Barcelona. Just minutes away from la rambla, the beach, and everything else! The house was very clean, great air conditioning, and everything was in place. I will definitely stay here again!

My girlfriend and I stayed in this flat for two weeks. We really loved it. The flat was immaculate and perfectly represented by the photos. The living area was spacious and cozy. The flat was on the first floor which made it an easy climb on the stairs, however a lift is also available for those who need it. Our hosts at BizFlats were very helpful and friendly. We had a small issue that they resolved in a timely fashion. If you'd like to cook the kitchen is amply equipped. The neighborhood is a nice residential area a short walk from the major tourist attractions. We hope to stay there again next time we visit.

Хорошая квартира, удобный район,
не работал слив в одном из сан узлов, чисто, в кухне есть все необходимое. Прекрасно работает центральный кондиционер.

This is hands down one of the best AirBnB's I have ever stayed in! It's clean, comfortable, equipped with all modern appliances, central AC, and very well-decorated. Jaume and his team are super-friendly and were always available to help with questions we had. Alí, who met me at the apt initially, was so sweet and helpful. I highly recommend this apt, and cannot say enough great things about it.

We enjoyed the Stay at Jaumes appartement.
The place looked like the pictures, was located on a quiet street, good beds. 
Overall very satisfied!

The best Airbnb so far. This place is located in quite residential area yet within walking distance to everywhere. It was a perfect location as this was exactly what we're looking for; staying away from too touristy areas but short walk to all the attractions whenever needed. 
Also huge supermarket and many local restaurants around every corner. 

Ali who greeted us gave us a mini session for local attractions and restaurant recommendation. We tried all the restaurants recommended by her and they were absolutely fantastic. 

The apartment itself looks like exactly as in the photos. Very clean and spacious. I my two of us (my husband and I) stayed there but definitely enough for 4 people. Kitchen is also very clean and well equipped with everything you need. 

Our 6 days in Barcelona could not be any more pleasant than this and felt like we actually live there. 

I would definitely come back to this place.

Hola ! fui atendida por Alí que llegó en 10 minutos al departamento a recibirnos,  fue muy amable y cordial, inclusive me pasó por mail info de lugares para visitar en Barcelona y sus alrededores. El departamento es muy lindo, super completo, impecable , limpio y muy cómodo. Está muy bien ubicado, cerca del Metro . El barrio tambien muy lindo. La verdad que es para recomendar ! SALUDOS

C'était ma première expérience AirBNB, et elle était parfaite : l'appartement est moderne, très agréable, propre, conforme à la description et aux photos postées sur le site. Nous y sommes restés 4 jours et n'avons rencontré aucun souci. 

Nous avons été accueillis par Ali, chaleureusement, avec quelques tips sur Barcelone et dans la zone autour du quartier, dont un excellent restaurant tapas à moins de 1O minutes à pied de l'appartement.

L'appartement est à 25 min à pied environ des Ramblas, à 2 ou 3 stations de métro. Au final, il est très bien situé pour aller vers les principales attractions de Barcelone, généralement à 3-4 stations de métro.

Bref, je conseillerai définitivement cet appartement pour qui va à Barcelone

Alí was very nice and uncomplicated and getting the keys to the apartment was very efficient. 
We found the place was extraordinarily well cleaned.
The apartment is very well located - lot's of local restaurants and bars nearby while close to the metro. Bus stop right in front of the door.
I definitely recommend the apartment and would stay there again.

Well what can I say... Jaume and Ali were amazing... always available and ready to help with anything we needed... swift check in... amazing located apartment.. perfect for 4 people even though was only two of us... highly recommend using Jaume and Ali. Will surely be using then again for next visit in one of their apartments

Our flight arrived very late, but Ali still very enthusiastic to greet us,and give the key to us, as well explaining the urban attractions and the main layout of the surrounding residential layout. Inside the house refrigerator, air conditioning, washing machine, dishwasher and other facilities are very complete, very suitable for a family or a few friends travel to live.
Clean and tidy. The host is also very great!

A great apartment equiped with all one needs while in holidays in great condition and also great taste. Located at one of my favorite areas in Barcelona close to transport, bars, restauranta, clubs, museums and close to the centre of Cataluña. I am truly invited to rented out again in my next visit and I highly recommended as the hosts have the exoerience and the willingness to help you have agreat time, all for a great value! Well done and thanks for make our experience a great one!
Great area, very nice place
Great place. I enjoyed my stay.
Great apartment and a very easy spot to get around Barcelona from. Would stay again

Great stay!!! Superclean and very nice apartment, probably nicest airbnb I've ever stayed at. Close to options for transit, supermarket and lots of cafes and restaurants away from the tourist buzz but uick to get to everywhere. we loved the balcony, and its super quiet at night in bedrooms for amazing sleep. we will be back!

We encourage all who are looking for the perfect location to start each day of adventure in Madrid to try a stay at this delightful apartment.  It is just steps away from many delightful attractions such as Plaza Mayor, Mercado de San Miguel and the Royal Palace and metro access.  Jaume and Vanessa were very concerned about our comfort and we appreciated their efforts including allowing us to checkin early.  The apartment was very modern, well equipt, and very clean.

KissMe Apartment was conveniently located , comfortable, clean and well equipped.   We totally enjoyed our stay there. Thanks for the Hospitality.
Warren and Leslie

The place is very nice and as the photos showed it. Very clean and the host was very friendly and had a very nice list of recommendations !! 
Nice for a few friends to stay together.
R

The KissMe Apartment was a great home for my family and I to stay while in Barcelona. It was close to excellent restaurants and the metro. We also greatly appreciated all of the host recommendations on places to eat! Ali was very welcoming when we arrived and we felt like we were in good hands when we arrived. They make you feel like it is your home while you are there.
Nice apartment, amazing WiFi (300 MBit Fiber Connection), fairly centrally located. Noise isolation is not great, but that is to be expected in Barcelona.
很漂亮的房子,尤其是四块红地毯,令人感到家的味道

This was my first visit to Barcelona with my wife and son. We loved this apartment. It is away from all the hustle and bustle of tourists, close to metro, supermarket and cafes. It’s also clean and quiet.
Jaume and his team were amazing. Even though we had family guide us in Barcelona, he sent out many emails to ensure we had everything we needed to know and suggestions on what to do. I would stay here again.

A good apartment, clean, well laid out with good facilities, the road was a little noisy which prevented having the windows open with the tv on and a music source would have been welcome.

Pleasant and welcoming, the locals and area was good with many local facilities (shops and cafe's).
 
Possibly a little over priced for what it is.

No major problems with our stay but wouldn't go back again.
Comfortable, relatively quiet apartment in a convenient area.

We really enjoyed Jaume's place. He was extremely responsive to my emails.  He provided a high chair and pack-n-play for my baby as well.  You also can get an Nespresso coffee machine for an extra 20 euros - definitely worth it! The location is a bit far from the main attractions, but the apartment is very nice, on the first floor (one flight or stairs or an elevator) and close to a supermarket and two blocks from an amazing park which was great for kids.  It was relatively close to Plaza espana and the Sanz train station. There was also a washing machine and dishwasher. We highly recommend this place.
Great place to base a stay in Barcelona. Jaume was very helpful, friendly and responsive. It’s a very cool apartment in a very cool part of a very cool town! You’ll dig it.

This flat is located in an ideal location: very safe, tons of cafes and restaurants just 1/2 block away. Gym just a few blocks away. The place was very, very clean. The AC worked very well. We never worried about theft to our unit (there's a deadbolt lock besides the regular lock). There was a little noise from the halls and above, but nothing out the normal from any flat one would find. Our only frustration was the limited linen (only one towel for the other two guests I was travling with). There was a combined W/D, but the instructions were incredibly difficult and the guide left in the booklet to our flat was not every close to helpful. I ended up having to take laundry out to a laundry service which was not open most of the day. The host was also poor at responding to texts about concerns and questions via the (Hidden by Airbnb) (which they insisted we use). Overall, a wonderful flat and experience though.
Благодарны хозяину за гостеприимство и хорошие условия проживания. Квартира соответствует описанию, находится в шаговой доступности от центра и туристических мест

Jaume and KissMe were great hosts, the apartment is very well located and easy access. The bedrooms are clean, the aircon worked perfectly and all kitchen amenities were there.
It is a bit pricey but I definitely recommend it

Guys! Wanna to share my cool experience with Smart Luxury KissMe 2BR balcony flat. It was so cozy flat with very good location and beautiful design. Jaume was so nice, friendly and take care about us. Wanna to say him  many thanks and highly recommend our of you to rent this apartment! Wish all travellers to have the same experience like me at Barcelona!

Pour notre première expérience Airbnb, résultat très positif.
L’appartement est très bien placé, accessible en transports en commun et très agréable à vivre. Le quartier est parfaitement équipé en commerces de proximité.
Jaume est un hôte très agréable, prévenant, réactif et soucieux du bien-être des personnes séjournant dans son appartement.
A recommander !

Excellent apartment!! Almost felt like staying in a hotel- sparkling clean, plenty of towels and linens, huge amount of space, perfect AC unit, very comfortable bed, nice shower with great water pressure. Communication for check in and out was excellent, lots of local tips and restaurant suggestions, host was super accommodating. Highly recommend!
Beautiful apartment, lots of space, lovely balcony.

Jaime is a super host!  Quick responses, very helpful correspondence.  Easy check in.  The apartment is beautiful, spotless and the beds are made up as well as a 5 star hotel! 
Highly recommended.
Limpio, con todas las comodidades y con una ubicación perfecta a pocas cuadras de todo! Muy recomendable
Great apartment

The check in was timely and we were booked for 4 nights.  The host's associate met us at the apartment and gave us a tour of the place.  She showed us to just pull the front door closed behind us when we leave the apartment, no need to insert the key.  On our second day at the apartment, we came back at 9:30pm to find out that a burglar had robbed us.  All the doors and windows were closed and no sign of forced entry.  I called Barcelona police and the host right away.  The host showed up conveniently after the police had already left and was not empathetic to our situation and directed us to speak with our home/traveler's insurance.  The host told us that we should have double locked the door when we left the apartment, which we knew nothing about.  As I did not feel safe continuing our stay at the apartment I found one room at a close by hotel to accommodate 3 adults for 3 nights.  We handed the keys to the host and left.  I requested a refund from the host for the 3 nights we did not stay at the apartment due to safety concerns, but the host has declined to refund me.  To say the least, it was a terrifying experience which ruined the rest of our stay in Barcelona.  I have contacted Airbnb for assistance, and I'm waiting for their reply.

The apartment was absolutely beautiful!  It is in a nice quiet neighborhood. Loved the high ceilings and the decor.  It was immaculate, the bed was comfortable, the water pressure was great and the bathrooms and kitchen looked recently updated. There is an elevator. Anna greeted us and gave us all the information we needed.  They also left a booklet with complete instructions for the appliances and info about the area.  I would highly recommend this apartment.

Bel appartement, bien situé, bien entretenu et proche de toutes les commodités.
L'accueil est parfait, merci Jaume et Virginie pour ce très bon séjour à Barceleone
Philippe

We had a lovely stay in Barcelona in this appartement. It is very well located, nearby everything. The appartement is very clean and it has everything that you need. Nearby is a metro station, so you can reach everywhere super fast. The neighbourhood is very nice and quiet, you can find e supermarket next door. All in all we had a absolutely great stay in Barcelona and we would come back anytime! We recommend this appartement warmly. Thank you Jaume and Anna, it was perfect!

We had a great stay at this apartment for our Christmas vacation - convenient location, easy check-in, well equipped and we found it to be as described.  The major complaint that we had was that we had difficulty getting good sleep - you can hear everything through the walls!  Bring a white noise machine if you are a light sleeper.  In addition, the bedroom windows face out into a strange interior hallway that is open to the entire building so every time a neighbor turns a light on or off the light shines directly into the bedrooms.  Unfortunately, one of the neighbors was up all night during our stay turning lights on and off.  Black out shades or curtains would really improve this situation.

Departamento muy confortable . Super cómodo . La atención es muy buena , nosotros llegamos temprano y pudimos dejar nuestras maletas en una oficina cercana al departamento . El departamento es tal cual las fotos y está muy cerca de todo caminando.

host.host_about:
You write Michele, you read /miˈkɛle/  :)

Born and raised in Rome (Italy) I moved to Montréal and fell in love with this city. Also fell in love with the most amazing Canadian girl ever, who eventually became my wife - but that's another story.

My greatest passion is cooking, especially if I have guests. When I'm not busy cooking I read, watch Ted talks and take pictures of squirrels running on my terrace (I still have to get used to them, you know).

reviews.comments: Modern, clean and stylish place with great hosts. Michele and Klara are like sunshine in the winter of Montreal. I totally enjoyed my stay at their place and wish to come again when visit Montreal next time.

Excellent. You can tell by the description that they will be friendly hosts and by the pics that they have a beautiful clean place. Warm and delightful, right by the metro and university, for me, was exactly what I needed. Would definitely recommend and return. Thanks!

Michele est très accueillant,  j'ai passé un très bon moment "comme si j'étais chez moi".
Extra!!!!!

name: Spacious 5 bedroom house - PERFECT LOCATION
summary: Set in the heart of the popular Sydney suburb Bondi Junction, this picturesque house is ideal accomodation for a tailored trip of your choice. A 5 minute walk to one of Australia's biggest shopping centres and a further 30 seconds to train station, you'll be in the marvellous Sydney CBD in 3 stops to take in all it's sights. A 10 minute bus/20 minute walk in the opposite direction and you're on the golden sand of the world famous Bondi Beach.  A big house in a great location!
space: TV and Netflix 4/5 bedrooms and living room, air conditioning in each space, lots of natural light and 4 bathrooms spread evenly throughout the house. A driveway and parking space adds to the convenience. The large house  provides privacy for your own space and an outdoor area to soak up the sun (if you're not at the beach).

I can be contacted by telephone at any reasonable hour as well as being very responsive via email or SMS. We will put a local guide to Bondi on the fridge for guest's co
neighborhood_overview: Bondi is truly a wonderful place with the obvious attraction being the golden sands of the beach. a 10 minute bus journey or 20 minute walk down Bondi road and you are right there, Icebergs swimming pool and bar is a great place to relax if you don't want to sit on the sand. North Bondi has the RSL boasting fantastic views and a good food, Neighbourhood bar and grill as well as Bondi Hardware and Ravesis are great places to relax with an alcoholic beverage.
transit: Bondi Junction train station is a short walk away with the city being 3 stops away to either Martin Place or Town Hall. A wide array of late running buses will also take you to Bondi Beach. Bondi Road (parallel to the house) also has a wide selection of coffee shops, cafes and bars for your entertainment. You can also walk the Bondi to Coogee coastal walk something you will not want to miss on a good summers day.
access: Everywhere, its yours!
interaction: I can be contacted by telephone at any reasonable hour as well as being very responsive via email or SMS. We will put a local guide to Bondi on the fridge for guest's convenience and perusal.

name: Apartamento Qian Centro 1
summary: A Casa Qian está situada a poucos metros dos principais pontos turísticos do Porto. Estamos em uma zona privilegiada de acordo com comentários independentes. Há uma paragem de auto carro há 350 metros que fazem viagens nacionais e internacionais. Nessa propriedade você tem a opção de conhecer o Porto caminhando ou de metro (190 m). Acomodação com WI FI gratuito. Apartamento de luxo e decoração moderna.
space: Com um espírito e elementos de decoração moderna nas origens históricas do Porto. O que torna seu espaço único é o ambiente aconchegante, onde pode se desfrutar com conforto a cama, sofá, cozinha, mesa de jantar, tv, casa de banho etc.

name: Excelente localização. Espaço aconchegante!
summary: Imóvel fica a quatro quadras da praia de Copacabana, localizado ao lado da estação de metrô, acesso fácil a restaurantes, bares e super mercados. Excelente localização. Possui: geladeira, micro-ondas, ar condicionado, acessórios de cozinha, roupa de cama e banho, TV e internet.
space: O espaço é pequeno, porém acomoda bem quatro pessoas, está bem equipado e é super bem localizado.
description: Imóvel fica a quatro quadras da praia de Copacabana, localizado ao lado da estação de metrô, acesso fácil a restaurantes, bares e super mercados. Excelente localização. Possui: geladeira, micro-ondas, ar condicionado, acessórios de cozinha, roupa de cama e banho, TV e internet. O espaço é pequeno, porém acomoda bem quatro pessoas, está bem equipado e é super bem localizado. O prédio não possui área de lazer. Tem elevadores. Disponibilizamos sempre nosso telefone e procuramos ajudar o máximo possível. Fazemos questão de fazer a entrega das chaves para poder orientar e familiarizar o hóspede com todas as informações do apartamento e das facilidades na vizinhança. O bairro de Copacabana é o ponto alto do rio de janeiro, traduz o espírito do carioca, linda praia, muito movimentado, restaurantes, bares, quiosques, muitas atrações. Experiência única. Em frente ao prédio há um ponto de ônibus que os leva à direção Sul (Ipanema, Leblon, Barra da Tijuca, etc..) ao lado está a estação de metrô C
neighborhood_overview: O bairro de Copacabana é o ponto alto do rio de janeiro, traduz o espírito do carioca, linda praia, muito movimentado, restaurantes, bares, quiosques, muitas atrações. Experiência única.
notes: A localiza do prédio dá acesso a muitas comodidades, como por exemplo todo tipo de refeição, desde um sanduíche, pastel, comida japonesa, até restaurantes a quilo ou a lá carte, além de supermercados e hortifruti.
transit: Em frente ao prédio há um ponto de ônibus que os leva à direção Sul (Ipanema, Leblon, Barra da Tijuca, etc..) ao lado está a estação de metrô Cardeal Arcoverde, com acesso à zona sul e ao centro da cidade, facilidade total de deslocamento.
access: O prédio não possui área de lazer. Tem elevadores.

host.host_location: Leblon, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: O espaço é exatamente como no anúncio, sem surpresas, bem arrumado e  organizado. Simples, mas com tudo necessário para um tempo no Rio.

El lugar está bárbaro. Súper céntrico y en excelentes condiciones. Tienes todo cerca, el bus, el subte, los negocios. Los dueños son muy amables y siempre están predispuestos en ayudarte. Estoy muy contenta y seguro que volveré. Lo recomiendo al 100%

Nossa estadia foi ótima, o imóvel tinha tudo o que necessitávamos, boa cama, chuveiro e utensílios de cozinha. Localização ótima, próxima a praia, mercados, farmácias, padarias e ao lado do metro. 
Tudo estava limpo e organizado na nossa chegada, os anfitriões se colocaram totalmente disponíveis e acessíveis, e foram super flexíveis em relação ao check in e out.  Só tenho elogios a Angela e seu marido que além de tudo foram super educados e gentis. Espero me hospedar mais vezes.
É um espaço muito confortável, super indico, os anfitriões são de uma gentileza e muitos receptivos, recomendo sim, um dos melhores que já fiquei.

name: Cool Elevation - Close to Town - Spacious Ohana
summary: Private Ohana w/ Full Bath and small kitchenette in Newer Home We prefer a minimum of 3 nights but can accept 2 nights. New couch with hide-a-bed.  Now sleeps 4.
space: The cool trade winds make for nice sleep at this 1700' elevations.  There is an expanded view of the ocean.  Only 6 miles from downtown Kona and within 10 minutes to the airport and beaches, this is the perfect place to come home to each evening.
description: Private Ohana w/ Full Bath and small kitchenette in Newer Home We prefer a minimum of 3 nights but can accept 2 nights. New couch with hide-a-bed.  Now sleeps 4. The cool trade winds make for nice sleep at this 1700' elevations.  There is an expanded view of the ocean.  Only 6 miles from downtown Kona and within 10 minutes to the airport and beaches, this is the perfect place to come home to each evening. There is is private entrance to the guest suite with many amenities. A quiet neighborhood at the top of a hill in a small cul-de-sac.  The neighbors are friendly.  You have a wide view of the ocean and turn around to a view of the jungle. There are now more opportunities for getting around the Big Island including public transit, Uber, Lyft, Turo and taxis.  Due to the many activities available and size of the island, you probably will want to rent a car. You can enjoy the beautiful sunsets after a busy day touring the island, snorkeling at the beautiful nearby beaches, hiking, ziplin
neighborhood_overview: A quiet neighborhood at the top of a hill in a small cul-de-sac.  The neighbors are friendly.  You have a wide view of the ocean and turn around to a view of the jungle.
notes: You can enjoy the beautiful sunsets after a busy day touring the island, snorkeling at the beautiful nearby beaches, hiking, ziplining or just hanging out.  We offer many items for your use including snorkeling equipment, boogie boards, beach towels and a cooler.  We also provide an iron, ironing board, hair dryer, shampoo, conditioner, soap and toothpaste.
transit: There are now more opportunities for getting around the Big Island including public transit, Uber, Lyft, Turo and taxis.  Due to the many activities available and size of the island, you probably will want to rent a car.
access: There is is private entrance to the guest suite with many amenities.
house_rules: - 9PM - 7AM - Quiet Hours

reviews.comments: Linda's place was just what we needed and we were very comfortable. Coordinating with Linda was simple and easy as well as she was responsive and clear. We recommend staying with Linda and would absolutely book with her again!

Loved our stay! Linda’s place is quiet, clean, private, spacious and calming. Good location, close to the airport (10 min) and just up the way from shopping, food , and the beach. The whole place made us feel at ease and was a great place to come back to after a busy day. Linda was so nice, easy to talk to and very welcoming. Fyi, we couldn’t figure out the hot water our first night, but works great if you turn it all the way to the left and let it warm up! Would definitely recommend and stay again!

A warm welcome from Linda, an interesting location close to the town and the airport, slightly height allowing cool air and a splendid view over the see, a very clean, confortable and well equiped studio with a wide terrace.
We deeply recommand this adress.

Linda was very responsive, and a welcoming host. She met us when we arrived and was able to lend me a sewing needle when I really needed it. The space is very comfortable, though it is higher up in altitude and so gets chilly at night. I recommend warm pajamas! Georgeous view from the window, watched the sunset and sunrise from there everyday!
Beatiful and chic appartment near the airport and easy to find. Late checkin worked perfectly.
comfortable and quiet. enjoyed my time here.

We had a wonderful stay at Linda’s house. It was a little more secluded from town with great ocean views. We appreciated the privacy offered by the lower unit. Linda was a very kind host and was quick to respond to any questions we had.

Linda’s place was awesome!  Very clean  and stylish. The view is a definite bonus and I loved having my morning coffee in the private outdoor space. Super friendly neighbors and a very safe neighborhood. Would stay here again! Loved it!

This place is great! You get a nice breeze at night since it's in the hills which helps since it's so humid all the time. The place in quiet, private, and cozy. It was very clean when we arrived and we had everything we needed. They even had boogie boards for us to use, though we didn't get a chance! It's close to everything in the downtown area and most of the best snorkeling spots on the whole island are only 20-30 mins away. Joe (the husband) was very friendly and assured us he would help with anything we needed. He also let us know about places to avoid that we're way over priced. I would 100% go back here again and I highly recommend anyone in the Kona area staying here.
Great place & great host.
Awesome place! Very convenient, not far from the airport and Kona city centre. Linda was easy to reach before our arrival. The appartement is ultra clean, beautiful and comfy!

Nous avons passé un excellent moment chez Linda !
L’appartement était très propre, très bien placé et avec une magnifique vue (surtout le couché de soleil !!) 
Encore merci
Everything was there as or was described (and I think it was Even better) ... so nothing more to say ...
Great, beautiful spot! Lovely outdoor patio and comfortable.

This is a nice place to stay.  It was conveniently located to town and beaches.  Linda was a great host and she had snorkel gear to use as well. Thank you for a wonderful stay.  I would recommend this place for a future stay.
Thank you,
Michelle and Carl

Linda’s place is just perfect for a stay around kona. The large studio is clean and all the necessary is available .

Linda was very welcoming and give us a lot of advice of what to do around !

This is why we choose Airbnb!! 
The host welcomed us and showed us the place. 
The place is much more then we expected and everything was perfect. 

Great stay and can recommend for anyone.

Linda's place was even better than expected! The room was clean, stylish, in very condition and spacious.
The patio in front of the room was a very nice addition with a beautiful sunset view.
Linda was really friendly and responded quickly to our messages.
The studio is located in a quiet, residential neighborhood in driving distance to lots of beaches and restaurants.
Would definitely recommend staying here during a stay in Kona.

Linda's was perfect for what we needed. It was a serene place to hang out post snorkeling in the afternoons and it wasn't too hot thanks to it's mountain side location. We would definitely stay again!

name: JK4-4人双床房+地铁3分钟+稻香､翠华餐厅､肥姐小食+SASA､卓悦+朗豪坊+女人街

description: 有獨立的衛生間! 交通便利,去哪裡都方便:距離旺角地鐵站E1出口僅15米,楼下步行5秒即是机场A21巴士站｡ 每天有專人打掃房間衛生,保障每位住客每天潔凈舒適的住宿環境｡ 超過數百家食店及商店､貨幣找換店｡ 位於購物中心及到達演唱會場便利｡如莎莎､卓悅､豐澤､百老匯､周生生､周大福､米蘭站(專售各大名牌手袋)､距離旺角最大的商場朗豪坊僅120米｡距離尖沙咀星光大道､海港城僅需7分鐘的地鐵車程,去紅磡體育館看演唱會也可地鐵直達｡ 我們的房間持有香港政府頒發的營業牌照｡香港寸土寸金房間小,勿有過高期望｡ 旅館民宿限於條件所限,勿有過高期望｡ 限於香港物價高昂,寸土寸金｡ 居住環境條件,硬件,服務有改善的空間｡ 全部房間每間都有窗､有獨立的衛生間､每天有專人打掃房間衛生,保障每位住客每天潔凈舒適的住宿環境是我們房間的賣點! 賓館所在大廈座落於旺角中心地带最繁華的彌敦道上､交通便利,距離旺角地鐵站E1出口僅100米,宾馆楼下步行5秒即是机场A21巴士站｡距離旺角最大的商場朗豪坊僅100米､方圓150米內就有遍布香港各區的公交巴士站､超過數百家小吃店､餐廳及商店｡ ★我們的房間照片全部為實地拍照,但是盡管這樣,房間照片只作參考｡ 每間房間內客人可以免费使用的配备如下: ★高清彩電､ ★空調(只能製冷､不可制暖) ★免費無線wi-fi網絡､ ★轉換插頭､ ★24小時熱水淋浴獨立衛生間､ ★毛巾､浴巾 ★洗漱用品(牙膏､牙刷)及洗浴用品(洗發水､沐浴露)､ ★拖鞋､衣架､ ★電熱水壺､茶杯 ★吹風筒､梳子､棉簽｡ PS:房間內沒有炊具配備,不支持房內烹飪｡毛巾､浴巾､枕頭和被子的數量根據房型配備,如需增加數量需要額外加收費用｡床單､被單､枕套為一客一換,如需每天更換需要額外加收費用｡ 【免費寄存行李服務】入住時間為下午2點,退房時間為次日中午12點(我們需要在您退房之後做保潔,將房間整潔的準備給下一位要入住的客人),入住當天提前到達或退房後我們均可提供免費寄存行李服務,退房後行李寄存時限為退房當天的下午18:00之前｡ 【关于出行】下訂單預訂經過我們確認訂單,付款之後我們都會統一將如何來到我家的具體路線及我们的详细地址､联系电话发送到您的郵箱｡入住的當天您直接到达出示身份證件報名字,交納200元港幣的入住押金即可辦理登記入住,退房返还｡ 我們有專人每天負責接待每位客人的入住和退房
neighborhood_overview: 旺角位于九龙半岛的北部,著名的弥敦道贯穿其中,这里是香港人气最旺盛的地区之一,潮流时尚､传统文化､市井风貌､小吃美食都汇集于此,全区繁华拥挤,不少商铺食肆通宵营业,故被称为是九龙的“不夜天”｡ 购物指南 旺角或许没有尖沙咀那样鳞次栉比的国际大牌专卖店,但却是不少年轻人心中的购物圣地｡这里购物场所各有特色,大型商场朗豪坊聚集了大量潮流时装､创意杂货店;妹子们最爱的化妆品店SASA､卓悦都有多家分店;西洋菜南街附近丰泽､苏宁､百脑汇等电子数码店一家挨着一家;田园书屋､序言书室等知名楼上书店也都安家旺角;日韩潮流和二次元文化爱好者不能错过的圣地信和中心;运动鞋一条街波鞋街不仅可以享受折扣价,还能买到各大品牌的海外限定款;还有可以边淘价廉物美的杂货,边感受老香港市井风情的传统购物街女人街､花园街等等｡ 美食推荐 旺角整区都布满了特色的美食店,有东南亚美食､日本菜､甜品店､茶餐厅等｡此外,旺角也以小吃店繁多出名,有很多潮流小吃店也是以旺角为根据地,其中包括日式烧饼､德国肉肠､台式饮品等｡推荐几家人气较高餐厅:稻香､翠华餐厅､肥姐小食店､池记､发记甜品､佳记小食､金华冰厅､沙嗲王､富记粥品､妹记生滚粥品｡ 【特别提示】 1. 逛旺角建议选择平底舒适的鞋子,避免高跟鞋｡ 2. 商铺上午通常开门较晚,可避免一大早前往购物｡ 3. 特色街上人很多,逛街时候还需注意安全｡
notes: 入住時間為下午2點,退房時間為次日中午12點(我們需要在您退房之後做保潔,將房間整潔的準備給下一位要入住的客人),入住當天提前到達或退房後我們均可提供免費寄存行李服務,退房後行李寄存時限為退房當天的下午18:00之前｡如果您寄存行李需要寄存超過退房當天18:00過後,需要額外加收費｡ 下訂單預訂經過我們確認訂單,付款之後我們都會統壹將如何來到我家的具體路線發送到您的郵箱或留言Airbnb｡到店當天直接到店出示身份證件報名字,交納200元(港幣)的入住押金即可辦理登記入住｡ 在預訂之前請註意:我們的房間一旦確認訂單,即不接受變更改期｡只能根據退訂政策執行退訂｡ ★我們的房間照片全部為實地拍照,但是盡管這樣,房間照片只作參考｡
transit: 港铁直达港铁观塘线､荃湾线可至旺角站下车即可｡东铁线至旺角东站下车即可
access: 每間房間內客人可以免费使用的配备如下: ★高清彩電､ ★空調(只能製冷､不可制暖) ★免費無線wi-fi網絡､ ★轉換插頭､ ★24小時熱水淋浴獨立衛生間､ ★毛巾､浴巾 ★洗漱用品(牙膏､牙刷)及洗浴用品(洗發水､沐浴露)､ ★拖鞋､衣架､ ★電熱水壺､茶杯 ★吹風筒､梳子､棉簽｡ PS:房間內沒有炊具配備,不支持房內烹飪｡毛巾､浴巾､枕頭和被子的數量根據房型配備,如需增加數量需要額外加收費用｡床單､被單､枕套為一客一換,如需每天更換需要額外加收費用｡ 【免費寄存行李服務】入住時間為下午2點,退房時間為次日中午12點(我們需要在您退房之後做保潔,將房間整潔的準備給下一位要入住的客人),入住當天提前到達或退房後我們均可提供免費寄存行李服務,退房後行李寄存時限為退房當天的下午18:00之前｡ 【关于出行】下訂單預訂經過我們確認訂單,付款之後我們都會統一將如何來到我家的具體路線及我们的详细地址､联系电话发送到您的郵箱｡入住的當天您直接到达出示身份證件報名字,交納200元港幣的入住押金即可辦理登記入住,退房返还｡
interaction: 我們有專人每天負責接待每位客人的入住和退房的辦理手續｡還有負責房間清潔的專人每天打掃房間衛生,確保客人每天都保持潔淨舒適的住宿環境｡
