name: Studio 12 square meters(penthouse)
summary: Studio well connected to subway, bus and Sants Station. 12 square meters overlooking Montjuïc, very sunny (it’s a penthouse). It has a community terrace for sunbathing. There are: kitchen, washing machine, Air Conditioning, Wifi and elevator.
space: - The studio is small but allows full independence since spaces are not shared with anyone (except communal terrace). - Only for one person. Not fit 2. - Single Bed 190x90 cm (spring mattress). - The communal terrace, usually not frequented by neighbours. - It is not a noisy place. South orientation. - What you will find in there? . In the kitchen you will find: microwave, Kettle, coffee/tea manual maker, dishes, glasses, cutlery, fridge (quieter than previous), cooking pots, bottle opener, corkscrew, can opener, dish soap, scourer, ... . In the bathroom you will find: towels, shower gel, shampoo, laundry detergent, washing machine and toilet paper. . In the bed you will find sheets and blanket in winter season. . The studio has air conditioning. . In case you need to feel more comfortable, you will find cleaners for dust, fat, glasses and floor. Also there are bleach to disinfect (I have never had a complaint about cleanliness) . There is no food and drinks.
description: Studio well connected to subway, bus and Sants Station. 12 square meters overlooking Montjuïc, very sunny (it’s a penthouse). It has a community terrace for sunbathing. There are: kitchen, washing machine, Air Conditioning, Wifi and elevator. - The studio is small but allows full independence since spaces are not shared with anyone (except communal terrace). - Only for one person. Not fit 2. - Single Bed 190x90 cm (spring mattress). - The communal terrace, usually not frequented by neighbours. - It is not a noisy place. South orientation. - What you will find in there? . In the kitchen you will find: microwave, Kettle, coffee/tea manual maker, dishes, glasses, cutlery, fridge (quieter than previous), cooking pots, bottle opener, corkscrew, can opener, dish soap, scourer, ... . In the bathroom you will find: towels, shower gel, shampoo, laundry detergent, washing machine and toilet paper. . In the bed you will find sheets and blanket in winter season. . The studio has air conditioning.
neighborhood_overview: Sant's neighbourhood is well connected, cheap and with many services. The fresh Market of Sants neighbourhood is to 5 minutes from the studio. In the same street of the studio, you can find grocery store, one supermarket, and 3 o 4 bars to eat. Two minutes walk, you find Sants Street, a four kilometers followed by trade, both sides of street, with more than three hundred shops and service establishments. The Saints Street, is undoubtedly the longest shopping street in Europe.
notes: - Wifi: optical fiber (download 30 Mbps; upload 30 Mbps) shared with the host. - Electricity: 7,42 kwh per day is included in the price and it is enough for a normal use. If you need more electricity, you should pay 0,27 euros per kwh in the prepaid electric meter. You can see, at any time, your credit for electricity in a display in order to avoid the electricity cut. The property is not liable for damage caused by power cuts. - Water and Wifi are included in the price. - There is not cleaning service while you live in the loft. Of course, when you arrive first time, you will find the loft cleaned.
transit: 2 minutes from the loft you can find the blue subway line (L5) and red line (L1), Sants Square stop. A 8-minute walk, Sants Station with multiple connections to subway, bus, train and high speed train (which is called AVE)
access: The guest have access to all can be seen in the pictures: loft of 12 square meters and the community terrace.
interaction: The owner lives in a flat next to the Studio, so you can interact with host when you need and if not, you will meet him when you check in and when you check out.
house_rules: Please do not cause inconvenience to other neighbors or organize parties on the terrace.  Smoking is not allowed inside the studio. You can smoke in the communal terrace (please do not throw cigarettes on the ground). The Studio is only for one person. If you have the idea to accommodate 2 or more persons during your stay, without the permission of the host, reservation will be cancelled for reasons of space, hygiene and noise. No pets allowed.

host.host_about:
I am a very open-minded Catalan boy born in Figueres (the town of Dalí) and living in Barcelona for more than 20 years. I speak English, Catalan and Castilian (Castilian also known as Spanish).
I hope to achieve guest feel comfortable and not feel cheated. So if you have questions, ask and I will answer with pleasure. I live in an apartment next to the studio that I rent, therefore, during your stay in Barcelona, ​​if you have any problems with the apartment or the city, you let me know and we'll try to solve it. 
Whether you come to my house or not, welcome to Barcelona, a city that fascinates me and I hope you like it.

reviews.comments: Дружелюбный и вежливый владелец Jordi рассказал про апартаменты и район рядом. Расположение очень удобное - рядом метро и вокзал. Добираться из аэропорта быстро. В центр можно добраться на метро. Рядом много разных кафе и магазинов. Квартира небольшая, но для одного человека вполне достаточно. Есть все необходимое - миникухня, стиральная машина, хороший интернет, полотенца. Также есть просторная терраса, с которой открывается отличный вид. Великолепное предложение по соотношению цена/качество.

Jordi è un proprietario di casa molto gentile, educato e disponibile ( mi ha anche prestato l'asciugacapelli per tutta la durata del mio soggiorno ahahaha). Il mini appartamento e' posto all'ultimo piano di un palazzo storico, si giunge tramite ascensore; è dotato di tutto ciò che occorre, essenziale e pulito. E' possibile accedere ad una terrazza condominiale panoramica e dominante con una vista mozzafiato su buona parte di Barcellona. Si vede anche il palazzo Reale! 
La zona è molto carina e curata, viva, popolare e abitata da gente locale, ricca di caffè, ristoranti, negozi di ogni tipo e servizi. Molto ben collegata con il centro tramite metro la cui fermata dista 2 minuti a piedi, e all'aeroporto tramite la vicina stazione dei treni (website hidden) mi sono trovato benissimo. 
Da raccomandare assolutamente. 
Grazie di tutto Jordi, spero a presto! Un saluto. :)

jorid was a very nice and warm host. the apartment and the area (sants) in barcelona was perfect for a single traveller. everything was well organized and the contact before the trip was very nice. the apartment and the terrace is perfect for a stay in barcelona. wifi was great and jordi took great care! thanks! highly recommended!

I had an amazing stay at Jordi place. The studio was better than I expected, clean, quiet, located in a nice well connected area and had everything I needed. Amazing views and a lovely breeze. Jordi is a lovely great Host. He provided me with a lot of information about the area and city and made me feel at home. I will come again :) Muchas Gracias Jordi

great host, great place, great location, the room is small and suits one person, its perfect for a single traveller, with great shower and washing machines, micro wave and fridge, and fan, superb balcony with amazing views.

Jordi was a lovely host--extremely willing to help out and available to answer questions--and the apartment was very livable, and fairly well-stocked as far as cleaning supplies and pots and pans go. The neighborhood is cheap and full of interesting little bars, shops, and restaurants. I loved it all...

Hi! I stayed in this studio for 12 days and everything was perfect. It's small, but comfortable and has a lovely terrace,  you can find everything you need there . Jordi was very nice and ready to help any time. Thanks again!

As a single traveler Jordis place was just right - nice and tidy place, and very close to the main train station and metro.  The place is in a bustling working class neighborhood and has a great marketplace nearby.  jordi stays in the apt right across from this apt which made it convenient in case you need to ask him for anything and he was very responsive and willing to help but also made it feel not totally private. The kitchenette was fairly bare but I got by cooking just fine.   The bed could be more comfortable but that can be fixed easily with a mattress pad.  Apt also ran warm when I was there in August but the fan certainly helped!
it was a nice small apartment , clean an comfortable for 1 person only

Jordi's apartment is perfect for a single traveler looking to see Barcelona. It is a quiet and well-connected area, and has a great market and a fresh fruit + veggie place very close by. The apartment is small, but the perfect size for one person to live in comfortably. It is clean, has an elevator, has a terrace just outside your door, and having Jordi live just across from you makes communication easy in case you have any questions. Thank you Jordi for the great stay!

Such a convenient location and although the apartment is small, it is cleverly fitted out!  I was very pleased there was a lift also (as my luggage was heavy).  Met Jordi on arrival and even enjoyed some good conversations with him during my time there.  He was always very willing to help if I needed information.

I miss my Perfect Petite Penthouse! 

A wonderful bright, and clean apartment. Yes, it's a small space, and only big enough for one (perfect for one!) but there's actually more than enough room because Jordi has designed it so well that not an inch has gone to waste. There is also loads of storage space. You will have everything you need there. Plenty of hot water, super fast wifi (that even works out on the terrace), fridge, microwave, cooking hobs, and washing machine. There are pull-out tables too which I found really useful. It's on the top floor (with a lift - yay!) and it's really quiet. One of my favourite features was the really large terrace. It was a sun trap during the day and with a lovely breeze in the evening. And there are great views too - over the rooftops and into the city and the mountain range. Jordi lives across the hall so it was handy to have him nearby. Jordi is a wonderful host. I had cold drinks waiting for me when I arrived & Jordi gave me a great introduction to the city and things to do & helped get me orientated. He is more than happy to share his knowledge and he is really helpful and friendly and a fab neighbour too! Great location with the bus and metro right at the end of the street. Lots of little local shops right on the same street with a fabulous food hall (hot food, meat, fish, fruit, veg) a few minutes walk away & next to a big supermarket. Plus there are lots of other shops nearby too! I walked into the city and it took me about 50 minutes to La Ramblas so if you fancy a stroll, it's walkable to the city. It's a great location in a residential neighbourhood and I felt very safe on the streets day and night. Less is certainly more when it comes to this penthouse and I am so glad I made this choice & recommend you do too! Jordi - thanks again for everything & I hope to be back again soon :)

Jordi emailed me detailed directions on how to get to the apartment so I arrived without any problems.  Jordi's apartment is across the hall which was good . He showed me everything in the apartment which had everything that I needed. The apartment is near a metro stop and a long distance train station.  There are lots of shops and restaurants nearby.  Jordi was very helpful in answering my questions about where I could get things in the neighbourhood and about the culture.  He had made a map showing where some shops, restaurants and parks were.  I enjoyed our chats very much.  If I am ever in Barcelona again I would stay at Jordi's.

Great host and great communication with the host.  He was so considerate and very flexible with my arrival.
Very nice and clean for one person
Great location, close to all attraction
I loved my visit

Jordi is really nice and helpful

the place is perfect for someone going to Barcelona on their own as its pretty small, its exactly like it looks in the photos.

the rooftop terrace is really cool, and the thing I loved most about the place was the location, really really great location!

Stay with Jordi was pleasant. Room is small but I had everything I need. As a traveler with scheduled activities, Jordi was kind to have coffees, instant, brew able type for me in addition to water.

The location is convenient, less than 10 min I was in station.

I like Jordi's place.

I just spent a week in Jordi's small but cute and very comfortable apartment. It is everything you need, if you can do with a small space. It is light, clean and very lovely. It has everything you need, whether you want to dine in or eat out.
The terrace and the view is spectacular. The area is amazing with so many shops. food market, bars, cafés. Very lively. The metro station close by is convenient for travelling longer distances, but you can also walk to many attractions if you want to. Plazza Espana is 15 mins away by foot.
Jordi is everything you can wish for as a host: Friendly, helpful, precise and wants to help you in any way he can. I felt very comfortable in Jordi's apartment and would recommend it for anyone travelling by themselves.

Jordi was very communicative and accommodating. The space is small, but is very well designed and has everything you need. There are lots of shops and restaurants nearby as well as a metro station which makes it easy to get around the city. Very glad I stayed here. Thanks Jordi. :)

Jordi is a super welcoming host and has very good knowledge of Barcelona which he is willing share.

The apartment design is superior, every possible detail is thought of and provided. The surface area is as it appears in the photos, but this  is totally surpassed by the comfort the layout provides. A roof balcony also offers great views of Barcelona.

Highly recommended!

Jordi is a great host, willing to help out and available to answer questions. He provided me with a lot of information about the area (and even a map).
Jordi's apartment is perfect for a single traveler. The apartment is small but it is fine for one person to live in comfortably since you have everything you need inside (shower, washing machine, micro wave, fridge, fan, TV...). You even have access to a nice terrace. The flat is also closed to lots of shops and restaurants as well as a metro station which is very convenient. Thanks Jordi!

Jordi’s place is amazing, very clean, bright and very well equipped. There is everything you need (as you can see on the pictures). I was surprised how much room there is to storage. The apartment itself is comfortable and the location, too. There are two fresh markets in 5-10 minutes walking distance and at least 4 supermarkets, lots of bars, cafés, restaurants and shops near with affordable prices. The nearest metro station takes 2-3 minutes on foot (very easy to get to anywhere), the train station with direct access to the airport just a few minutes more.
Jordi was a dream host, extremely nice and helpful without being pushy. He had placed a big bottle of water into the fridge to be cold by the time I arrived, he gave me maps, gave me advices and he was flexible with my check out time. Unbelievable, how much attention he had put on every little details to make it comfortable for the guest. He is intelligent with a good sense of humour, a kind of person very easy to communicate with.
Highly recommended!
I highly recommend jordis place. It is perfect for solo travellers. Great location, room has everything you need, a large terrace with great views and jordi is extremely nice and helpful.

This place was perfect- great location, great host and the roof terrace  was the cherry on the cake.
The subway was on the corner. It was a 10 minute walk to the airport train.
Lots of restaurants in walking distance. This is the perfect place for a single traveler.
Jodi supplied me with information and maps on Barcelano. I would definitely stay at Jordis place again.

Jordi was an exceptional host.  Could not have been nicer or more helpful.  The room is as advertised.  Recommend pacing off 12 sq meters.  Even though small space, has lots of storage and space is utilized very efficiently.  Terrace is very nice as well.

Le studio est parfaitement décrit dans le description, il est très fonctionnelle pour sa taille. Il est situé près du métro et à côté de nombreux petits commerces. La terrasse est vraiment top! La clim fais du bien.
Jordi est très gentil et connais bien barcelone. La communication c'est bien passé. C'est sympa de discuter avec lui.

The apartment is exactly what it says it is... it's small, but perfectly functional the metro station is a two minute walk, Great location and super clean.. jordi was a great host very helpful and very nice! I had an amazing time at his apartment

Jordi a été un excellent hôte, du début à la fin. J'ai reçu une réponse très rapide à ma demande de réservation et dans les quelques échanges qui ont suivis. Il était très disponible si j'avais des questions et m'avait même proposé son aide pour préparer mon séjour à Barcelone. Malgré que je sois arrivée un peu plus tard que prévue, il m'attendait et m'a très bien accueilli. Il m'a fait visiter les lieux qui étaient parfaitement bien décrits sur sa page Airbnb. Il m'a bien expliqué le fonctionnement de tout l'équipement (laveuse, air climatisé, électricité, Internet, etc.) en plus de me laisser quelques fiches avec les détails. Il y avait également à ma disposition une carte de la ville qu'il m'a bien présentée et des dépliants sur de nombreux attraits à visiter. Jordi était également disponible tout le long de mon séjour et était plus que sympathique ! Je recommande son appartement sans hésiter.

Jordi was the perfect host! The apartment was exactly as described and photographed, and it was perfect for my needs. Jordi was very attentive to ensuring that I was comfortable, and was very responsive to the small number of questions I had during my four-week stay. He was entirely 100-percent professional about managing the rental, while always being very sweet and friendly too! The apartment was surprisingly quiet overall, given its location in the heart of a vibrant neighborhood ... being in this little top-floor perch gave me a nice sense of being able to get away from the energy of Barcelona when I wanted to, then being able to step out my front door and enjoy all the great things that the city has to offer. The neighborhood suited me well - very convenient to public transportation, making local excursions very quick and easy, while also NOT being a tourist-oriented neighborhood, which I enjoyed. Navigating daily life in the neighborhood was surprisingly fun and easy, given my quite limited Spanish, because folks at so many of the local shops and restaurants were so welcoming and friendly. Staying at Jordi's apartment was a great experience overall, and I look forward to seeing Jordi again the next time I am in Barcelona.

I stayed at Jordi's studio for a week, which was a lovely experience. Just as described on the webpage, the studio is extremely clean, fully-equipped with everything (washing machine, refridgerator, air conditioner, TV, kitchen with kitchenware, etc) that I was feeling at home. It is not a big room but more than enough for a person, and there are plenty of storage space and I liked the way Jordi arranges the furnitures and everything. There is a big terrance outside where you can enjoy the sunshine and the beautiful city view. On New Year Eve, I enjoyed the fireworks of the catalunya art museum right from my window, very cool!
The studio is located in a very convenient area, and near to both the sants metro station (5 min walk) and train station (10 min walk). Direct metro links to catalunya square, la Rumbla street and Sagrada Familia. Many shops and restaurants around.
Jordi is a very nice guy and willing to help . The information he left in the studio is very helpful. With the stay in his studio, I love Barcelona more and wish to come back!

J'ai passé 3 mois dans cet appartement très fonctionnel et très bien aménagé. Proximité avec l'ensemble des moyens de transports, dans un quartier très calme et accueillant. Hôte toujours disponible à la moindre demande, prêt à rendre le moindre service. Je recommande vivement ce studio.

I highly recommend Jordi's flat to solo travelers. I stayed there for 7 weeks. The flat is clean and well-organized(lots of spaces for putting stuffs). The location was perfect to me. It is close to center, sants train station but not that touristic. Local cafes and bars in Sants are cheap and nice. Neighbors are very nice too. 
Jordi is a perfect host. He's very precise and considerate, and knows very well about Barcelona. He helped me a lot and made my stay more comfortable. Thank you Jordi :-)

This is the perfect space for a single traveller. Everything is self contained and Jordi has thought of absolutely everything! It's also really convenient for travel. Barcelona Sants, the main station is only a short walk away to get to other parts of the country and even internationally with ease. Also the metro is very close and it's a nice area with plenty of shops and restaurants. Jordi is also a really nice host and he speaks English really well which was very helpful sometimes. I would highly recommend this space to anyone!

I really enjoyed my time in Jordi's studio-apartment. Allthough it's a small place, the smart furnishings made it perfect and it has everything you need. The location is very good with fresh markets, restaurants, bars and supermarkets all within a short walking distance. The metro station down the street can take you to the city center in 10-15 minutes.  Jordi is friendly and very helpful, I would absolutely recomend his studio.

name: Quarto individual na Glória
summary: Quarto individual, com decoração simples, mas aconchegante. O apartamento é todo equipado e fofinho no melhor estilo diy
description: Quarto individual, com decoração simples, mas aconchegante. O apartamento é todo equipado e fofinho no melhor estilo diy A Glória, bairro tradicional servido com bons bares e restaurantes. Banhado pela Baía da Guanabara, é na Glória que estão alguns dos principais pontos turísticos da cidade, como o Parque do Flamengo (parte), a Marina da Glória, o Museu de Arte Moderna do Rio de Janeiro, o Monumento aos Mortos da Segunda Guerra Mundial e a Imperial Irmandade de N. Sra. da Glória do Outeiro, uma das igrejas mais antigas da cidade, considerada uma joia da arquitetura colonial brasileira. A Glória faz divisa com os bairros do Flamengo, Lapa, Catete e Santa Teresa O apartamento fica em uma região central do Rio, muito próximo da Lapa e sua noite intensa e no começo da Zona Sul. Temos pontos de ônibus na porta e metro a duas quadras.

name: COZY APARTMENT IN OUTREMONT - MILE END
summary: Charming apartment in a classic Montreal architecture style, with its hardwood floors, big windows, high ceiling and balcony. The apartment has two large rooms, really confortable queen bed and some storage spaces for your travel amenities. The kitchen is fully equipped and you will have at your disposition all the bathroom essentials. It is sure to make you feel perfectly at home.
space: This spot is great for exploring the city. It is located relatively close to everything! It is reliable, comfortable and most essentials are provided for your stay.  Coffee will be freshly grinded before your arrival (I also have tea) !  Outremont is one of my favourite place in Montreal. You will love the peaceful vibe of this cozy neighbourhood. It is surrounded by beautiful trees, 19th century architecture and very little traffic. The location is perfect for people who want the tranquility of a quiet street but still be a walk away from an afternoon coffee or a nice lunch / diner.  It is located one street away from the famous Bernard street, where you will find a bunch of restaurants, terraces, bars, theatre, parks, etc. On the other side, you are 10 minutes away (walk) from the St-Viateur bagels, Olympico coffee shop and all the trendy mile-end restaurants, bars and boutiques. Shops nearby (not the exhaustive list):  To go grocery shopping: PA SUPERMARKET but there is 5 SAISONS 30

space: This is a unique small home in a secluded neighborhood on the north shore, the best part is that is only 5 min to food trucks, beaches,foodland (supermarket).

host.host_about:
Aloha! We are Nano & Flor, we love to travel, surf, yoga and any outside activity! 
We believe that Hawai’i is the most beautiful place on earth, we hope everyone can enjoy the beauty of this place as we do every day ❤️

reviews.comments: Great host, cute house, loved the animals on the property :)
Warm landlords. Peace and love. Back to nature.
Amazing location very close to a hill sight of the beautiful sunset in sharks cove. Pet horses and neighbors are extremely friendly. Everything you wish to get from the culture in north shore Oahu
clean. friendly host and great tips for local sports and events.
This place was great to stay at. The place was clean and peaceful.

name: Hilton Hawaiian Village Grand Islander 2 bedroom
summary: Located within the Hilton Hawaiian Village Waikiki Beach Resort and offers guests access to all of the resort's amenities, the Grand Islander by Hilton Grand Vacations is located on 22 acres of beach front of Waikiki Beach. Six pools and Waikiki's longest water slide are featured. All suites are located in the 37-story tower. Guests also have access to the Starlight Luau and Friday night fireworks show, Mandara Spa, outdoor mini pool, sundeck, hot tub, and the fitness center.
space: 2 Bedroom - Resort View (2BD) Size: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sqft Accommodates: 6 This two-bedroom, two-bathroom resort view suite with balcony features a master bedroom with king-size bed, 50-inch flat-panel HD TV and spa-like bathroom with a sleek shower, a deep soaking bathtub, private water closet with bidet seat and elegant vanity area. The second bedroom is furnished with a king-size bed or two double beds, 50-inch flat-panel HD TV and bathroom. The suite includes a generous living room with dining area, 55-inch flat-panel HD TV, DVD player, and queen-size sleeper sofa, as well as a fully equipped kitchen with stove, oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, and microwave and washer/dryer.

name: Scandinave 2bedrooms  Saint Francois Xavier-402
summary: Boutique Apartment Saint-Francois-Xavier by Groupe Dacoh is a high-end and luxurious boutique apartments situated in Montreal charming Old Port  Defined as a highly successful and bold initiative comprising of 9 high-end lofts and penthouses,SFX has been completely Renovated and redesigned to redefine the industry standards It is perfect for couples,solo,group and business travelers and is strategically located within walking distance from the best nightclubs,restaurant and touristic attractions
space: This suite measures 1,700 square feet.  Our signature “Bois-Franc” flooring and authentic Old Montreal brick wall harmonizes perfectly with the neighbourhood’s charm and sophistication.  Private bedroom with a premium queen-sized bed, a fully equipped and renovated bathroom (shower, toilet and sink)  Second private bedroom with a premium queen-sized bed. Sofa Bed included which consist on an air matress or a floor matress There is another separate bathroom (toilet and sink only).  This loft can comfortably accommodate up to 6 people.

Noteworthy locations and attractions in close and walking proximity (5 minutes or less) to our hotel:  Montreal’s oldest street: the famous and cobblestone-paved Saint-Paul Street (Rue Saint-Paul); Art galleries, shops and eateries; Bonsecours Market (Marché Bonsecours); Notre-Dame Basilica (La Basilique Notre-Dame); Rue de la Commune (famous street bordering the Sainte-Lawrence river); Montreal Science Center (museum); and Chinatown
notes: We provide all our guests with a private butler service in order to accommodate any special requests and to ensure an unforgettable experience with Groupe Dacoh. A description of the available services will be sent to you by email upon confirmation of reservation. This fee is payable at check in *** ***Please note that all LOCAL reservation requests l will be subject to a verification protocol prior to appro

access: This loft is equipped with state-of-the-art amenities, appliances and services. 55’’ Smart LED TVs (access to cable TV and Netflix account) Free & Unlimited High-Speed Wi-Fi  Fully equipped kitchen with islets capable of accommodating 6 people seated.  Other high-end appliances included: oven, microwave, toaster, fridge/freezer, washer/dryer etc.  Fresh and clean bedding, towels, kitchen accessories, housekeeping services and all other amenities typically expected from a high-end are also provided. Nespresso® Coffee Machine (capsules included) are provided free of charge. We have a private parking in the back available for 25$ per day, unlimited access and very safe protected by surveillance cameras.
interaction: Do you have any questions, comments or require assistance during your stay?  Please contact us anytime during your stay by phone call, email or airbnb messages

host.host_about:
Hello to the Airbnb Community , 

My name is Kevin, I am the owner at GroupeDacoh. 
GroupeDacoh is one of the top furnished property managers in Montreal. Our mission is to offer our clients the best experience possible by offering personalized services tailored to your needs. 

Aside from giving you all of the tools you need to find and visualize your perfect Montreal pad, GroupeDacoh puts your finger right on the city’s pulse – latest events, festivals, best restaurants and goings- on about town – everything you need to make the most of your Montreal stay is at your fingertips.

I have been in the short term rentals and customer experience enhancing industry for the passed 4 years. I pride myself on the skills that I have developed. I have a lot of experience in the butler/conciergerie field so whatever you need FROM A-Z we are here! From the time you book until after you depart, you ask, we do.

reviews.comments: Great location and space in Old Montreal. Host was responsive and check-in was a breeze. Will definitely stay here again next time I am in Montreal.
Fantastic location, great property, great service
Beautiful place and perfect location! Would definitely stay again
Amazing place, amazing location.  Will definitely stay here again.  Kevin was a great host.

Pros: amazing location, super comfortable beds, very clean, thoughtful nespresso machine and any kitchen supplies you'd need, great space to hang out in, easy check in, friendly staff. perfect location in Old Montreal with a ton of great places to eat and hang out near by. 

Cons: we booked room 402 but we were checked into 304, ultimately it was fine but we had specifically planned some events/gatherings based on the room that was pictured (i.e. big table for a nice dinner, lots of couches and chairs for movie night), so we had to adjust a bit. 

There was also a door in one of the bedrooms that led right to a hallway where people were often loud when checking out in the early morning, or kids playing in the hall. The windows downstairs were also drafty, which isn't ideal for a Montreal winter. 

All manageable, but just little things that we had to work around.

name: Stylish, modern, clean house centrally located
summary: This is a beautiful and homely single level house centrally located in Redfern and a two minute walk to Surry Hills. You'll be walking distance to some of Sydney's best restaurants, cafes, bars, boutiques and parks.  You'll love the ambiance for my home, beautiful courtyard area, access to beaches, and proximity to the city.
space: Your room is medium in size with a queen sized room, it's quiet and stays cool over the warmer months.  The house is tucked away on a quiet and safe street. It is very close to public transpart, only 15 minute walk to two train stations (Redfern & Central), and a 20 min bus ride to Coogee beach.

reviews.comments:
A lovely place, very well placed, and the house is really pretty. I didn’t had the luck to meet Kirsten in person as she was overseas but she was available super quickly by text.
I had an awesome stay :)

name: Stylish 2 Bed 2 Bath moments from Pitt Street Mall
summary: Oaks on Castlereagh provides guests with deluxe, self-contained accommodation and premier facilities, making it ideal for holidaymakers and corporate travellers alike looking for a luxurious base from which to explore the cosmopolitan metropolis of Sydney.
space: This stylishly appointed 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment is the perfect base from which to enjoy your stay in Sydney. •Sleep soundly in hotel quality linen •Cook (or don’t) in a fully equipped kitchenette •Dine inside or outside on your own private balcony •Freshen up your wardrobe during your stay with in-room laundry facilities
description: Oaks on Castlereagh provides guests with deluxe, self-contained accommodation and premier facilities, making it ideal for holidaymakers and corporate travellers alike looking for a luxurious base from which to explore the cosmopolitan metropolis of Sydney. This stylishly appointed 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment is the perfect base from which to enjoy your stay in Sydney. •Sleep soundly in hotel quality linen •Cook (or don’t) in a fully equipped kitchenette •Dine inside or outside on your own private balcony •Freshen up your wardrobe during your stay with in-room laundry facilities •Stay connected with free Wi-Fi •Take advantage of the buildings recreation facilities from 6am to midnight daily – including indoor pool, spa, BBQ facilities and gym •Make the most of this great location – the building reception staff can provide tips on the best Sydney has to offer in dining, shopping & culture. Check-in any time from 2pm with the reception staff. Throughout your stay they can assist 24 hou
neighborhood_overview: Our property is within easy walking distance from Central Station and Museum Station and just minutes from iconic Sydney attractions including Chinatown, Pitt Street Mall, Paddy’s Markets, Sydney Aquarium, Hyde Park and the splendid Star Casino.
notes: The apartment is in a residential tower, so please be respectful of the neighbours. There is a no smoking and no party policy which is enforced by hotel staff. Evidence of smoking within apartments or the complex common areas may result in additional cleaning charges. This listing provides a daily mini housekeeping clean, and if longer than 8 nights – a full clean of the apartment is included, including a linen change. If you need any extra amenities, please visit reception and they can top you up. There is car parking onsite, but spaces are limited. Please book parking in advance and be advised that fees apply and can be paid directly with reception staff.
transit: Located within walking distance from Sydney's Central Station, Chinatown and Pitt Street Mall, Oaks on Castlereagh is a short 30 minute car, taxi or train ride away from the airport.
access: •Stay connected with free Wi-Fi •Take advantage of the buildings recreation facilities from 6am to midnight daily – including indoor pool, spa, BBQ facilities and gym •Make the most of this great location – the building reception staff can provide tips on the best Sydney has to offer in dining, shopping & culture.
interaction: Check-in any time from 2pm with the reception staff. Throughout your stay they can assist 24 hours a day with any in-room queries, as well as provide some great local recommendations.
house_rules: -Self check-in with front desk / doorperson -Guests must present valid Government issued ID on arrival -At least 1 guest must be over the age of 18 years -All Hotel Fees must be paid on consumption to the Hotel directly, e.g. Car Parking

host.host_about: Oaks on Castlereagh offers modern serviced apartments in the Sydney CBD. This highly sought-after location is paired with deluxe self-contained apartments, a fantastic range of amenities, free Wi-Fi and first-class service for your Sydney CBD getaway.

name: Wanchai cozy 3BR+2Bath for 5 (Heart of HK)
summary: Located in the heart of Wanchai, the fully furnished apartment has 3 bedrooms (1 double double, 1 single bed and 1 bunk bed), 2 bathrooms with showers and is equipped with a kitchen and a washing machine. The apartment is about a 5 minute walk from the Wan Chai MTR station, and is also close to trams and buses. There are countless restaurants and shops in the neighbourhood.
space: Our apartment is modern, clean and simple. We have paintings hung on the walls that will be changed from time to time. In the apartment we provide clean beddings and towels to every guest (not including toothbrushes and slippers). There is cable TV in the living room and Wi-Fi access for our guests. The access to the lift in the building is easy and direct. Big luggage and baby stroller are fine. The size of the whole apartment is around 750 Sqf. This apartment has just been renovated in Aug 2017. We do NOT recommend groups of over 5 people stay in this apartment. An extra fee of HKD500 per head will apply for any extra guest. Please contact us before booking if you have more than 5 people in your group. General check in/out rule: check out before 12noon and check in after 1pm.

The apartment is about a 5 minute walk from the Wan Chai MTR station, and is also close to trams and buses. There are countless restaurants and shops in the neighbourhood. The access to the lift in the building is easy and direct. Big luggage and baby stroller are fine. The size of the whole apartment is around 750 Sqf. neighborhood_overview: Very convenient for everything. And most people staying in this district are very friendly. Where to go and what to do in HK? A: There are lots of things to do in Hong Kong. I suggest the following websites where the most updated information is summarized:  (Website hidden by Airbnb)   (Website hidden by Airbnb)   (Website hidden by Airbnb)  For foods in HK, local people use this website and think they are reliable:  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  All restaurants in Wanchai District and most restaurants in Causeway Bay District are within walking distance.
notes: Pets or smoking are not allowed in this apartment.  FAQ: What if my flight departs at night but I have to check out by 12noon? For over 90% of flights departing from HK International Airport, you can check in your luggage at the Airport Express counter at IFC (Hong Kong MTR station). You can check in your luggage anytime on the day of your departure, then you can spend the rest of the day in town without carrying your luggage around. You need to purchase a single journey ticket (HK$115 per head) to get in the check-in counter. Then later you use the same ticket to take the express train to the airport (must be within the same day). For discount Airport Express tickets, you can book it here:  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  How to get to the check-in counter at IFC? Please grab a cab from the apartment building and it normally won't cost more than HK$40. You can also take the MTR from Wanchai Station to Central Station (more walking). For those travel with babies, we welcome you and your ba
transit: The apartment is about a 5 minute walk from the Wan Chai MTR station, and is also close to trams and buses. There are countless restaurants and shops in the neighbourhood. 2 stations by MTR to Central  walkable distance from Causeway Bay (within 5mins) and HK Convention Centre (within 10mins)
access: 2 stations by MTR to Central  walkable distance from Causeway Bay (within 5 mins) and HK Convention Centre (within 10 mins) Transportation from Hong Kong International Airport: The fastest and most convenient way to get to our apartment from the HK airport is to take the Airport Express Train ($115 per person) to Hong Kong Station + taxi from Hong Kong station to the apartment ($30-40) or free shuttle bus from Hong Kong Station (opposite the train exit) to Novotel (opposite the apartment) (this is only free if you have taken Airport Express) For discount Airport Express tickets, please book here:  (Website hidden by Airbnb)
interaction: We value every comment/suggestion from our guests and always stay in touch with our guests.
house_rules: Please take care of the apartment as you would for your own home. No smoking and no pets allowed. No partying and loud noises. Please respect the privacy of our neighbours. If our guests are found violating these rules, we will have to stop hosting them immediately, send them away from our neighborhood and report to Airbnb. Please help to be friendly to the environment, switch off the air-con and other electrical appliances when leaving the apartment or not using them. 请如爱护您的家一样爱护这个公寓｡ 本公寓禁止吸烟,不允许携带宠物｡ 本公寓不允许派对和高分贝声响｡并请尊重邻居的隐私｡ 如果我们的客人被发现违反这些规定,我们将不得不立即停止他们的入住,并向Airbnb报告｡ 请帮助保护环境,在离开公寓或不使用时关闭空调和其他电器｡

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The host was very helpful and the apartment is very comfortable. Enjoyed my stay and is planning to come back for my next trip to HK.

(This review is for Carina who co-manages this apartment with Lamia.)
On my recent trip to Hong Kong, I stayed at Carina's place.  The place is small (as all Hong Kong apartments are), but efficiently uses it's space and adequately accommodated the four of us.  There were three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a kitchen, tv, and sofa couch.  The place had a few A/C units to keep us cool.  We really enjoyed the location, as it was convenient to get to the MTR and walking distance to food, shops, and Times Square.  

Carina was very helpful and friendly, even providing us with a USP charger and helping us hail a taxi on our departure.  She was quick with responding and good with answering questions.  I would highly recommend this place, as it is a very relaxing and clean apartment - great after a long day in the city.

The perfect base to explore Hong Kong. Transport on your doorstep to everywhere. The apartment was very new and clean.  All as per the photos. Communication with Lamia and Corina was very good, they were very helpful.

I booked Lamia's place for 10 nights while my family were visiting me in Hong Kong. It was their first time in Hong Kong so I wanted them to have a memorable stay in comfort. Lamia's place is very impressive and spacious and looks just like the photos. It was a very comfortable stay for four adults and would be for five, too (if two share the double bed). 

It is located on Lockhart Road around 10 minutes walk to the bar area so you we always had a quiet night's sleep. Security is also very tight in the building. 

We never actually met Lamia but were greeted her friend and her domestic helper who were both friendly and very helpful. Carina had my mobile number and was easily reachable, checking up on us regularly.  Little complimentary extras like fruit, bread, toiletries and alcohol were in the flat which were very well received. I would recommend this listing to a friend without hesitation.

My friends and I stayed at the apartment for 5 days during our visit to HK. We absolutely love the place! Carina was so nice and helpful. Unfortunately, we didn't get to meet in person but she helped us with all our questions. The place was nice, clean and cozy just like the pictures. Carina was even nice enough to offer us her eom personal items for us to use. The location is wonderful because the train station is only a block or two (5-7 minutes walk) and there's 7elevens, k circle and other stores nearby. There's a really famous chinese restaurant around the corner from our place. There's 24/7 security so you know it's safe plus the guard will ask you where you're going before letting you up so double safety. We are really pleased with the apartment and Carina's hospitality. If you guys want to LKF or the IFC area it's super close.  Overall, we are pleased with Carina's services and the apartment. We are looking forward to future visits!

My family and I stayed at the apartment for 6 days during their visit to HK and the apartment is super cool! The apartment is very cozy and clean, and the location is only 5-min walk to Wai Chai station and 10-min walk to Causeway Bay station, which is very convenient for us to shop and go to some famous tourism sites such as the Ocean Part, the peak, and the Disney Land. Although it is in the downtown center, it is very quite. The apartment is fully equipped. All the stuffs you need (like the shampoo, towels, the washing machine, etc.) are there. I would highly recommend this apartment for a whole family who want to have a vacation in HK.

The apartment is lovely and impeccably clean and from other travel experiences in Hong Kong, this place is as spacious as it gets for the budget friendly. Further, the amenities, including a kitchen and washing machine,  makes living here really convenient, especially for those looking for a longer stay. 

Location wise, it is located directly opposite Novotel, which makes it quite an easy place to find when taking a taxi back. Oh, and did I mention it is just a short taxi/MTR ride from Lan Kwai Fong? Add that to the fact there is no shortage of food options and convenience stores within a 10 minute walking radius, I would really consider this apartment again when I do head back to Hong Kong!

Lamia's unit was perfect for us. It has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, kitchen and building has a lift. It has a bigger space than expected, considering HK has mostly small units. Really well maintained, very clean and accessible to Wan Chai MTR. 
It was easy to communicate to Lamia and she accommodated our request for a frying pan. We cooked breakfast at the unit which was very convenient and there are several shops nearby. 
Highly commend this place. Great for families, groups of friends who want to enjoy HK. Really a great place to come back after a whole day of walking. Thanks a lot Lamia for letting us stay.

Very peaceful and quiet place in Wan Chai.(fyi just opposite Novotel (Website hidden by Airbnb) quite easy to inform taxi drivers of address)..3 rooms fits nicely for the 5 of us..all the amenities mentioned was given.from cooking place to free wifi and washing machine..5mins walk to Wan Chai MTR. Bustop to Ocean Park is just 10mins walk!10mins walk to Islamic Centre for some good halal food..will recommend friends to this apartment.

The apartment was homely with nice decor, we all felt really comfortable staying there, apartment was a good size for Hong Kong standard. Convenient location and we felt safe in the area. We would stay there again if visiting HK in the future. Highly recommended.

location is good. it's easy to get mtr, tram, wan chai star ferry. 
the house is quiet and cozy. tv is smart tv, so i can watch what i want 
i recommend this house for family 3-4 person.
The reservation was canceled 61 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Everything was perfect - location, standard and the security of the apartment. We (4 women, 1 man) stayed there in Sept for 3 days. There is MTR station closeby, the whole area of HK Island is very nice and you can easly walk to Victoria Peak (about 25 min walk). The taxi from to apartment to Airport costs around 330 HKD. I recomend this place to everyone who  stays in HK.

I stayed with my family at Lamia's place for 8nights. The apartment is clean and cozy. It is in a very convenient location, MTR station is just 5mins away and there are many food options in the vicinity. 

The tiles at doorstep of the toilet came off. After informing Carina in the morning, Natie came down in the afternoon to fix it. Really pleased with the prompt action. 

Overall it has been a pleasant stay.

Lamia was always checking in with us. Great communication. The listing itself was spacious and very comfortable for 4 people  (three bedrooms and two bathrooms). It's one of the most spacious homes I have seen in Hong Kong! The listing was on a street full of home hardware shops but just a block or couple blocks away were some restaurants and it was a 6 minute walk to the MTR.

Both Lamia and Carina were prompt in replying to my queries. They were also concerned about our itinerary as we were arriving in the middle of the Occupy Central movement. Their helper Natie was there to guide us through the secure locks for the main door. The toilets were clean, the beds were comfortable, the bedsheets were really modern. Amenities were sufficient for our 3N stay. Thoughtful touches like an iron and a portable vacuum cleaner were wonderful. It was also rather easy to find the apartment along Lockhart Road as directed by the hosts.

Lamia's apartment was perfect for our group of 5 adults. It was a breeze locating it. Proximity to the MTR was an absolute bonus as we travelled a fair bit between the island and Kowloon during the 3 nights we spent there. There wasn't any need to cook as we were spoilt for choices with the number of eateries. At the end of each day, it was a pleasant relief to come back to a warm cosy place. Lamia responded quickly and efficiently to our queries and concerns. Thanks Lamia!
Terrific flat in a great area.  Very accommodating hosts, perfectly convenient.  Will definitely stay again!

Unfortunately we cannot honestly share the same opinion as the previous review.  We stayed for 7 nights and had problems with the hot water in the main shower room and kitchen for 4 nights.  The only supply of hot water is in the tiny bathroom in the single room.  We ended up queuing up for shower between the 5 of us.  It was difficult as weather was cold.  Host and helper could only get help (weekend) until on the day we depart. We decline having it fixed as we would appreciate no disturbance whilst we packed to leave.   Cleanliness is not as what we expected.  Maybe it was because someone checkout before we check in.  We have to request for bed sheet and duvet cover to be changed in the single room as it felt very dusty.
Lamia was a great host, giving my friends and I red wine on New Year's Eve. Friendly and efficient, very clean and cozy place :)

Well I booked this room for my friends. Lamia was prompt in replying to my reservation.  My friends enjoyed 3 nights in January 2015, Great location it's easy to access the MTR and there are lots of local food nearby. Room good with comfy bed. Thank you Lamia for helping my friends. I would recommend to everyone who comes to Hong kong.

这是我第一次用这个软件订房,真的很棒!房子非常干净,而且四人住正好呢(不用沙发,三个房间已足够哦)｡地理位置十分便捷,也许是之前都是在铜锣湾附近行动,所以这次住宿更觉得方便｡走很短路程就到湾仔地铁站,也可以走着去逛铜锣湾,好吃的基本也都在附近｡房东Lamia很耐心,很多问题都及时电话与信息联系｡最后搭飞机可以把行李在IFC提前托运,但是小伙伴们注意,不是每一家航空都可以喔!(至少春秋是肯定不行的,那如果无法托运,寄存行李就50港币左右一件,所以慎重选择哈)anyway,这是一家交通便利､干净整洁的公寓｡赞!

It was a perfect place for our trip. Enough space for 4ppl and beds were comfy. Very close to Wanchai station and also walkable to Wanchai ferry terminal which was good to reach TST. We did not have a chance to meet Lamia but a lady named Natie was there to say hello and goodbye. Meanwhile, the only small downside is, it would be better if the hot water tank was bigger. The temperature of hot water was not high enuf for the last showered person. Thank you!

Lamia, que nous n'avons jamais vue, a été charmante malgré nos multiples réclamations. Elle nous a bcp aidé via plusieurs emails, à nous adapter à son très petit appartement qui nous a un peu déçu au premier abord. Bien situé, dans un quartier animé, mais assez populaire,l'imeuble est ancien, vétuste,sale,odeur de cuisine et l'asseusceur souvent en panne. L'entrée est gardée jour et nuit par un gardien et la porte de l'appart. est double, sécurisée et blindée. Bruit de trafic côté rue et de voisinage. Fort bruit de foreuse et autres à cause de travaux ds l'immeuble pour lequel Lamia nous a dédomagé. Sa femme de ménage,nous a acceuillie et nous a bcp aidé, pour nous fournir ce qui manquait, faire du nettoyage suplémentaire et pour monter et descendre nos lourdes valises.Le jour de notre départ,l'assenceur était en panne. Le salon est bien éclairé malgré le manque de fenêtre.Une chambre et sdb  correcte, les 2 autres chambres et la 2 eme sdb minuscules.L'appartement est basic et conviendrait mieux à des jeunes gens qu'à deux dammes de 60 ans qui s'attendait à être mieux logées pour le prix qu'elles ont payé.
很漂亮,很干净! Nate的服务很好!出行很方便,是非常棒的选择!
Great host. Nice place. She went the extra mile to accommodate us. A++

L was an excellent host. We really enjoyed staying with them. natie provided us toiletries and towels. The beds were clean, the pickup and departure were smooth, the location was awesome, and we just had an awesome time in general. Next time we go to HK we will be staying here again.

I'll definitely rent this appartment again next time I'm in Hong Kong.


Great appartment, as described, clean, very well located, close to public transportation and airport express. Lania was a great host, was in touch before I arrived and after I left. She arranged everything to make it as easy as possible for us. Renting her apartment was the best decision I made during my trip to Asia.

Lamia was a very nice host and we had a very good time in Hongkong. Perfect location, very close to the Metro station. This flat suited our group (3 people) perfectly, clean bed linen, everything was pretty good. I'll definitely make it as my first choice if I go to Hongkong next time. Thanks, Lamia.
The place was what it was advertised. It was clean and in the middle of everything. A lot of food places in the area. The host is very accommodating.

Lamia's place was perfect for our 5 night stay. She was very responsive and took care of us. The place was near by a lot shops and stores and just a short 4 minute walk to the closest MTR stop. Also the place was very clean and organized and we had no trouble at all staying here.

On our arrival at the apartment we were met by Natie who was very helpful & helped us settle in at our apartment. It was clean & tidy with everything we needed. It was close to mtr which we used nearly everyday. We had a pleasant stay in Hong Kong. Thank you Lamia & Natie for allowing us to stay in your apartment.

We had a good stay at Lamia's apartment. Here are the pros and cons:

Pros:
1. Very prompt communication with both Lamia and Natie. We did not have any problems checking-in or checking out.
2. One of the very few places that I could find with 2 bathrooms. Mostly in Hong Kong, I could only find apartments with 1 bathroom even for a 3 BR unit.
3. The place was clean upon check-in.
4. The location is very convenient. There is 7-11 and a grocery store very close to the apartment. We could even get food delivered at the place until 11 pm.
5. The place was spacious for 5 of us (4 adults and 1 kid)

Cons:
1. The metro station is very close for young and active people. However, since we had a kid and my parents who are a bit old, we would have loved it to be a shorter walk than 5 minutes.
2. The building is located next to all the hardware/construction stores. The more happening area of Wan-Chai is closer to the metro station (so about 6-7 minutes walk).
3. The apartment is neat but nothing fancy. I guess still reasonable for the price.
I came with a group of four. Lamia's apartment is spacious, clean, and conveniently located. Lamia was an excellent host and was accommodating to our needs. She made herself available.

Great convenient location in middle of Hong Kong city center. The apartment was clean, well furnished and equipped with everything compromising much traveling from USA.  The host was extremely responsive and graciously allowed us to check in early.  Overall it was a pleasant stay especially if you are traveling with a family.

Lamia's appartment was just perfect for us during our short stay in Hong Kong. It is a beautiful, modern and clean appartment and is on a busy street with restaurants and shops and lots of buses and taxis. Very close to public transport, MTR, also which made it v easy to get around.

we stayed for  3 nights here. Lamia gave us the proper information to get to her place. It is very near the city express bus stand to and from the airport. The location is perfect. The 
apartment is on the 2nd floor. Rooms are  small - 50 sq ft to 120 sq ft. Two persons  could not  sleep  comfortably  on the 4 feet bed,  the double decker  is not comfy for one of  my 6' son. So he had to sleep at the sofa and left the next day.  Mahjong sound from next neighbor.  Sound also from up stairs. Kitchen is simple. washing machine is not working well; very  noisy when spinning. Can hang the clothes only  inside the apartment.
Lania was a good host. She kept in touch with us before our arrival and during the time of our stay in the apartment.
It's a great place to stay. The location is super convenient. The home is basic but warm and cosy. The host is fantastic too. Highly recommended.

Very nice, tidy apt at great location! 10mins walk to Wanchai Ferry & 15mins walk to Times Square, where we spent most time shopping. Lamia and Natie were very friendly and easy-going. Hope to meet them again.

We were delighted with Lamia's apartment. It is in a fantastic location for sightseeing being only 5 minutes from a metro station. The apartment was clean and comfortable. Lamia was very welcoming and accommodating of all our needs. We accidentally left an item in the apartment and Lamia very kindly and patiently organised its return. Highly recommended.

Fantastic apartment in the heart of hong kong. We were able to get around wity ease being so close to the MTR. The apartment was spacious and modern and got to catch up on some much needed sleep after evenings out. Would highly recommend and look forward to coming back again!

The house is perfect in everything, good location, clean and comfortable, and reasonable price! I like the paintings and decoration style of the house. We had 3 happy nights in Lamia's house. Lamia and Natie are very nice, considerate people. they gave details of transportation. Probably will recommend lamia's house to my friend who will travel HK.

Lamia was great.  Always concerend if all was OK and very helpful.  Location was absolutely perfect for us.  Eventhough the apartment faces on the street, it was quiet at night for a good sleep.  Pictures of apartment as you get it.  Lamia has a useful map to get to some critical places like dim sum for breakfast, a speactacular roof top bar, and of course an art material supplier.  Utilised all the suggestions.  Close to the MTR, taxis, ferry across the bay.  Hopefully will be able to stay here the next time I am in HK.

Lamia and her maid Natie were amazing. Description was better than expected, especially seeing it was Hong Kong. I would definitely recommend. I would definitely return. Lamia allowed us to check in early and drop our bags off which made a huge difference. Thanks Lamia and Natie!!!

Very nice place, clean, good facilities. Great location, which is perfect for business in Wanchai area and shopping demand in Causeway bay.

highly recommend.

Great apartment and location!! Much bigger than I thought it would be given the size of usual HK apartments. Everything was clean and spotless upon our arrival, and we settled in right away.

Delicious food and convenient transport MTR/Bus right on our doorstep!!

Check-in and check-out was a breeze with Natie helping us.

Will definitely stay here again on my next visit to HK.

Thanks for the enjoyable stay Lamia!!

LOVED this apartment! It was the perfect spot in Wan Chai - perfectly walking distance to the Wan Chai MTR! Lamia was a great host and checked in via email to make sure we were enjoying the apartment. Natie welcomed us and helped us settle in. I would HIGHLY recommend this apartment to anyone looking for a comfortable apartment in HK. It was also so quiet, especially for being so centrally located in the city. It was neat and clean, and everything was perfect.

The apartment was clean and

The location is a short walk from the exciting nightlife in Wan Chai and the MRT. The apartment has 3 bedrooms (each with air-con) and 1 of them has bunk beds. There is a washer and TV in the unit, but we did not use these. Recommended!

The place is considered spacious by HK standards. Host's prompt communication is very reassuring.  Her helper is also very helpful. Good environment to stay in - 3 modes of transport (bus, MTR and tram), lots of eateries nearby, and local shops. Water pressure and heater works well.

When taking bus A11 from airport, when referring to the screen at the front of the bus,  no. 11 bus stop is Luard Road. Look out for Steward Road to alight.
Nice! Close to MTR, around the area you can find some good food easily and shopping easily :)

We had a great stay! Lamia was very responsive before we checked in and gave us detailed instructions on how to find the place. It is just a few blocks from the MTR as well as close to the E11 and A11 airport shuttle stops, so very conveniently located.

The apartment is pretty spacious for Hong Kong, with a large living room, 3 bedrooms, and 2 full bathrooms. It was very clean and tidy, with a security guard downstairs.

Overall, this is a great place for a group to stay in Hong Kong.

非常好的住宿体验!我们一共五个人,房间布局非常完美｡湾仔站出门步行三五分钟就能到,交通很方便｡附近好吃的也多,和房东沟通也很顺畅｡
最重要的,性价比也太高了吧!!
推荐推荐推荐!
Great location. Check in was smooth and Lamia was easily contactable all the time to ensure that everything was sorted. Highly recommended

It was a happy family trip :)
great location! Close to MTR!
highly recommended
Top notch apartment with everything at your doorstep. You won't be disappointed.
The apartment is comfortable and clean. And location is great.

Great apartment in an action packed part of town. Denise was super helpful in meeting us for a late check in and was easily contactable throughout our stay. Its the second year in a row that we have stayed in this apartment and is our first choice if we are coming through Hong Kong. Highly recommend!
Nice and clean

We really appreciated the late check-out Denise offered us as our plane was not leaving until late in the evening. The flat is very comfortable and secure. The location is excellent and we would definitely stay again when visiting Hong Kong.

its a wonderful stay at carinas flat shes very accomodating even if the place where i could buy stuffs she tells me . she keeps reminding us our schedule . the place is very conveniently located to all major tourist spots in hongkong. very clean place and number  one. its lot cheaper .

Great location & easily accessible by local transport. Carina and Natie were super helpful with the directions.The rooms are clean and well maintained. 
Thank you Carina for your hospitality.

Carina is an incredible host. She was extremely accommodating, kind, understanding, and helpful. She is an incredibly kind and caring person as well, and helped me through a really difficult roommate situation. I would recommend this airbnb so many times over just because of Carina, but that's only the start. The apartment is extremely spacious and comfortable for the location and price. It is extremely close to the MTR (only two blocks, quite literally a 5 minute walk), is close to multiple michelin starred restaurants (a few of which I visited during my stay for a really cheap price), is next to so many delicious and famous bakeries, and is in between causeway bay and central. 

If you're unsure of where to live during your stay in hong kong, I would highly recommend this apartment in wan chai. Carina is amazing and the location and amenities of the apartment are perfect for both long and short stays.
房子很好,就在湾仔和铜锣湾地铁站的中间,离坐天星小轮的码头也很近,旁边的街就有叮叮车和观光巴士,交通非常方便｡房子里面的布置也很温馨,各种用具也很齐全,房东很友善,非常棒的一次旅行!!❤️
一次很好的入住体验,市中心的地段,出行方便,屋内干净整洁,屋主还准备了水果和糖果,很完美!
Great location and comfortable home.

住宿很好,房间特别安静｡入住前,还特意给我们准备好了水果跟洗漱用品｡
距离地铁站也特别近,楼下也有许多购物场所｡特别好｡
nice house
Good location

Great stay at Carina's place with easy check in and check out, and quick communication. Space was clean and the washer/dryer combination was a big plus. Nice neighborhood in Wan Chai with plenty of things to do and eat within walking distance. A few minutes away on foot to the Wan Chai station as well, which is a great way to get over to Kowloon. Thank you!

Carina's place is beautiful, modern, clean, and super comfortable.  This is so important in a city like Hong Kong, as we have to walk a lot as tourists.  My siblings and family had a wonderful stay at this home away from home crib.  Communication is fast and often proactive from the host.  Would love to stay again in future visit.  Thanks for being such wonderful host.
Near to the MTR within walking distance. There are good food around the area. The place is perfect for a short stay.
Nice apartment for my friends and me! carina is a very helpful host and the location was perfectly :)
훌륭한 위치, 청결한 숙소, 호스트의 신속한 대응 등 전반적으로 흡족했던 것 같습니다. 다시 방문할 용의가 있습니다.

Carina is reliable and trustworthy. She provided prompt responses to our messages and checking in and out was very smooth. 

This is the first time we stayed at Wanchai. It's further from the maddening crowd compared to Tsim Sha Tsui, less touristy but yet within walking distance to many amazing Michelin star / guide eateries. It was a nice change staying in a more "local" neighborhood. 

The apartment itself is clean and cozy with a homely feel. We had everything we needed.

We didn't have the pleasure of meeting Carina. However we met her associate, Natie, who was quite helpful. There is quite a bit of noise at night during the weekend, and street noise during the day, as would be expected in such a location (very good location for access to MTR, and fine parts of HK island).
The beds are comfortable.
The apartment was clean, however the fridge, the bathroom cabinet, and soap trays should have been cleaned before our arrival. 
Thank you for the fruit bowl. It was a nice touch.

Carina’s place is by far my favorite place to stay in Hong Kong. My flight was delayed and arrived at a crazy hour (4 am), but there was still someone there to help us check-in to her place. When we arrived everything was spotless and there was fruit and some much needed water waiting for us! I would gladly stay here again! Thank you Carina!!!!

We spent 4 nights and 3 days to Carina' s place.The unit is so clean and complete from blanket to slippers,  extra towels  and utensils for cooking and including soap for laundry.Natie the caretaker is very friendly she came on first day with welcome fruits and chocolates in the table.Carina is very easy to communicate.She reply right away when i tried to message her. The place were near to Central government office where we celebrated our wedding. Many restaurants nearby and  Novotel Hotel was located infront her apartment where we ate after our wedding. Over all i give her 5 stars rating because we were very happy during our stay in her place in hong kong .We will surely recommend her place to my friends and relatives if they visit hong kong.
非常赞的一次住宿,房东人很好,飞机晚点到香港已经凌晨了,但还耐心等我们,房间里设施齐全,我推荐
Second time staying at Carina's place. Once again, was a great and pleasant stay!! My go to accommodation when in HK now and have recommended to a few friends as well.

Carina’s apartment is just nice to accommodate 5-6 travellers. It doesn’t feel pack that what we would imagine of HK’s typical apartment space. Location is convenient. Close to public transport (eg MTR, tram and buses), various choices for food, convenient store, shopping area.If you don’t mind walking, walking to Central’s direction or to Causeway Bay that direction is within 30 mins. If you are traveling to/from the airport, there is a hotel shuttle bus that you could take from HK station and get off at Novotel Century. Carina’s apartment is less than 5 mins walk from the hotel’s stop.

Great location as a launch pad, just a few minutes walk to train/tram/bus/ferry and on good days we just walked around a lot to reach Causeway Bay and the busier part of Wan Chai.

Carina's place is nice to come home to after a busy day sightseeing and shopping. Lots of bottled water and fruit and sweets upon arriving. Good bed, linens, water pressure. Good space for 4 of us. TV was problematic sometimes, switching on and off without warning (could be a defective remote controller?). Clean. Fast wifi. Responsive to questions before and during our stay.

Secure door with digital keypad. Easy check in assisted by Natie, even if we arrived late around 8-9 pm and our request for late check out at 4 pm was accommodated so we didn't have to bother with luggage and got a few hours extra to shop before heading out to the airport. Recommended for a group of 4-5.

Nice apartment in a great location. It was perfect for our family of 5. The apartment was clean, quiet, and comfortable, a nice retreat from the busy HK pace at the end of the day. It is close to transport links and an easy walk to the Happy Valley race track. Carina was excellent to deal with; she responded quickly to all communication and easily accommodated our late arrival.

The location is superb for getting around HK. The flat has been laid out to maximise the space so we fitted our family of 5 with teenage kids very comfortably.  The flat is decorated to a good standard and everything is very clean and tidy. Carina is very quick to respond - but there were no issies for the entire week.  Would recommend this to anyone.

The apartment is close to many shops and food options and less than 10 mins walk to the Wanchai MTR station. The unit is well maintained and clean. My family of 4 had a comfortable time staying at Carina’s place and will highly recommend her place to anyone who are travelling as a group of 4. When we next return to HK, Carina’s apartment will definitely be our choice of accommodation.
We really enjoyed our stay at this apartment.  It is the perfect location for restaurants and sightseeing.  Very spacious for HK.
Carina的家就在香港最繁华的区域,出行非常方便｡空间舒适､用品俱全,远远超出了我的预期｡入住时Carina为我们准备了新鲜水果,还为孩子准备了糖果｡入住期间Carina回答我们的问题非常及时,再退房时还为我们宽限了时间｡这里有两个浴室,厨房热饭也很方便,我很推荐带孩子的旅客选择Carina家,游玩一整天后,回到这里很放松｡
Location is perfect and apartment is clean and comfortable.

Located in a very accessible part of Wanchai, there are great restaurants nearby. Carina is very thoughtful of all the little touches necessary at her place including a fruit basket when we arrived. There's extras like umbrella's, bottled water and coffee and tea. The places is especially large and roomy for Hong Kong and is newly renovated.
Perfect for family!

Carina place is spacious for 2 adults and 3 kids,which is hard to find it in Hong Kong.  The location is just a few minutes from MTR station make our trips was easier to everywhere. Carina is superhost, althought I didn't met her but she was very responsive and warm, she was welcoming us with a basket fresh fruits , fresh cold water which was perfect against the hot HK weather. 
Thank you Carina
很好的一次体验

Carina’s apartment is lovely and super location. There are lots of restaurants and supermarkets around, 5 min to metro and 10 min to ferry. 
The only thing is there is a bit noisy of traffic. But it is the real heart of HongKong, so won’t be a big issue.
I will surly book again when family trip.

Thanks Carina and Natie’s host.

Great apartment in a great location.  Really easy access to the train system, the Star Ferry, and the local trams (Ding Dings).  Great restaurant options nearby.  Apartment is very spacious for what we have had in Asia, and well stocked.  The kitchen worked well for our family and was well stocked.  It was a great stay.
Great place!

Our stay here was very good. I like the amount of air conditioning there was, even when it was super hot I can come home to a comfortable place. I also really enjoyed the washer/dryer. It was my first time seeing a machine that does both washing and dry! Very convenient and I appreciate that. There was plenty of lighting and the whole place was clean and comforting. Great place!
Very cool place for 5 people, we stayed here 1 week and it was close to everything in Hong Kong. Plus Carina answers really fast. I will recommend this place strongly !
Great place. REALLY clean. Convenient location. Good value.

Carina's place is at the perfect location to go around in HK, in the middle of Wan Chai and also very close to the subway station. The room was very clean, with everything needed. We were 5 people, and having the two bathrooms were very convenient.  Carina was an amazing host, always very quick at responding, and also gave us many tips to go around HK. I would highly recommend this place for any group of people willing to explore HK.
地理位置一级棒,去哪里都方便,在湾仔地铁站和铜锣湾地铁站之间,离湾仔站更近,附近路口拐弯一家叉烧店太好吃了,还有超市,商场,货币兑换,一应俱全｡多条公交线路｡步行可到湾仔码头｡房间安静整洁,厨房设备一应俱全,家人住着特别舒心｡下次一定还会住这里｡

The apartment is clean beautifull, so comfort and if you stay with more than one person you can have privacy too and got all the amenities, even two (Website hidden by Airbnb) hospitality and communication. the location is near of everything. 5 stars from me, thank you.
Apartment with great location, lot of local restaurant, host also been a great help with fast responses. Will book your place again when i go to HK.
Nice location, great house and excellent response times.
Clean comfortable convenient
房间超出预想,设施齐全,沟通也没有障碍,房主也能及时解答我们的问题,非常感谢~
Great location and hospitality. We had an excellent stay here. We would definitely stay again and we highly recommend this place to those travelling to the Wan Chai area.
右轉就是燒鵝､叉燒非常有名的再興燒臘,坐叮叮車跟大巴都很方便,搭機場快線的話直接坐免費接駁巴士到灣仔Novotel下車就到了喔
地理位置优越,购物方便｡房间里设备齐全,性价比超高｡房东人很好,下次到香港会再次选择这里｡

地理位置非常便捷 距离湾仔站和铜锣湾站的都不远 周围吃的东西很多 离铜锣湾商圈很近 去湾仔码头和金紫荆广场也很方便 房间打扫的很干净 有水果和糖果 厨房里有调料 咖啡 还有剪刀 雨伞 生活用品很全 唯一的不足就是几个人连续洗澡的话热水会出现不足的状况 需要稍微等一会儿 最喜欢的是两台取暖机 到的几天刚好遇到降温 取暖机排上大用场了 小小个但风力十足 很暖和 小伙伴一度想找个同品牌也买一个 非常棒的一次旅行 感谢Carina
地理位置非常方便,周边有很多餐厅
房东非常好,有问必答,非常贴心,水果 矿泉水 应有尽有 位置位于湾仔会展中心8分钟 交通便利  下次还要再订 谢谢房东

Carina's apartment is spacious enough, we were a family of 5. The location is great too, not far away from the Ding Ding trams, MTR, markets and restaurants.
It has everything you need within the apartment and is clean.
The main shower may need to be upgraded in the future but it's not a show stopper.
Carina was quick with response times and was accommodating, particularly with our bag drop before check in.
Overall, I would recommend Carina's apartment to any future travellers.
以后再去香港,一定再会预定!很适合家庭出游或是4-5人同行!

Carina's accommodation is very functional for groups and families. Location is really convenient, walking distance to wanchai mtr and lots of delicious and famous eateries within walking distance. The building is dated but the interior is renovated and most of all safe with a security guard at the lobby. Carina is a great communicator and we did experience an issue which she was really apologetic for and tried her best to resolve. Each bedroom has air conditioning units and we really love the washer/dryer .
来香港3天,度过了2个美好的晚上｡公寓位置很好,也很好找,离地铁和铛铛车都不远,逛街吃饭都很方便｡Crina给了不少好的建议｡我们从星光大道坐天星小轮到湾仔码头,走回来也很方便｡总之,感受很好｡

Entre os residentes da avenida, estão celebridades e grandes empresários. Ao longo da avenida, acontece uma das maiores comemorações de ano-novo da cidade. A Av. Lúcio Costa, antiga Av.
