name: Maison Chez Maria |Large groups |Close to airport
summary: New 2014 Montreal West Island charming house in the heart of the nature offers guest an unique quiet and comfortably place to stay. The place is fully equipped with quality appliances in an open concept kitchen. It can accommodate up to 10 adults and 2 children . The house has a high speed internet access WiFi network, smart TV with Netflix and other applications available and phone with unlimited Canada and USA calls provided.
space: Place has a spacious living room and a kitchen with quality appliances and a generous island. The dinning table is extendable and can accommodate 8-10 persons. A powder room can be also accessed at the same level. There are 3 closed private bedrooms at the second level of the house and a large bathroom with 2 sinks. The basement has a queen size bed and a sofa bed, a gorgeous wood finished bar, a second full bathroom and quality washer and dryer machines. From the dining room there is access to a patio, terrace and private fenced backyard.
description: New 2014 Montreal West Island charming house in the heart of the nature offers guest an unique quiet and comfortably place to stay. The place is fully equipped with quality appliances in an open concept kitchen. It can accommodate up to 10 adults and 2 children . The house has a high speed internet access WiFi network, smart TV with Netflix and other applications available and phone with unlimited Canada and USA calls provided. Place has a spacious living room and a kitchen with quality appliances and a generous island. The dinning table is extendable and can accommodate 8-10 persons. A powder room can be also accessed at the same level. There are 3 closed private bedrooms at the second level of the house and a large bathroom with 2 sinks. The basement has a queen size bed and a sofa bed, a gorgeous wood finished bar, a second full bathroom and quality washer and dryer machines. From the dining room there is access to a patio, terrace and private fenced backyard. Guest will have access
neighborhood_overview: House is situated next to "Bois-de-l'Île-Bizard Nature Park" a place that will give multiple choice of nature activities due to the diverse range of ecosystems present. On the island there are 3 golf circuits: "The Royal Montreal Golf Club", "Golf Saint-Raphael" and "Elm Ridge Country Club".  The Royal Montreal Golf Club is the oldest golf club in North America, and the oldest in continuous existence. It was founded in Montreal in 1873 and permission was granted by Queen Victoria to use the prefix "Royal" in 1884. House is within 3 minutes driving distance to restaurant, gas station and supermarket area that includes groceries, pharmacy, cleaning services and fast-food.  Within 5 minutes driving you can access  2 skating rinks, Sportplexe Pierrefonds and St. Raphael Sports Complex.  Access to the train station can be made by public transit or 15 minutes driving. The airport is situated at 25 minutes driving and Montreal downtown can be accessed in approximately 40 minutes. For winter s
notes: House is suitable for maximum 10 adults and 2 children 2-12 years old.
transit: Public transportation is within walking distance (aprox. 7 minutes).
access: Guest will have access to entire house except bedrooms which will be available depending on number of guests booked. Basement is considered a bedroom for 4 guests.
interaction: I'll be available to help at any time through emails and sometime in person to ensure a very pleasant experience during guest stay at "Maison Chez Maria"
house_rules: * No shoes in the house. * Quiet hours 23:00 - 07:00 per local residential code requirements.  * Kettle, toaster and coffee maker to be used at the edge of the counter top. * Smoking of any kind is not allowed in the house but can be done outside. Breach of this rule will attract a fee of 300 CAD from the deposit.  * Any kind of parties or events are not allowed and all non-paying guests must leave the property before mid-night.  Please respect our property and our neighbors. You are responsible for any disturbance coming from the unit during your stay.

host.host_about: Happy couple with two children. Love to travel, cook and enjoy the nature.

reviews.comments: The place was very clean and neat.  I've never an airbnb that clean.  Check in and check out was very easy.  Great experience.
It’s a best place for vacation for friends and family

Highly recommend. The home is very clean and and well depicted in the AirBnB posting. It is in a quiet neighborhood with lots of parking.  The hosts were very quick to respond to any request we had. The nearby Park-nature Du Bois-de-l'ile-Bizard was a great spot for a hike.
Chez Maria is a beautiful clean house. Her and her husband made sure I had everything I needed.

A beautiful house .. very clean with all the amenities.  Every little thing has been well thought of. Maria is an amazing host and was continuously checking on our comfort throughout the period of our stay. An amazing place to stay anytime of the year

name: Walk to Time Square! Causeway bay (c23c)
summary: Flat share with 4 people. 7/F building with lift The apartment has everything you need, bed, sofa, washing machine, fridge, pots and pans, microwave, desk, chair, Wifi internet, all the kitchen  utensils, blanket, curtain, pillows etc. Just bring your suitcase. Located at Tin Lok Lane. Causeway Bay It's super convenient to access all types of public transportation. Good for any occasion.

host.host_about:
Welcome to Hong Kong !
If you choose to stay with me, well, not me in particular, as I do have many rooms available for you to choose from.
Causeway Bay, Central, Sheung Wan, Kennedy Town, North Point, Yaumatei, TST, Olympic.....ehhhhh...too MANY ! 
One GOOD thing about staying at my apartments is.....
you will get to MEET NEW FRIENDS !!!

Guaranteed.

Many are expats, interns, exchange students, is time for you to build your Network !!!

Enjoy Your Stay !

Message me anytime !!! I am here to help !!!

name: Newly renovated studio, trendy borne area, terrace
summary: Newly renovated central flat in trendy borne neighbourhood of Barcelona. This flat is close to Arc du Triomf, Parc de la Cuitadella, Palau de la musica and has a bright open and spacious feel. The studio space gives the feeling of being in a hotel suite. Large smart TV with netflix (viewable from bed), AC and heating, easy to use and fully equipped kitchen with appliances and dishwasher. Sandstone tiled bathroom with bathtub and washing machine.
description: Newly renovated central flat in trendy borne neighbourhood of Barcelona. This flat is close to Arc du Triomf, Parc de la Cuitadella, Palau de la musica and has a bright open and spacious feel. The studio space gives the feeling of being in a hotel suite. Large smart TV with netflix (viewable from bed), AC and heating, easy to use and fully equipped kitchen with appliances and dishwasher. Sandstone tiled bathroom with bathtub and washing machine.

host.host_about:
Hola! I would consider myself easy going, friendly and helpful. I've now  been in Barcelona for 9years. Before Barcelona, I was living in London and USA and Ecuador. I love travelling, the mountains, skiing, meeting new people and learning new exciting things!
Look forward to welcoming you here in Barcelona.
